Key.Italian: Tieni sotto controllo la tua riserva di carburante: non vorrai rimanere a secco in una zona di combattimento! I danni ricevuti possono causare perdite di carburante, che svuoteranno rapidamente il tuo serbatoio. Potrai fare rifornimento presso autocarri di carburante o i serbatoi.
Key.Hungarian: Actively monitor your fuel level, since you don't want to be stuck in a combat zone without fuel. Damage can cause fuel leaks which rapidly drain your tanks. You can refuel at fuel trucks or fuel tanks.
Key.Polish: Kontroluj poziom paliwa, jeśli nie chcesz utknąć na polu walki. Uszkodzenia mogą spowodować wyciek, który spowoduje szybką utratę zapasów. Możesz uzupełniać paliwo z cystern lub zbiorników.
Key.Russian: Отслеживайте ваши запасы топлива, чтобы не остаться без него в зоне боевых действий. Повреждения топливной системы могут привести к утечкам, которые быстро опустошат ваши баки. Дозаправиться можно от топливозаправщиков или цистерн.
Key.German: Beobachten Sie stets Ihren Treibstoffvorrat, denn Sie wollen bestimmt nicht mitten im Kampfgebiet liegen bleiben, weil Ihnen der Sprit ausgegangen ist. Beschädigungen können zu Treibstofflecks führen, die Ihre Tanks ganz schnell leer werden lassen. Sie können an Tanklastzügen und Treibstoffdepots auftanken.
Key.Czech: Nezapomeňte kontrolovat množství paliva - nechcete skončit uprostřed přestřelky bez něj. Poškození nádrží vede k tomu, že se množství paliva sníží extrémně rychle. Doplnit je můžete u cisteren a na pumpách.
Key.English: Actively monitor your fuel level, since you don't want to be stuck in a combat zone without fuel. Damage can cause fuel leaks which rapidly drain your tanks. You can refuel at fuel trucks or fuel tanks.
Key.Japanese: Actively monitor your fuel level, since you don't want to be stuck in a combat zone without fuel. Damage can cause fuel leaks which rapidly drain your tanks. You can refuel at fuel trucks or fuel tanks.

Key.Original: Individual components in your vehicle, such as engines, tracks, rotors and turrets, can be damaged or destroyed. Component status is visualized in your HUD, showing green for no damage and moving to red for critical damage.
Key.Chinese: Individual components in your vehicle, such as engines, tracks, rotors and turrets, can be damaged or destroyed. Component status is visualized in your HUD, showing green for no damage and moving to red for critical damage.
Key.French: Les différents composants de votre véhicule, tels que les moteurs, les chenilles, les rotors et les tourelles, peuvent être endommagés ou détruits. L'état des composants est visualisée dans votre ATH, vert signifiant aucun dommage et se déplaçant vers le rouge pour exprimer les dégâts critiques.
Key.Spanish: Componentes individuales de tu vehículo, como motores, mecanismos de oruga, rotores o torretas, pueden ser dañados o destruidos. El estado de los componentes se visualiza en tu HUD, mostrándose en verde cuando no hay daño y volviéndose rojo para daños críticos.
Key.Italian: I singoli componenti del tuo veicolo, come motori, cingoli, rotori e torrette possono essere danneggiati o distrutti. Lo status dei componenti è mostrato nel tuo HUD: dal verde che indica perfetto funzionamento fino al rosso, che sta per danno critico.
Key.Hungarian: Individual components in your vehicle, such as engines, tracks, rotors and turrets, can be damaged or destroyed. Component status is visualized in your HUD, showing green for no damage and moving to red for critical damage.
Key.Polish: Poszczególne części pojazdu, takie jak silniki, gąsienice, wirniki i wieżyczki, mogą ulec uszkodzeniu lub zniszczeniu. Stan podzespołów jest widoczny na HUD: zielony kolor to brak uszkodzeń, czerwony oznacza zniszczenie danego elementu.
Key.Russian: Отдельные узлы и системы вашей единицы техники, такие как двигатели, ходовая часть, винты и башни, могут быть повреждены или уничтожены. Их состояние отображается на дисплее, показываясь зеленым при отсутствии повреждений, и постепенно приближаясь к красному по мере их накопления.
Key.German: In Ihrem Fahrzeug können Komponenten wie Motor, Kette, Rotor und Geschütz individuell beschädigt oder zerstört werden. Der Komponentenstatus wird in Ihrem HUD angezeigt: Grün bedeutet unbeschädigt und rot kritischen Schaden.
Key.Czech: Jednotlivé součásti vašeho vozidla, například motor, pásy nebo věže mohou být poškozeny nebo zničeny. Stav jednotlivých součástí je zobrazen na HUDu od zelené, která znamená nepoškozené po červenou, která znamená kritické poškození.
Key.English: Individual components in your vehicle, such as engines, tracks, rotors and turrets, can be damaged or destroyed. Component status is visualized in your HUD, showing green for no damage and moving to red for critical damage.
Key.Japanese: Individual components in your vehicle, such as engines, tracks, rotors and turrets, can be damaged or destroyed. Component status is visualized in your HUD, showing green for no damage and moving to red for critical damage.

Key.Original: In vehicles with dedicated gunners, only they can fire weapons. Switch to manual fire to take over control of the primary weapon system as a driver or pilot.
Key.Chinese: In vehicles with dedicated gunners, only they can fire weapons. Switch to manual fire to take over control of the primary weapon system as a driver or pilot.
Key.French: Dans les véhicules avec des tireurs dédiés, eux seuls peuvent ouvrir le feu. Passez au tir manuel pour prendre le contrôle du système d'arme principal en tant que conducteur ou pilote.
Key.Spanish: En vehículos con posiciones para artilleros, solo ellos pueden disparar las armas. Como piloto o conductor, cambia a fuego manual para tomar el control del sistema del arma principal.
Key.Italian: Nei veicoli con artigliere specializzato, solo loro possono fare fuoco. Passa alla modalità fuoco manuale per prendere il controllo del sistema di arma primaria nei panni del guidatore o del pilota.
Key.Hungarian: In vehicles with dedicated gunners, only they can fire weapons. Switch to manual fire to take over control of the primary weapon system as a driver or pilot.
Key.Polish: W pojazdach ze strzelcami tylko oni mogą obsługiwać broń. Przełącz się na ręczne prowadzenie ognia, żeby przejąć kierowanie głównym systemem uzbrojenia jako kierowca lub pilot.
Key.Russian: В технике со специальным рабочим местом стрелка-наводчика / наводчика-оператора, только он может вести огонь из основного вооружения. Переключитесь на ручное ведение огня для стрельбы с рабочего места механика-водителя или командира экипажа.
Key.German: In Fahrzeugen mit ausgewiesenen Schützen können nur diese Waffen abfeuern. Schalten Sie auf Manuelles Feuern um, wenn Sie als Fahrer oder Pilot die Kontrolle über das primäre Waffensystem übernehmen möchten.
Key.Czech: Ve vozidlech s pozicí střelce, jsou to právě a jen oni, kdo může používat palubní zbraně. Pokud hrajete za pilota nebo řidiče a chcete zbraně přesto ovládat, zapněte si manuální střelbu.
Key.English: In vehicles with dedicated gunners, only they can fire weapons. Switch to manual fire to take over control of the primary weapon system as a driver or pilot.
Key.Japanese: In vehicles with dedicated gunners, only they can fire weapons. Switch to manual fire to take over control of the primary weapon system as a driver or pilot.

Key.Original: When your vehicle is away from repair trucks or repair stations, only engineers are able to perform maintenance. However, note that they can only repair up to 60% of a vehicle's undamaged state.
Key.Chinese: When your vehicle is away from repair trucks or repair stations, only engineers are able to perform maintenance. However, note that they can only repair up to 60% of a vehicle's undamaged state.
Key.French: Lorsque votre véhicule est loin des camions de réparation ou des stations de réparation, seuls les sapeurs sont en mesure d'effectuer la maintance. Toutefois, notez qu'ils ne peuvent réparer que jusqu'à 60% de l'état initial du véhicule.
Key.Spanish: Cuando tu vehículo está lejos de los camiones o estaciones de reparación, solo los ingenieros son capaces de realizar el mantenimiento. Sin embargo, ten en cuenta que ellos solo pueden repararlo hasta el 60% de su estado.
Key.Italian: Quando il tuo veicolo è lontano dall'autocarro di riparazioni o officine, solo gli ingegneri sono in grado di effettuarne la manutenzione. Attenzione: possono solo riparare fino al 60% dei danni del veicolo.
Key.Hungarian: When your vehicle is away from repair trucks or repair stations, only engineers are able to perform maintenance. However, note that they can only repair up to 60% of a vehicle's undamaged state.
Key.Polish: Kiedy twój pojazd znajduje się daleko od ciężarówek naprawczych lub punktów napraw, mogą go reperować tylko saperzy. Pamiętaj jednak, że mogą przywrócić tylko 60% sprawności pojazdu.
Key.Russian: Если ваша техника находится вне досягаемости ремонтных грузовиков или сборных пунктов аварийных машин, только инженеры могут проводить ремонтно-восстановительные работы, и восстановление происходит только на 60%.
Key.German: Wenn Ihr Fahrzeug nicht in der Nähe eines Reparatur-LKWs oder einer Werkstatt ist, können nur Ingenieure die entsprechenden Arbeiten vornehmen. Beachten Sie jedoch, dass diese den unbeschädigten Status eines Fahrzeugs nur zu 60 % wiederherstellen können.
Key.Czech: Pokud nejsou v dosahu žádná opravná vozidla nebo budovy, mohou vaše vozidlo opravovat pouze ženisté. Jsou však pouze schopni opravit maximálně do 60% původního stavu vozidla.
Key.English: When your vehicle is away from repair trucks or repair stations, only engineers are able to perform maintenance. However, note that they can only repair up to 60% of a vehicle's undamaged state.
Key.Japanese: When your vehicle is away from repair trucks or repair stations, only engineers are able to perform maintenance. However, note that they can only repair up to 60% of a vehicle's undamaged state.

Key.Original: Many modern vehicles come equipped with a radar. It shows a top-down view of your surroundings with square icons representing ground vehicles and triangles indicating aircraft. Red icons are enemy targets, whereas green icons are friendly.
Key.Chinese: Many modern vehicles come equipped with a radar. It shows a top-down view of your surroundings with square icons representing ground vehicles and triangles indicating aircraft. Red icons are enemy targets, whereas green icons are friendly.
Key.French: Beaucoup de véhicules modernes sont équipés d'un radar. Il montre une vue de haut de votre environnement; les icônes carrées représentant les véhicules au sol alors que les triangles indiquent les aéronefs. Les icônes rouges sont des cibles ennemies, tandis que les icônes vertes sont des unités alliées.
Key.Spanish: Muchos vehículos modernos vienen equipados con radar. Éste muestra una panorámica superior de tus alrededores, con iconos cuadrados representando vehículos de tierra y triángulos indicando aeronaves. Los iconos rojos representan enemigos, mientras que los verdes son amigos.
Key.Italian: Molti veicoli moderni sono equipaggiati con un radar, che ti mostra una panoramica dall'alto dei dintorni: le icone quadrate rappresentano i veicoli di terra, mentre le icone triangolari sono i velivoli. Le icone rosse sono i bersagli nemici, mentre quelle verdi sono gli alleati.
Key.Hungarian: Many modern vehicles come equipped with a radar. It shows a top-down view of your surroundings with square icons representing ground vehicles and triangles indicating aircraft. Red icons are enemy targets, whereas green icons are friendly.
Key.Polish: Wiele nowoczesnych pojazdów posiada radar. Pokazuje on otoczenie z góry, widoczne na nim kwadratowe ikony to pojazdy naziemne, a trójkąty to lotnictwo. Czerwone ikony to przeciwnicy, zielone - sojusznicy.
Key.Russian: Многие современный виды техники оснащены обзорно-локационными станциями. Они показывают проекцию окружающей местности, с квадратами, символизирующими наземную технику, и треугольниками, символизирующими летательные аппараты. Красные маркеры обозначают силы противника, а зеленые - дружественные силы.
Key.German: Viele moderne Fahrzeuge sind mit einem Radar ausgerüstet. Es zeigt Ihre Umgebung aus der Vogelperspektive an. Quadratische Symbole stehen für Bodenfahrzeuge, dreieckige für Luftfahrzeuge. Rote Symbole sind feindliche Ziele, grüne stehen für Verbündete.
Key.Czech: Mnoho moderních vozidel je vybaveno radarem. Ukazuje okolí z pohledu shora, přičemž čtverce na něm představují pozemní a trojúhelníky letecká vozidla. Rudé ikony jsou nepřátele, zelené spojenci.
Key.English: Many modern vehicles come equipped with a radar. It shows a top-down view of your surroundings with square icons representing ground vehicles and triangles indicating aircraft. Red icons are enemy targets, whereas green icons are friendly.
Key.Japanese: Many modern vehicles come equipped with a radar. It shows a top-down view of your surroundings with square icons representing ground vehicles and triangles indicating aircraft. Red icons are enemy targets, whereas green icons are friendly.

Key.Original: Thermal Imagery helps vehicle crews to spot threats both during the day and at night. Any heat source is clearly distinguishable, so vehicle engines, weapon muzzles and even humans stand out. You're even able to look through smoke.
Key.Chinese: Thermal Imagery helps vehicle crews to spot threats both during the day and at night. Any heat source is clearly distinguishable, so vehicle engines, weapon muzzles and even humans stand out. You're even able to look through smoke.
Key.French: L'imagerie thermique permet aux équipages de repérer les menaces à la fois pendant la journée et la nuit. Toute source de chaleur se distingue nettement, que ce soit un moteur de véhicule, un humain ou même l'extrémité d'une arme fraîchement utilisée. Il est même possible de voir à travers la fumée.
Key.Spanish: La visión térmica ayuda a los tripulantes del vehículo a detectar amenazas, tanto durante el día como por la noche. Cualquier fuente de calor es claramente distinguible, así que los motores de los vehículos, los cañones de las armas o incluso las personas, sobresalen. Incluso verás a través del humo.
Key.Italian: La visione termica aiuta l'equipaggio di un veicolo a localizzare minacce sia di notte che di giorno. Qualsiasi fonte di calore è chiaramente distinguibile: i motori di veicoli, la bocca di fuoco di un'arma o addirittura esseri umani. Sarai anche in grado di vedere attraverso il fumo.
Key.Hungarian: Thermal Imagery helps vehicle crews to spot threats both during the day and at night. Any heat source is clearly distinguishable, so vehicle engines, weapon muzzles and even humans stand out. You're even able to look through smoke.
Key.Polish: Termowizja pomaga załogom pojazdów wykrywać zagrożenia w ciągu dnia i nocą. Każde źródło ciepła jest wyraźnie widoczne, więc silniki pojazdów, wyloty luf broni, a nawet ludzie są wyraźnie wyeksponowani. Można wykrywać cele nawet przez dym.
Key.Russian: Тепловизионные приборы помогают экипажам техники обнаруживать угрозы днем и ночью. Любой источник тепла легко различается, поэтому двигатели техники, вспышки выстрелов, и даже человеческие тела весьма заметны. Возможно даже просматривать сквозь дымовую завесу.
Key.German: Thermalsicht hilft Fahrzeugbesatzungen dabei, Bedrohungen bei Tag und bei Nacht frühzeitig auszumachen. Jede Wärmequelle ist klar unterscheidbar, weil Fahrzeugmotoren, Waffenmündungen und sogar Menschen verschiedene Signaturen haben. Sie können sogar durch Rauch sehen.
Key.Czech: Termální zobrazování umožňuje posádce vozidla pozorovat okolí i v noci. Jasně zvýrazňuje jakékoli zdroje tepla, například běžící motor, zášleh zbraně nebo člověka. Dokonce umožňuje prohlédnout kouřovou clonu.
Key.English: Thermal Imagery helps vehicle crews to spot threats both during the day and at night. Any heat source is clearly distinguishable, so vehicle engines, weapon muzzles and even humans stand out. You're even able to look through smoke.
Key.Japanese: Thermal Imagery helps vehicle crews to spot threats both during the day and at night. Any heat source is clearly distinguishable, so vehicle engines, weapon muzzles and even humans stand out. You're even able to look through smoke.

Key.Original: Keep clear of destroyed vehicles. As fire and heat reach fuel and ammunition, dangerous secondary explosions may be triggered.
Key.Chinese: Keep clear of destroyed vehicles. As fire and heat reach fuel and ammunition, dangerous secondary explosions may be triggered.
Key.French: Restez à distance des véhicules détruits. Lorsque le feu et la chaleur atteignent la réserve de carburant et de munitions, de dangereuses explosions secondaires peuvent être déclenchées.
Key.Spanish: Mantente alejado de los vehículos destruidos. Conforme el fuego y el calor alcancen el combustible o la munición, pueden producirse peligrosas explosiones.
Key.Italian: Tieniti lontano dai veicoli distrutti. Se il calore o il fuoco raggiungono il carburante o le munizioni, si possono verificare pericolose esplosioni secondarie.
Key.Hungarian: Keep clear of destroyed vehicles. As fire and heat reach fuel and ammunition, dangerous secondary explosions may be triggered.
Key.Polish: Nie zbliżaj się do zniszczonych pojazdów. Kiedy ogień i wysoka temperatura dotrą do amunicji, może dojść do niebezpiecznych wybuchów wtórnych.
Key.Russian: Остерегайтесь остовов уничтоженной техники. При возгорании топлива и боеукладки, возможны вторичные подрывы.
Key.German: Halten Sie sich von zerstörten Fahrzeugen fern. Wenn Feuer und Hitze Treibstoff und Munition erreichen, können dadurch gefährliche Sekundärexplosionen ausgelöst werden.
Key.Czech: Nepřibližujte se ke zničeným vozidlům. Oheň nebo teplo mohou zapálit zbytek munice či paliva a způsobit nebezpečnou sekundární explozi.
Key.English: Keep clear of destroyed vehicles. As fire and heat reach fuel and ammunition, dangerous secondary explosions may be triggered.
Key.Japanese: Keep clear of destroyed vehicles. As fire and heat reach fuel and ammunition, dangerous secondary explosions may be triggered.

Key.Original: While inside a vehicle you can switch to other positions which are accessible from the compartment you are currently in. To move to inaccessible positions, you'll first have to get out.
Key.Chinese: While inside a vehicle you can switch to other positions which are accessible from the compartment you are currently in. To move to inaccessible positions, you'll first have to get out.
Key.French: De l'intérieur d'un véhicule vous pouvez passer à n'importe quel autre poste qui est accessible depuis le compartiment dans lequel vous êtes. Pour passer aux endroits inaccessibles, vous devrez d'abord sortir.
Key.Spanish: Mientras estés dentro de un vehículo puedes cambiar a otras posiciones que sean accesibles desde el compartimento donde estés. Para cambiarte a posiciones inaccesibles, primero tendrás que salir.
Key.Italian: Quando sei all'interno di un veicolo, puoi cambiare postazione a seconda di quelle disponibili nello scompartimento. Per spostarti verso postazioni non accessibili, dovrai prima uscire dal veicolo.
Key.Hungarian: While inside a vehicle you can switch to other positions which are accessible from the compartment you are currently in. To move to inaccessible positions, you'll first have to get out.
Key.Polish: W pojeździe możesz przesiadać się na inne stanowiska, dostępne z przedziału, w którym się znajdujesz. Aby przejść na niedostępne pozycje, musisz najpierw wysiąść z pojazdu.
Key.Russian: Находясь внутри техники, вы можете перемещаться с места на место внутри вашего отделения или отсека. Для перемещения на недоступные места, вам придется покинуть машину.
Key.German: In einem Fahrzeug können Sie zu anderen Positionen wechseln, wenn Sie aus dem Bereich, in dem Sie sich aktuell befinden, zugänglich sind. Um zu unzugänglichen Positionen zu wechseln, müssen Sie zuerst aussteigen.
Key.Czech: Uvnitř vozidla máte možnost se přesunout na pozici, která je ve stejném oddílu, jako vy. Pokud chcete na pozici, která je v jiném oddílu, musíte z vozidla nejprve vystoupit.
Key.English: While inside a vehicle you can switch to other positions which are accessible from the compartment you are currently in. To move to inaccessible positions, you'll first have to get out.
Key.Japanese: While inside a vehicle you can switch to other positions which are accessible from the compartment you are currently in. To move to inaccessible positions, you'll first have to get out.

Key.Original: When vehicle weapons support various types of ammunition, you can load different types from the Action Menu.
Key.Chinese: When vehicle weapons support various types of ammunition, you can load different types from the Action Menu.
Key.French: Lorsque les armes d'un véhicule permettent l'utilisation de divers types de munitions, vous pouvez charger un type spécifique dans le menu Action.
Key.Spanish: Cuando las armas de un vehículo soportan diferentes tipos de munición, puedes cargar los diferentes tipos desde el Menú de Acción.
Key.Italian: Quando le armi di un veicolo supportano più di un tipo di munizione, potrai caricarne varie dal Menu Azione.
Key.Hungarian: When vehicle weapons support various types of ammunition, you can load different types from the Action Menu.
Key.Polish: Jeśli broń pojazdu jest zasilana różnymi rodzajami amunicji, możesz je wybierać za pomocą Menu akcji.
Key.Russian: При применении вооружением различных типов боеприпасов, их можно менять из меню действий.
Key.German: Wenn die Waffen eines Fahrzeugs verschiedene Munitionstypen unterstützen, können Sie sie über das Aktionsmenü gezielt laden.
Key.Czech: Pokud mohou zbraně vozidla střílet různé druhy munice, můžete je měnit prostřednictvím Menu akcí.
Key.English: When vehicle weapons support various types of ammunition, you can load different types from the Action Menu.
Key.Japanese: When vehicle weapons support various types of ammunition, you can load different types from the Action Menu.

Key.Original: To compensate for bullets dropping as they fly, some weapon sights can be zeroed to specific ranges.
Key.Chinese: To compensate for bullets dropping as they fly, some weapon sights can be zeroed to specific ranges.
Key.French: Pour compenser l'effet de gravité sur les balles, certains viseurs peuvent être ajustés en fonction des distances.
Key.Spanish: Para compensar el gasto de las balas, algunas miras pueden ser ajustadas a rangos específicos.
Key.Italian: Per compensare la parabola di tiro, alcune armi dispongono di mirini che si possono calibrare a distanze specifiche.
Key.Hungarian: To compensate for bullets dropping as they fly, some weapon sights can be zeroed to specific ranges.
Key.Polish: Aby skompensować opadanie pocisku w locie, niektóre celowniki można ustawić na określony zasięg.
Key.Russian: Для корректировки огня относительно баллистики пуль, можно сменить установку прицела на конкретную дальность для некоторых типов оружия.
Key.German: Um die ballistische Kurve von Projektilen zu kompensieren, können manche Waffenvisiere auf bestimmte Reichweiten eingestellt werden.
Key.Czech: Některé zbraně mají tzv. náměr, který kompenzuje to, že dráha střely vlivem gravitace klesá. Náměr je vždy na konkrétní vzdálenost.
Key.English: To compensate for bullets dropping as they fly, some weapon sights can be zeroed to specific ranges.
Key.Japanese: To compensate for bullets dropping as they fly, some weapon sights can be zeroed to specific ranges.

Key.Original: A lot of weapons have several types of sights and optics. Some are better for close quarters combat, while others can be zoomed for targets at long ranges. Many optics also support night vision modes.
Key.Chinese: A lot of weapons have several types of sights and optics. Some are better for close quarters combat, while others can be zoomed for targets at long ranges. Many optics also support night vision modes.
Key.French: Un grand nombre d'armes ont plusieurs types de viseur optique. Certains sont meilleurs pour le combat rapproché, tandis que d'autres permettent de zoomer pour les cibles à longue portée. Beaucoup de viseurs permettent aussi la vision nocturne.
Key.Spanish: Muchas armas disponen de varios tipos de miras y lentes. Algunas son mejores para el combate a corta distancia mientras que otras pueden ampliar objetivos a larga distancia. Además, muchas lentes soportan los modos de visión nocturna.
Key.Italian: Molte armi dispongono di vari tipi di mirini e lenti, alcuni più utili per un combattimento a distanza ravvicinata, altri che possono tenere sotto tiro bersagli lontani. Alcuni mirini supportano anche la modalità visione notturna.
Key.Hungarian: A lot of weapons have several types of sights and optics. Some are better for close quarters combat, while others can be zoomed for targets at long ranges. Many optics also support night vision modes.
Key.Polish: Wiele broni ma różne rodzaje celowników i optyki. Niektóre lepiej sprawdzają się w walce na małą odległość, inne mogą służyć do wykrywania celów na dużych dystansach. Celowniki optyczne często posiadają też system noktowizji.
Key.Russian: Многие типы оружия оснащены различными типами прицелов. Некоторые больше подходят для ближнего боя, тогда как другие могут применять панкратику для стрельбы по целям на дальней дистанции. Многие оптические прицелы могут применяться в ночных условиях.
Key.German: Für viele Waffen gibt es verschiedene Arten von Visieren und optischen Zielhilfen. Einige sind besser für kürzere Distanzen geeignet, andere verfügen über ein Zoom für große Entfernungen. Viele Visiere unterstützen auch Nachtsichtsysteme.
Key.Czech: Mnoho zbraní má několik druhů optiky. Některé se hodí lépe pro boj na blízko, jiné mohou přibližovat cíle na velkou vzdálenost. Mnoho typů optiky obsahuje režim pro noční vidění.
Key.English: A lot of weapons have several types of sights and optics. Some are better for close quarters combat, while others can be zoomed for targets at long ranges. Many optics also support night vision modes.
Key.Japanese: A lot of weapons have several types of sights and optics. Some are better for close quarters combat, while others can be zoomed for targets at long ranges. Many optics also support night vision modes.

Key.Original: When you require better accuracy, try holding your breath to steady your aim.
Key.Chinese: When you require better accuracy, try holding your breath to steady your aim.
Key.French: Pour une plus grande précision de tir, stabilisez votre viseur en retenant votre respiration.
Key.Spanish: Cuando requieras una mejor precisión, intenta mantener tu aliento para fijar tu objetivo.
Key.Italian: Quando hai bisogno di maggiore precisione, prova a trattenere il respiro mentre punti l'arma.
Key.Hungarian: When you require better accuracy, try holding your breath to steady your aim.
Key.Polish: Aby celniej strzelać, można wstrzymać oddech, co ustabilizuje broń.
Key.Russian: Если требуется повысить точность огня, попробуйте задержать дыхание для стабилизации прицельной линии.
Key.German: Wenn Sie Ihre Präzision steigern möchten, halten Sie doch mal den Atem an, um ruhiger zielen zu können.
Key.Czech: Pokud potřebujete vyšší přesnost, můžete zkusit zadržet dech.
Key.English: When you require better accuracy, try holding your breath to steady your aim.
Key.Japanese: When you require better accuracy, try holding your breath to steady your aim.

Key.Original: Try not to move too much while you fire your weapon. Firing from a fixed position will dramatically improve your aim.
Key.Chinese: Try not to move too much while you fire your weapon. Firing from a fixed position will dramatically improve your aim.
Key.French: Évitez de trop bouger lorsque vous faites feu. Le tir à partir d'une position fixe augmentera considérablement votre précision.
Key.Spanish: Intenta no moverte demasiado mientras disparas tu arma. Disparar desde una posición fija incrementará drásticamente tu puntería.
Key.Italian: Prova a muoverti il meno possibile mentre apri il fuoco con la tua arma: ciò aumenterà di molto la tua capacità di mira.
Key.Hungarian: Try not to move too much while you fire your weapon. Firing from a fixed position will dramatically improve your aim.
Key.Polish: Staraj się nie poruszać podczas strzelania. Z pozycji nieruchomej prowadzisz znacznie celniejszy ostrzał.
Key.Russian: Постарайтесь избежать лишних движений при стрельбе из индивидуального оружия. Ведение огня из статичной позиции сильно упростит прицеливание.
Key.German: Versuchen Sie, sich nicht zu bewegen, wenn Sie Ihre Waffe abfeuern. Das Feuern aus einer stabilen Lage wird Ihre Zielsicherheit deutlich verbessern.
Key.Czech: Snažte se během střelby nepohybovat. Palba z pevného bodu je mnohonásobně přesnější.
Key.English: Try not to move too much while you fire your weapon. Firing from a fixed position will dramatically improve your aim.
Key.Japanese: Try not to move too much while you fire your weapon. Firing from a fixed position will dramatically improve your aim.

Key.Original: Reloading weapons is best done from cover, since you are unable to return fire while you reload.
Key.Chinese: Reloading weapons is best done from cover, since you are unable to return fire while you reload.
Key.French: Il est préférable de recharger son arme lorsque vous êtes à couvert puisque durant cette action il vous est impossible de riposter.
Key.Spanish: Es mejor recargar las armas estando cubierto, ya que serás incapaz de devolver el fuego mientras lo haces.
Key.Italian: Quando ricarichi un'arma, fallo al coperto: non sarai in grado di rispondere al fuoco mentre ricarichi.
Key.Hungarian: Reloading weapons is best done from cover, since you are unable to return fire while you reload.
Key.Polish: Najlepiej przeładowywać broń, znajdując się za osłoną, ponieważ kiedy się to robi, nie można odpowiadać ogniem.
Key.Russian: Перезарядку оружия лучше всего выполнять в укрытии, т.к. вы не можете открыть ответный огонь при перезарядке.
Key.German: Waffen werden am besten in Deckung nachgeladen, da Sie während des Ladens nicht zurückschießen können.
Key.Czech: Přebíjejte zbraň v krytu, během přebíjení totiž nemůžete palbu opětovat.
Key.English: Reloading weapons is best done from cover, since you are unable to return fire while you reload.
Key.Japanese: Reloading weapons is best done from cover, since you are unable to return fire while you reload.

Key.Original: Always lead (aim in advance of) moving targets to compensate for its movement and your munition's travel time..
Key.Chinese: Always lead (aim in advance of) moving targets to compensate for its movement and your munition's travel time..
Key.French: Pour le tir sur cible mouvante, il faut toujours considérer le mouvement de la cible et le temps que la munition prendra pour atteindre l'objectif.
Key.Spanish: Apunta siempre delante de los objetivos en movimiento, para compensar su movimiento y el tiempo de vuelo de tu munición.
Key.Italian: Mira con anticipo e spara a bersagli mobili per compensare la differenza che c'è tra il loro movimento e il tempo di impatto del proiettile.
Key.Hungarian: Always lead (aim in advance of) moving targets to compensate for its movement and your munition's travel time..
Key.Polish: Do ruchomych celów zawsze strzelaj z wyprzedzeniem, biorąc pod uwagę szybkość obiektu i czas lotu pocisku.
Key.Russian: Всегда ведите огонь с упреждением на смещение цели за время полета боеприпаса.
Key.German: Zielen Sie bei beweglichen Zielen immer vor das Ziel, um seine Bewegung und die Flugzeit Ihres Projektils auszugleichen.
Key.Czech: Vždy střílejte před pohybující se cíl - počítejte jak s jeho pohybem, tak s časem letu kulky.
Key.English: Always lead (aim in advance of) moving targets to compensate for its movement and your munition's travel time.
Key.Japanese: Always lead (aim in advance of) moving targets to compensate for its movement and your munition's travel time..

Key.Original: Weapons will often have several fire modes to select from, such as semi-automatic, burst and full-automatic.
Key.Chinese: Weapons will often have several fire modes to select from, such as semi-automatic, burst and full-automatic.
Key.French: Les armes ont souvent différents modes de tir, comme le semi-automatique, en rafale et complètement automatique.
Key.Spanish: A menudo, las armas tendrán diversos modos de fuego para elegir, como semi automático, ráfaga o automático.
Key.Italian: Le armi hanno spesso diverse modalità di fuoco tra cui scegliere, come semi-automatica, raffica o automatica.
Key.Hungarian: Weapons will often have several fire modes to select from, such as semi-automatic, burst and full-automatic.
Key.Polish: Broń często ma kilka trybów ognia, na przykład samopowtarzalny, krótka seria i w pełni automatyczny.
Key.Russian: Как правило, вооружение имеет несколько режимов огня, например одиночными, очередью и автоматически.
Key.German: Bei vielen Waffen stehen mehrere Feuermodi zur Auswahl, wie halbautomatisch, Salve und vollautomatisch.
Key.Czech: Zbraně mají mnoho režimů střelby, které je možno měnit: poloautomat, dávka nebo automat.
Key.English: Weapons will often have several fire modes to select from, such as semi-automatic, burst and full-automatic.
Key.Japanese: Weapons will often have several fire modes to select from, such as semi-automatic, burst and full-automatic.

Key.Original: Since static weapons cannot move, sometimes you will be forced to get out and fend off enemy flank or rear attacks.
Key.Chinese: Since static weapons cannot move, sometimes you will be forced to get out and fend off enemy flank or rear attacks.
Key.French: Étant donné que les armes statiques ne peuvent pas se déplacer, vous aurez parfois à laisser votre position pour repousser les attaques sur votre flanc ou votre arrière.
Key.Spanish: Como las armas estáticas no pueden moverse, a veces tendrás que salir y defenderte de los ataques desde el flanco o desde atrás.
Key.Italian: Visto che le armi statiche non si possono muovere, a volte sarai costretto ad uscire e portare un attacco ai fianchi o alle spalle del nemico.
Key.Hungarian: Since static weapons cannot move, sometimes you will be forced to get out and fend off enemy flank or rear attacks.
Key.Polish: Broń stała nie może być przemieszczana, dlatego czasami będziesz musiał ją zostawić, aby odeprzeć przeciwnika atakującego z flanki lub od tyłu.
Key.Russian: Т.к. статичное вооружение не может быть перемещено, иногда вам придется оставлять его для отражения вражеской атаки с флангов или из тыла.
Key.German: Da statische Waffen unbeweglich sind, müssen Sie manchmal feindliche Angriffe von hinten oder den Flanken selbst zurückschlagen.
Key.Czech: Vzhledem k tomu, že se statické zbraně nemohou pohybovat, budete občas nuceni je opustit, abyste zlikvidovali boční útok nepřátel.
Key.English: Since static weapons cannot move, sometimes you will be forced to get out and fend off enemy flank or rear attacks.
Key.Japanese: Since static weapons cannot move, sometimes you will be forced to get out and fend off enemy flank or rear attacks.

Key.Original: Indirect fire weapons can be more easily targeted using the Artillery Computer available in the Action Menu.
Key.Chinese: Indirect fire weapons can be more easily targeted using the Artillery Computer available in the Action Menu.
Key.French: Les armes à tir indirect peuvent être plus facilement orientées à l'aide de l'ordinateur d'artillerie disponible dans le menu Action.
Key.Spanish: Las armas de fuego indirecto pueden ser más fácilmente apuntadas usando el Ordenador de Artillería disponible en el Menú de Acción.
Key.Italian: Puoi mirare più facilmente ad un bersaglio con le armi da fuoco indiretto usando il Computer dell'Artiglieria disponibile nel Menu Azione.
Key.Hungarian: Indirect fire weapons can be more easily targeted using the Artillery Computer available in the Action Menu.
Key.Polish: Broń prowadząca ostrzał pośredni może być wycelowana za pomocą komputera artyleryjskiego dostępnego w Menu akcji.
Key.Russian: Навесный огонь легче всего корректируется баллистическим вычислителем, доступным ч/з меню действий.
Key.German: Mit Waffen für indirektes Feuer lässt sich einfacher zielen, wenn Sie den Artillerie-Computer im Aktionsmenü benutzen.
Key.Czech: Zbraně s nepřímou střelbou se daleko lépe zaměřují s pomocí balistického počítače, který je k dispozici v Menu akcí.
Key.English: Indirect fire weapons can be more easily targeted using the Artillery Computer available in the Action Menu.
Key.Japanese: Indirect fire weapons can be more easily targeted using the Artillery Computer available in the Action Menu.

Key.Original: Their high rate of fire makes machine guns ideal candidates for suppressing groups of infantry.
Key.Chinese: Their high rate of fire makes machine guns ideal candidates for suppressing groups of infantry.
Key.French: Leur cadence de tir élevée fait des mitrailleuses des candidats idéaux pour les tirs de suppression sur un groupe d'infanterie.
Key.Spanish: Sus altas cadencias de fuego convierten a las ametralladoras en candidatos ideales para eliminar grupos de infantería.
Key.Italian: L'elevato rateo di fuoco rende le mitragliatrici le candidate ideali per eliminare le unità di fanteria.
Key.Hungarian: Their high rate of fire makes machine guns ideal candidates for suppressing groups of infantry.
Key.Polish: Duża szybkostrzelność karabinów maszynowych pozwala im przygniatać większe grupy piechoty.
Key.Russian: Высокий темп стрельбы пулеметов делает их отличным выбором для подавления групп пехоты.
Key.German: Maschinengewehre sind wegen ihrer hohen Feuergeschwindigkeit ideal, um Infanteriegruppen durch Unterstützungsfeuer in Deckung zu halten.
Key.Czech: Vysoká kadence kulometů z nich dělá ideální zbraně pro pozdržení velkého množství pěchoty.
Key.English: Their high rate of fire makes machine guns ideal candidates for suppressing groups of infantry.
Key.Japanese: Their high rate of fire makes machine guns ideal candidates for suppressing groups of infantry.

Key.Original: Sidearms are primarily back-up and personal defense weapons. They are meant to be used on short-range targets.
Key.Chinese: Sidearms are primarily back-up and personal defense weapons. They are meant to be used on short-range targets.
Key.French: Les armes de poing sont principalement des armes de défense et de sauvegarde personnelle. Elles sont destinées à être utilisées sur des cibles à courte portée.
Key.Spanish: Las armas de bolsillo son principalmente de apoyo y defensa personal. Tienen que a ser usadas en objetivos a corto alcance.
Key.Italian: Le armi secondarie sono più che altro armi di supporto o di difesa personale. Si devono usare contro bersagli che si trovano a corto raggio.
Key.Hungarian: Sidearms are primarily back-up and personal defense weapons. They are meant to be used on short-range targets.
Key.Polish: Broń krótka jest głównie bronią zapasową do obrony bezpośredniej. Służy do rażenia celów znajdujących się w niewielkiej odległości.
Key.Russian: Пистолеты являются резервным оружием, как правило применяемым для самообороны на ближней дистанции.
Key.German: Pistolen sind primär als Ersatzwaffen und zur Selbstverteidigung gedacht. Sie sind nur auf kurze Distanz effektiv.
Key.Czech: Pistole jsou především záložní zbraně pro osobní obranu. Jejich použití je efektivní zejména na krátkou vzdálenost.
Key.English: Sidearms are primarily back-up and personal defense weapons. They are meant to be used on short-range targets.
Key.Japanese: Sidearms are primarily back-up and personal defense weapons. They are meant to be used on short-range targets.

Key.Original: Launchers and their projectiles are heavy and bulky, so you are usually not able to carry a lot of ammunition for them. Only fire when you have a good lock on your target.
Key.Chinese: Launchers and their projectiles are heavy and bulky, so you are usually not able to carry a lot of ammunition for them. Only fire when you have a good lock on your target.
Key.French: Les lance-roquette et leurs projectiles sont lourds et encombrants, de sorte qu'il est généralement impossible de transporter beaucoup de munitions. Ne tirez que lorsque vous avez un bon verrouillage sur votre cible.
Key.Spanish: Los lanzadores y sus proyectiles son pesados y voluminosos, así que no podrás cargar mucha munición. Dispara solo cuando tengas bien fijado tu objetivo.
Key.Italian: I lanciarazzi ed i relativi proiettili sono pesanti ed ingombranti, e ti sarà difficile trasportare un gran numero di munizioni. Spara solo quando sei sicuro di tenere sotto tiro il tuo bersaglio.
Key.Hungarian: Launchers and their projectiles are heavy and bulky, so you are usually not able to carry a lot of ammunition for them. Only fire when you have a good lock on your target.
Key.Polish: Wyrzutnie i ich pociski są ciężkie i nieporęczne, więc nie możesz przenosić zbyt dużego zapasu amunicji. Strzelaj tylko wtedy, gdy dobrze namierzyłeś cel.
Key.Russian: Пусковые устройства и их боеприпасы тяжелы и громоздки, и вы вряд ли сможете переносить их в большом количестве. Поэтому ведите огонь из них только при достаточной уверенности в поражении цели.
Key.German: Raketenwerfer und ihre Projektile sind schwer und unhandlich, Sie werden also normalerweise nicht viel Munition dafür tragen können. Feuern Sie nur, wenn Sie Ihr Ziel klar erfasst haben.
Key.Czech: Raketomety a střely do nich jsou těžké a neohrabané, a tak do nich máte většinou jen omezené množství munice. Palte pouze pokud máte dobrou pozici.
Key.English: Launchers and their projectiles are heavy and bulky, so you are usually not able to carry a lot of ammunition for them. Only fire when you have a good lock on your target.
Key.Japanese: Launchers and their projectiles are heavy and bulky, so you are usually not able to carry a lot of ammunition for them. Only fire when you have a good lock on your target.

Key.Original: It may take a while before a launcher acquires a full lock onto a target. Wait for the audio cues that indicate a successful lock before firing.
Key.Chinese: It may take a while before a launcher acquires a full lock onto a target. Wait for the audio cues that indicate a successful lock before firing.
Key.French: Il peut se passer un certain temps avant qu'un lance-roquette acquière un verrouillage complet sur une cible. Attendez que les signaux audio indiquent un verrouillage avec succès avant de tirer.
Key.Spanish: Puede tardar un poco hasta que el lanzador tenga totalmente fijado un objetivo. Espera la señal de audio que indica una fijación éxitosa antes de disparar.
Key.Italian: Ci potrebbe volere un po' prima che un lanciarazzi acquisisca un bersaglio. Prima di sparare, attendi il segnale acustico che indica che l'acquisizione è andata a buon fine.
Key.Hungarian: It may take a while before a launcher acquires a full lock onto a target. Wait for the audio cues that indicate a successful lock before firing.
Key.Polish: Wyrzutnia w pełni namierza cel dopiero po chwili. Zanim wystrzelisz, zaczekaj na sygnał dźwiękowy potwierdzający udane namierzanie.
Key.Russian: Захват цели пусковым устройством требует времени. Дождитесь характерного звукового сигнала перед стрельбой.
Key.German: Es kann eine Weile dauern, bis der Raketenwerfer ein Ziel korrekt erfasst hat. Warten Sie auf das Audiosignal der Zielerfassung, bevor Sie feuern.
Key.Czech: Dokonalé zaměření raketometu může chvíli trvat. Před vystřelením si počkejte si na zvukové znamení, oznamující zaměření cíle.
Key.English: It may take a while before a launcher acquires a full lock onto a target. Wait for the audio cues that indicate a successful lock before firing.
Key.Japanese: It may take a while before a launcher acquires a full lock onto a target. Wait for the audio cues that indicate a successful lock before firing.

Key.Original: In helicopters, you can enable auto-hovering, which will automatically stabilize the aircraft and make it hover in one spot.
Key.Chinese: In helicopters, you can enable auto-hovering, which will automatically stabilize the aircraft and make it hover in one spot.
Key.French: Dans les hélicoptères, vous pouvez activer le vol stationnaire automatique. Cela stabilisera automatiquement l'hélicoptère et lui fera faire du surplace.
Key.Spanish: En los helicópteros, puedes habilitar la suspensión automática, que estabilizará la nave haciéndolo flotar en un punto.
Key.Italian: Negli elicotteri potrai attivare il volo a punto fisso automatico, che ti permetterà di stabilizzare il velivolo e farlo fermare in un punto.
Key.Hungarian: In helicopters, you can enable auto-hovering, which will automatically stabilize the aircraft and make it hover in one spot.
Key.Polish: W śmigłowcach możesz włączyć automatyczny zawis, który stabilizuje maszynę i utrzymuje ją w zawisie.
Key.Russian: Пилотируя вертолеты, вы можете включить автоматическое висение, которое самостоятельно стабилизирует машину и будет удерживать ее в заданной позиции.
Key.German: In Hubschraubern können Sie Schwebenflug aktivieren, wodurch das Luftfahrzeug stabilisiert wird und in der Position verbleibt.
Key.Czech: Ve vrtulnících je možno zapnout Automatickou stabilizaci, jakýsi autopilot, jehož funkcí je zastavit vrtulník na jednom místě.
Key.English: In helicopters, you can enable auto-hovering, which will automatically stabilize the aircraft and make it hover in one spot.
Key.Japanese: In helicopters, you can enable auto-hovering, which will automatically stabilize the aircraft and make it hover in one spot.

Key.Original: Flying in a helicopter makes you an excellent target for a wide range of anti-air weapons. Try to fly fast and low and to mask your aircraft using terrain features.
Key.Chinese: Flying in a helicopter makes you an excellent target for a wide range of anti-air weapons. Try to fly fast and low and to mask your aircraft using terrain features.
Key.French: Voler dans un hélicoptère fait de vous une excellente cible pour un large éventail d'armes anti-aériennes. Essayez de voler vite, bas, et de masquer votre hélicoptère en utilisant les caractéristiques du terrain.
Key.Spanish: Volar en helicóptero te convierte en un excelente blanco para una amplia variedad de armas antiaéreas. Intentan volar bajo y rápido, usando las características del terreno para ocultar tu nave.
Key.Italian: Volare a bordo di un elicottero ti renderà un facile bersaglio per le armi antiaeree a lunga gittata. Prova a volare ad alta velocità, a bassa quota, e a mimetizzare il tuo velivolo sfruttando le caratteristiche del terreno.
Key.Hungarian: Flying in a helicopter makes you an excellent target for a wide range of anti-air weapons. Try to fly fast and low and to mask your aircraft using terrain features.
Key.Polish: Śmigłowiec to idealny cel dla broni przeciwlotniczej. Staraj się latać szybko i nisko, ukrywając maszynę za przeszkodami terenowymi.
Key.Russian: Полет в вертолете делает вас отличной мишенью для различного зенитного вооружения. Старайтесь лететь быстро и низко, укрывая вашу машину в складках местности.
Key.German: In einem Hubschrauber bieten Sie für eine große Breite von Luftabwehrwaffen ein ausgezeichnetes Ziel. Fliegen Sie schnell und tief, und nutzen Sie auch das Gelände, um nicht entdeckt zu werden!
Key.Czech: Vrtulník je velmi snadný cíl pro jakoukoli protileteckou zbraň. Snažte se proto létat rychle, nízko při zemi a kryjte se za terén.
Key.English: Flying in a helicopter makes you an excellent target for a wide range of anti-air weapons. Try to fly fast and low and to mask your aircraft using terrain features.
Key.Japanese: Flying in a helicopter makes you an excellent target for a wide range of anti-air weapons. Try to fly fast and low and to mask your aircraft using terrain features.

Key.Original: When you lose your tail rotor, your helicopter will become very hard to fly and it may spin out of control. Find a safe area to land as quickly as you can.
Key.Chinese: When you lose your tail rotor, your helicopter will become very hard to fly and it may spin out of control. Find a safe area to land as quickly as you can.
Key.French: Lorsque vous perdez votre rotor de queue, votre hélicoptère va devenir très difficile à piloter et échappera à tout contrôle. Trouvez un endroit sûr pour atterir aussi vite que vous le pouvez.
Key.Spanish: Cuando pierdas el rotor de cola, tu helicóptero será muy difícil de pilotar y puedes perder facilmente de control. Encuentra un área para aterrizar tan rápido como puedas.
Key.Italian: Quando perdi il rotore posteriore, il tuo elicottero diventerà difficile da governare e potresti facilmente perderne il controllo. Trova un'area sicura dove atterrare al più presto.
Key.Hungarian: When you lose your tail rotor, your helicopter will become very hard to fly and it may spin out of control. Find a safe area to land as quickly as you can.
Key.Polish: Kiedy stracisz śmigło ogonowe, śmigłowiec będzie o wiele mniej sterowny i może wymknąć się spod kontroli. Jak najszybciej znajdź lądowisko.
Key.Russian: Если вы потеряете рулевой винт, управлять вертолетом станет очень сложно, и он может свалиться в плоский штопор. Как можно быстрее определите безопасную точку для экстренной посадки.
Key.German: Wenn Ihr Heckrotor ausfällt, ist der Hubschrauber kaum noch zu manövrieren, und es kann sein, dass Sie völlig die Kontrolle verlieren. Finden Sie so schnell wie möglich einen sicheren Landeplatz.
Key.Czech: Po ztrátě zadního rotoru bude váš vrtulník téměř neovladatelný. Co nejrychleji si najděte místo pro nouzové přistání.
Key.English: When you lose your tail rotor, your helicopter will become very hard to fly and it may spin out of control. Find a safe area to land as quickly as you can.
Key.Japanese: When you lose your tail rotor, your helicopter will become very hard to fly and it may spin out of control. Find a safe area to land as quickly as you can.

Key.Original: Advanced helicopters can have so-called Radar Warning Receivers, which will alert you to an enemy weapons locks, thus allowing you to respond appropriately.
Key.Chinese: Advanced helicopters can have so-called Radar Warning Receivers, which will alert you to an enemy weapons locks, thus allowing you to respond appropriately.
Key.French: Les hélicoptères avancés peuvent avoir un Détecteur de verrouillage, qui vous alerte lorsque qu'un ennemi tente de verrouiller votre appareil, vous permettant ainsi de réagir de façon appropriée.
Key.Spanish: Los helicópteros avanzados pueden tener un radar de alerta de fijación, que te alertará cuando un arma enemiga te fije, permitiéndote responder apropiadamente.
Key.Italian: Gli elicotteri più avanzati dispongono del cosiddetto radar di allerta, che ti avviserà se sei tenuto sotto tiro da armi nemiche, e ti permetterà di rispondere nella maniera più appropriata.
Key.Hungarian: Advanced helicopters can have so-called Radar Warning Receivers, which will alert you to an enemy weapons locks, thus allowing you to respond appropriately.
Key.Polish: Nowoczesne śmigłowce posiadają wykrywacze radaru, informujące o namierzeniu przez przeciwnika, dzięki czemu można odpowiednio zareagować.
Key.Russian: Современные вертолеты могут быть оснащены т.н. системой предупреждения об облучении, которая оповестит вас о сопровождении вооружением противника, позволяя принять соответствующие меры противодействия.
Key.German: Moderne Hubschrauber verfügen über sogenannte Radarwarnsysteme, die Sie darüber informieren, wenn eine feindliche Waffe Sie als Ziel erfasst hat, damit Sie entsprechend reagieren können.
Key.Czech: Nejlepší vrtulníky mají přijímače radarového varování, které vám oznámí zaměření nepřátelskou zbraní a umožní vám na ně reagovat.
Key.English: Advanced helicopters can have so-called Radar Warning Receivers, which will alert you to an enemy weapons locks, thus allowing you to respond appropriately.
Key.Japanese: Advanced helicopters can have so-called Radar Warning Receivers, which will alert you to an enemy weapons locks, thus allowing you to respond appropriately.

Key.Original: Losing your engine means you'll have to use auto-rotation in order to land safely. Immediately descend to keep your rotors spinning, but limit forward speed. At the last moment flare up the aircraft and increase thrust. Timing this correctly is essential.
Key.Chinese: Losing your engine means you'll have to use auto-rotation in order to land safely. Immediately descend to keep your rotors spinning, but limit forward speed. At the last moment flare up the aircraft and increase thrust. Timing this correctly is essential.
Key.French: Perdre votre moteur signifie que vous devrez utiliser l'auto-rotation pour atterrir en toute sécurité. Redescendez immédiatement pour garder la rotation de vos rotors, mais limitez la vitesse d'avancement. Au dernier moment, redressez votre appareil et augmentez la poussée. Le timing est essentiel.
Key.Spanish: Perder los motores significa que tendrás que usar la auto rotación para aterrizar con seguridad. Desciende inmediatamente para mantener tus rotores girando, pero avanza con velocidad limitada. En el último momento, levanta la nave e incrementa el empuje. Hacerlo en el momento justo es esencial.
Key.Italian: Se il motore è fuori uso, dovrai usare l'autorotazione per atterrare sano e salvo. Abbassati immediatamente per mantenere le eliche in movimento ma avanza a velocità moderata. All'ultimo minuto, fai alzare il velivolo ed aumenta la spinta. Un buon tempismo è essenziale!
Key.Hungarian: Losing your engine means you'll have to use auto-rotation in order to land safely. Immediately descend to keep your rotors spinning, but limit forward speed. At the last moment flare up the aircraft and increase thrust. Timing this correctly is essential.
Key.Polish: Po utracie silnika musisz wylądować, używając zjawiska autorotacji. Natychmiast zacznij zniżanie, aby wirniki dalej się obracały, ale zmniejsz prędkość lotu. W ostatniej chwili podciągnij nos i zwiększ ciąg. W tym manewrze najważniejsze jest odpowiednie wyczucie czasu.
Key.Russian: При потере двигателя, вам придется использовать авторотацию несущего винта для совершения безопасной посадки. Немедленно снижайтесь для продолжения вращения винтов, но ограничьте скорость горизонтального полета. Перед касанием поверхности переведите машину в набор и увеличьте тягу. Крайне важной является строгая синхронизация этих действий.
Key.German: Wenn das Triebwerk ausfällt, müssen Sie Autorotation einsetzen, um sicher zu landen. Gehen Sie sofort tiefer, damit Ihre Rotoren sich weiter drehen, aber drosseln Sie dabei die Vorwärtsgeschwindigkeit. Im letzten Moment ziehen Sie die Maschine kurz hoch und geben Schub. Das richtige Timing ist dabei alles.
Key.Czech: Pokud přijdete o motor, budete muset použít pro bezpečné přistání samorotaci. Okamžitě začněte klesat, abyste udrželi rotor v chodu, ale neleťte vpřed. Na poslední chvíli zvedněte předek a zvyšte tah motoru. Načasování je naprosto zásadní.
Key.English: Losing your engine means you'll have to use auto-rotation in order to land safely. Immediately descend to keep your rotors spinning, but limit forward speed. At the last moment flare up the aircraft and increase thrust. Timing this correctly is essential.
Key.Japanese: Losing your engine means you'll have to use auto-rotation in order to land safely. Immediately descend to keep your rotors spinning, but limit forward speed. At the last moment flare up the aircraft and increase thrust. Timing this correctly is essential.

Key.Original: A good Landing Zone is clear of objects which may damage your helicopter. Preferably, you should land on level terrain.
Key.Chinese: A good Landing Zone is clear of objects which may damage your helicopter. Preferably, you should land on level terrain.
Key.French: Une bonne zone d'atterrissage est une zone où il n'y a pas d'objet qui puisse endommager votre hélicoptère. De préférence, vous devriez atterrir sur un terrain plat.
Key.Spanish: Una buena zona de aterrizaje está libre de objetos que puedan dañar tu helicóptero. Preferiblemente, deberías aterrizar en suelo llano.
Key.Italian: Una zona di atterraggio si considera buona quando è priva di oggetti che possano danneggiare il tuo elicottero. Dovresti atterrare preferibilmente su un terreno piano.
Key.Hungarian: A good Landing Zone is clear of objects which may damage your helicopter. Preferably, you should land on level terrain.
Key.Polish: W dobrej strefie lądowania nie ma obiektów, które mogłyby spowodować uszkodzenie śmigłowca. Najlepiej lądować na płaskim terenie.
Key.Russian: Хорошая посадочная площадка должна быть свободна от объектов, которые могут повредить ваш вертолет. Предпочтительно производить посадку на ровной поверхности.
Key.German: Eine gute Landezone ist frei von Objekten, die Ihren Hubschrauber beschädigen könnten. Sie sollten vorzugsweise auf ebenem Gelände landen.
Key.Czech: Dobrá přistávací plocha na sobě nemá žádné objekty, které by mohly poškodit vrtulník. Ideální je přistávat na rovině.
Key.English: A good Landing Zone is clear of objects which may damage your helicopter. Preferably, you should land on level terrain.
Key.Japanese: A good Landing Zone is clear of objects which may damage your helicopter. Preferably, you should land on level terrain.

Key.Original: Aircraft may have been equipped with countermeasures, such as flares and chaff, to confuse incoming missiles.
Key.Chinese: Aircraft may have been equipped with countermeasures, such as flares and chaff, to confuse incoming missiles.
Key.French: Les aéronefs peuvent avoir été équipés de contre-mesures, tels que des leurres et des paillettes de brouillage, afin de confondre les missiles ennemis.
Key.Spanish: Las aeronaves pueden estar equipadas con contramedidas, como bengalas o señuelos, para confundir a los misiles.
Key.Italian: Il velivolo può avere in dotazione delle contromisure, come razzi illuminanti e antiradar per confondere i missili in arrivo.
Key.Hungarian: Aircraft may have been equipped with countermeasures, such as flares and chaff, to confuse incoming missiles.
Key.Polish: Pojazdy latające mogą posiadać środki zakłócania, takie jak flary i paski folii, służące do zmylenia nadlatujących pocisków.
Key.Russian: Летательные аппараты могут быть оснащены средствами для предотвращения захвата головками самонаведения зенитных управляемых ракет, такими как ложные тепловые цели и дипольные отражатели.
Key.German: Manche Luftfahrzeuge sind mit Gegenmaßnahmen ausgerüstet, wie etwa Leuchtgeschosse und Radartäuschkörper, um anfliegende Raketen abzulenken.
Key.Czech: Letoun může být vybaven protiopatřeními, jako jsou světlice a podobně, které mohou narušit navádění střel.
Key.English: Aircraft may have been equipped with countermeasures, such as flares and chaff, to confuse incoming missiles.
Key.Japanese: Aircraft may have been equipped with countermeasures, such as flares and chaff, to confuse incoming missiles.

Key.Original: A number of airplanes are capable of Vertical Take-Off and Landing (VTOL), either fully or they can take off from short runways and land vertically. These airplanes can transition to and from forward flight in mid-air.
Key.Chinese: A number of airplanes are capable of Vertical Take-Off and Landing (VTOL), either fully or they can take off from short runways and land vertically. These airplanes can transition to and from forward flight in mid-air.
Key.French: Un certain nombre d'avions sont capables d'exécuter un Décollage et Atterrissage Vertical (ADAV). D'autres peuvent décoller sur des pistes courtes et atterrir verticalement. Ces avions peuvent passer en vol vers l'avant dans les airs et vice versa.
Key.Spanish: Algunas aeronaves pueden despegar y aterrizar verticalmente (Vertical Take-Off and Landing, VTOL), ya sea total o despegar en pequeñas pistas y aterrizar verticalmente. Estos aviónes pueden cambiar a y desde el modo normal en mitad del vuelo.
Key.Italian: Diversi velivoli sono in grado di effettuare un decollo e un atterraggio verticale (Vertical Take-Off and Landing - VTOL), Esso può essere completo o compiuto grazie a piccole piste per atterrare verticalmente. Questi aerei possono alternare, mentre sono già a mezz'aria, questa modalità di volo a quella normale.
Key.Hungarian: A number of airplanes are capable of Vertical Take-Off and Landing (VTOL), either fully or they can take off from short runways and land vertically. These airplanes can transition to and from forward flight in mid-air.
Key.Polish: Niektóre samoloty mogą startować i lądować pionowo, mogą też startować z krótkich pasów i lądować pionowo. Samoloty te potrafią w powietrzu przechodzić do lotu poziomego lub zawisać.
Key.Russian: Часть летательных аппаратов способна к выполнению вертикального взлета и посадки (ВВП), полного или же с укороченным взлетом. Эти ЛА могут переводиться из режима вертикального полета в горизонтальный прямо в воздухе.
Key.German: Einige Flugzeuge können vertikal starten und landen (Vertical Take-Off and Landing – VTOL), oder sie starten von kurzen Startbahnen und landen nur vertikal. Diese Flugzeuge können in der Luft in den und aus dem Vorwärtsflug wechseln.
Key.Czech: Některé letouny jsou schopny tzv. vertikálního startu (VTOL), a to buď zcela nebo mohou odstartovat z krátké runwaye a přistát vertikálně. Tyto letouny mohou přecházet na dopředný let ve vzduchu.
Key.English: A number of airplanes are capable of Vertical Take-Off and Landing (VTOL), either fully or they can take off from short runways and land vertically. These airplanes can transition to and from forward flight in mid-air.
Key.Japanese: A number of airplanes are capable of Vertical Take-Off and Landing (VTOL), either fully or they can take off from short runways and land vertically. These airplanes can transition to and from forward flight in mid-air.

Key.Original: Enabling the autopilot in airplanes will cause them to land on the nearest runway.
Key.Chinese: Enabling the autopilot in airplanes will cause them to land on the nearest runway.
Key.French: L'activation du pilote automatique dans les avions les amènera à se poser sur la piste la plus proche.
Key.Spanish: Habilitar el piloto automático en aviónes, hará que aterricen en la pista más próxima.
Key.Italian: L'attivazione del pilota automatico farà atterrare il velivolo sulla pista di atterraggio più vicina.
Key.Hungarian: Enabling the autopilot in airplanes will cause them to land on the nearest runway.
Key.Polish: Włączenie autopilota spowoduje, że maszyna wyląduje na najbliższym pasie lotniska.
Key.Russian: Включение автопилота в самолете приведет к выполнению посадки на ближайшей ВПП.
Key.German: Wenn Sie in einem Flugzeug den Autopilot aktivieren, landet es auf der nächstgelegenen Landebahn.
Key.Czech: Zapnutí autopliota v letounu vás dovede na nejbližší letiště, kde přistanete.
Key.English: Enabling the autopilot in airplanes will cause them to land on the nearest runway.
Key.Japanese: Enabling the autopilot in airplanes will cause them to land on the nearest runway.

Key.Original: When you feel there is nothing you can do to avert crashing your airplane, try to move away from locations which would cause a lot of casualties and eject.
Key.Chinese: When you feel there is nothing you can do to avert crashing your airplane, try to move away from locations which would cause a lot of casualties and eject.
Key.French: Lorsque vous sentez qu'il n'y a rien que vous puissiez faire pour éviter le crash de votre avion, essayez de vous déplacer loin des zones qui causeraient beaucoup de victimes et éjectez-vous.
Key.Spanish: Cuando sientas que no hay nada que puedas hacer para evitar estrellarte, intenta alejarte de localizaciones donde causarías muchas bajas y eyéctate.
Key.Italian: Quando ti rendi conto che non c'è più nulla da fare per evitare lo schianto, prova ad allontanarti da luoghi ove causeresti ingenti danni e lanciati.
Key.Hungarian: When you feel there is nothing you can do to avert crashing your airplane, try to move away from locations which would cause a lot of casualties and eject.
Key.Polish: Kiedy uznasz, że nie zdołasz uniknąć rozbicia samolotu, postaraj się oddalić od miejsc, w których może to spowodować duże straty, i katapultuj się.
Key.Russian: Если вы считаете, что падение вашего летательного аппарата неизбежно, постарайтесь уйти из зоны скопления дружественных сил и произвести катапультирование.
Key.German: Wenn Sie glauben, den Absturz Ihres Flugzeugs nicht mehr verhindern zu können, versuchen Sie, von Orten wegzukommen, bei denen es große Verluste geben würde, und springen Sie ab.
Key.Czech: Když máte pocit, že vaše letadlo před pádem už nic nezachrání, snažte se je navést na místo, kde nezpůsobí žádné ztráty a vyskočte.
Key.English: When you feel there is nothing you can do to avert crashing your airplane, try to move away from locations which would cause a lot of casualties and eject.
Key.Japanese: When you feel there is nothing you can do to avert crashing your airplane, try to move away from locations which would cause a lot of casualties and eject.

Key.Original: Various airplanes carry laser-guided munitions. Cooperate with ground forces who can laser-designate targets, allowing you to perform precision strikes.
Key.Chinese: Various airplanes carry laser-guided munitions. Cooperate with ground forces who can laser-designate targets, allowing you to perform precision strikes.
Key.French: Plusieurs avions transportent des munitions à guidage laser. Coopérer avec les forces au sol qui peuvent désigner des cibles au laser, vous permettant d'effectuer des frappes de précision.
Key.Spanish: Varios aviónes portan munición guiada por láser. Coopera con las fuerzas de tierra que pueden designar objetivos por láser, permitiéndote golpear con precisión.
Key.Italian: Diversi velivoli possiedono munizioni con puntamento laser. Coopera con le forze al suolo lequali possono designarti bersagli grazie al laser, permettendoti di effettuare bombardamenti di precisione.
Key.Hungarian: Various airplanes carry laser-guided munitions. Cooperate with ground forces who can laser-designate targets, allowing you to perform precision strikes.
Key.Polish: Niektóre samoloty przenoszą uzbrojenie naprowadzane laserowo. Współpracuj z siłami lądowymi, które mogą oświetlać cele laserem, umożliwiając precyzyjne bombardowanie.
Key.Russian: Различные летательные аппараты оснащены управляемыми боеприпасами с корректировкой по лазерному лучу. Координируйте ваши действия с наземными авианаводчиками для нанесения точечных ударов.
Key.German: Verschiedene Flugzeuge verfügen über lasergelenkte Munition. Kooperieren Sie mit Bodentruppen, die Ziele durch Laser markieren können, wodurch Sie präzise Angriffe fliegen können.
Key.Czech: Mnoho letounů má ve výzbroji laserem naváděnou munici. Spolupracujte s pozemními jednotkami, které pro vás mohou označovat cíle a vy tak budete moci ničit cíle velice přesně.
Key.English: Various airplanes carry laser-guided munitions. Cooperate with ground forces who can laser-designate targets, allowing you to perform precision strikes.
Key.Japanese: Various airplanes carry laser-guided munitions. Cooperate with ground forces who can laser-designate targets, allowing you to perform precision strikes.

Key.Original: The use of an airplane's flaps can provide you improved lift at low speeds.
Key.Chinese: The use of an airplane's flaps can provide you improved lift at low speeds.
Key.French: L'utilisation des volets d'un avion peut vous aider à gagner rapidement de l'altitude à basse vitesse.
Key.Spanish: El uso de los flaps de tu avión puede proporcionarte una mejor elevación a bajas velocidades.
Key.Italian: L'uso dell'ipersostentatore del velivolo può procurare un incremento della portanza a velocità ridotte.
Key.Hungarian: The use of an airplane's flaps can provide you improved lift at low speeds.
Key.Polish: Wysuwając klapy samolotu, możesz zwiększyć jego siłę nośną przy małej prędkości.
Key.Russian: Применение механизации крыла (закрылков) увеличивает подъемную силу на малых скоростях.
Key.German: Der Einsatz der Klappen eines Flugzeugs sorgt bei niedriger Geschwindigkeit für verbesserten Auftrieb.
Key.Czech: Použití klapek letadla vám může pomoci zvýšit vztlak při nižších rychlostech.
Key.English: The use of an airplane's flaps can provide you improved lift at low speeds.
Key.Japanese: The use of an airplane's flaps can provide you improved lift at low speeds.

Key.Original: Infra-Red strobes can only be seen using night vision equipment and allow gunners to precisely target marked locations.
Key.Chinese: Infra-Red strobes can only be seen using night vision equipment and allow gunners to precisely target marked locations.
Key.French: Les stroboscopes infra-rouge ne peuvent être vus qu'en utilisant l'équipement de vision nocturne et permettent aux tireurs de cibler précisément les emplacements marqués.
Key.Spanish: Los flashes infrarrojos solo pueden ser vistos usando la visión nocturna y permiten a los artilleros hacer blancos precisos en las localizaciones marcadas.
Key.Italian: Gli infrarossi possono essere visti usando un equipaggiamento a visione notturna e permettono ai soldati di puntare con precisione le aree designate.
Key.Hungarian: Infra-Red strobes can only be seen using night vision equipment and allow gunners to precisely target marked locations.
Key.Polish: Sygnalizatory podczerwone widać tylko przez noktowizory. Dzięki temu strzelcy mogą precyzyjnie celować w wyznaczone miejsca.
Key.Russian: Инфракрасные стробоскопические источники света видны только ч/з приборы ночного видения, и позволяют стрелкам осуществлять точное прицеливание на обозначенную позицию.
Key.German: Infrarot-Blitzleuchten können nur mit Nachtsichtgeräten ausgemacht werden und ermöglichen es Schützen, markierte Ziele präzise zu erfassen.
Key.Czech: Infračervené zářiče jsou vidět pouze s přístroji pro noční vidění a je možno je využít na navádění palby na konkrétní místo.
Key.English: Infra-Red strobes can only be seen using night vision equipment and allow gunners to precisely target marked locations.
Key.Japanese: Infra-Red strobes can only be seen using night vision equipment and allow gunners to precisely target marked locations.

Key.Original: Throwable explosives are good for engaging targets behind cover, or those which are grouped together.
Key.Chinese: Throwable explosives are good for engaging targets behind cover, or those which are grouped together.
Key.French: Les grenades sont efficaces pour engager des cibles à couvert ou celles qui sont regroupées.
Key.Spanish: Los explosivos arrojadizos son buenos para atacar objetivos tras coberturas, o aquellos que se encuentran juntos.
Key.Italian: Gli esplosivi lanciabili sono ottimi per attaccare bersagli coperti o bersagli in gruppo.
Key.Hungarian: Throwable explosives are good for engaging targets behind cover, or those which are grouped together.
Key.Polish: Rzucane ładunki wybuchowe świetnie nadają się do rażenia celów znajdujących się za osłoną lub blisko siebie.
Key.Russian: Гранаты эффективны для поражения целей за укрытием или групповых целей.
Key.German: Sprengkörper, die geworfen werden, sind gut geeignet, um gegen Ziele hinter einer Deckung oder zusammenstehende Gruppen vorzugehen.
Key.Czech: Výbušniny, které je možno vrhat, jsou účinné proti cílům v krytu, nejlépe skupinám pěchoty.
Key.English: Throwable explosives are good for engaging targets behind cover, or those which are grouped together.
Key.Japanese: Throwable explosives are good for engaging targets behind cover, or those which are grouped together.

Key.Original: Explosives placed on the ground can often be deactivated and picked back up.
Key.Chinese: Explosives placed on the ground can often be deactivated and picked back up.
Key.French: Les explosifs placés sur le sol peuvent souvent être désactivés et réutilisés à vos propres fins.
Key.Spanish: Los explosivos situados en el suelo a menudo pueden ser desactivados y recogidos.
Key.Italian: Gli esplosivi piazzati a terra possono essere disattivati e ripresi.
Key.Hungarian: Explosives placed on the ground can often be deactivated and picked back up.
Key.Polish: Często można rozbroić i podnieść ładunki wybuchowe umieszczone na ziemi.
Key.Russian: Установленная на земле взрывчатка, как правило, может быть обезврежена и подобрана.
Key.German: Auf dem Boden platzierte Sprengkörper lassen sich oftmals entschärfen und wieder aufnehmen.
Key.Czech: Výbušniny, umisťované na zem, mohou být často zneškodněny tím, že je vezmete.
Key.English: Explosives placed on the ground can often be deactivated and picked back up.
Key.Japanese: Explosives placed on the ground can often be deactivated and picked back up.

Key.Original: There is a maximum range from which you can detonate explosives using a trigger.
Key.Chinese: There is a maximum range from which you can detonate explosives using a trigger.
Key.French: Il y a une portée maximale à partir de laquelle vous pouvez faire détoner des explosifs à l'aide d'un détonateur.
Key.Spanish: Hay una distancia máxima desde la cual puedes detonar explosivos usando un disparador.
Key.Italian: Esiste un raggio d'azione massimo nel quale puoi far detonare i tuoi esplosivi a innesco.
Key.Hungarian: There is a maximum range from which you can detonate explosives using a trigger.
Key.Polish: Zdalny detonator może wysadzać ładunki tylko z pewnej odległości.
Key.Russian: Радиус действия радиодетонатора заряда ВВ ограничен.
Key.German: Es gibt eine Maximalreichweite, bis zu der ein Zünder für die Detonation von Sprengkörpern funktioniert.
Key.Czech: Dálkově odpálit výbušniny můžete pouze do určité vzdálenosti.
Key.English: There is a maximum range from which you can detonate explosives using a trigger.
Key.Japanese: There is a maximum range from which you can detonate explosives using a trigger.

Key.Original: The longer you wait to release a throw, the more power you use and thus the further you throw.
Key.Chinese: The longer you wait to release a throw, the more power you use and thus the further you throw.
Key.French: Plus vous attendez avant de lancer, plus le tir sera puissant et ira loin.
Key.Spanish: Cuanto más esperes para lanzar, más energía usas y, por tanto, más lejos llegarás con tu lanzamiento.
Key.Italian: Quanto più attendi prima di effettuare il lancio, tanta più forza verrà impiegata, e tanto più lontano tirerai.
Key.Hungarian: The longer you wait to release a throw, the more power you use and thus the further you throw.
Key.Polish: Im bardziej opóźnisz rzut, tym więcej siły w niego włożysz i dalej rzucisz trzymanym przedmiotem.
Key.Russian: Чем дольше вы задерживаете бросок, тем сильнее он получается, и тем дальше летит граната.
Key.German: Je länger Sie warten, bis Sie einen Wurf loslassen, desto mehr Kraft legen Sie hinein und desto weiter werfen Sie auch.
Key.Czech: Čím déle budete držet tlačítko pro vržení granátu, tím více síly do vrhu vložíte a granát poletí dále.
Key.English: The longer you wait to release a throw, the more power you use and thus the further you throw.
Key.Japanese: The longer you wait to release a throw, the more power you use and thus the further you throw.

Key.Original: At longer ranges, it is often wise to use a semi-automatic fire mode. This way, you can recover from the rifle's recoil effect before your next shot.
Key.Chinese: At longer ranges, it is often wise to use a semi-automatic fire mode. This way, you can recover from the rifle's recoil effect before your next shot.
Key.French: À de plus grandes distances, il est souvent judicieux d'utiliser un mode de tir semi-automatique. De cette façon, vous pouvez récupérer de l'effet de recul du fusil avant votre prochain coup.
Key.Spanish: A larga distancia es mejor usar el modo de fuego semi automático. De esta forma, puedes recuperarte de los efectos del retroceso antes de tu próximo disparo.
Key.Italian: Sulle lunghe distanze è preferibile usare una modalità di fuoco semi-automatica: in questo modo avrai tempo di riprenderti dall'effetto rinculo prima dello sparo successivo.
Key.Hungarian: At longer ranges, it is often wise to use a semi-automatic fire mode. This way, you can recover from the rifle's recoil effect before your next shot.
Key.Polish: Na większych dystansach warto używać ognia samopowtarzalnego. Dzięki temu masz czas na ustabilizowanie broni przed kolejnym strzałem.
Key.Russian: На дальних дистанциях рекомендуется применять режим огня одиночными выстрелами. Таким образом вам будет проще удерживать прицельную линию от сбивания отдачей выстрела.
Key.German: Auf größere Entfernungen ist oftmals der halbautomatische Feuermodus empfehlenswert. Dadurch können Sie vor Ihrem nächsten Schuss den Rückstoßeffekt der Waffe abwarten.
Key.Czech: Na delší vzdálenosti je lepší používat poloautomatický režim střelby. Lépe se vám tak bude kompenzovat zpětný ráz zbraně.
Key.English: At longer ranges, it is often wise to use a semi-automatic fire mode. This way, you can recover from the rifle's recoil effect before your next shot.
Key.Japanese: At longer ranges, it is often wise to use a semi-automatic fire mode. This way, you can recover from the rifle's recoil effect before your next shot.

Key.Original: Some rifles have laser pointer attachments that are only visible using night vision equipment. They can be used to aim and to point out things on the battlefield to forces equipped with night vision equipment.
Key.Chinese: Some rifles have laser pointer attachments that are only visible using night vision equipment. They can be used to aim and to point out things on the battlefield to forces equipped with night vision equipment.
Key.French: Certains fusils ont des pointeurs laser qui ne sont visibles qu'en utilisant l'équipement de vision nocturne. Ils peuvent être utilisés pour viser ou marquer des choses sur le champ de bataille pour des forces équipées de matériel de vision nocturne.
Key.Spanish: Algunos rifles tienen un puntero láser que es visible solo usando equipo de visión nocturna. Pueden ser usados para apuntar y señalar cosas en el campo de batalla para las fuerzas equipadas con visión nocturna.
Key.Italian: Alcuni fucili hanno puntatori laser, visibili solo utilizzando l'equipaggiamento di visione notturna. Possono essere usati per mirare o indicare oggetti nel campo di battaglia alle unità provviste dell'equipaggiamento di visione notturna.
Key.Hungarian: Some rifles have laser pointer attachments that are only visible using night vision equipment. They can be used to aim and to point out things on the battlefield to forces equipped with night vision equipment.
Key.Polish: Niektóre karabiny mają celowniki laserowe, których promienie są widoczne tylko przez noktowizory. Mogą one służyć do celowania i wskazywania obiektów na polu bitwy.
Key.Russian: Некоторое стрелковое оружие оснащено лазерными целеуказателями, чьи лучи видны только ч/з приборы ночного видения. Они могут применяться для прицеливания и целеуказания на местности для подразделений, оснащенных ПНВ.
Key.German: Einige Gewehre sind mit Laserpointer-Aufsätzen ausgerüstet, die nur mit Nachtsichtgeräten ausgemacht werden können. Man kann damit zielen und Truppen mit Nachtsichtgeräten auf Objekte auf dem Schlachtfeld hinweisen.
Key.Czech: Některé pušky mají laserové zaměřovače, které jsou viditelné pouze s vybavením pro noční vidění. Je možno je využít k zaměřování nebo ukazování věcí na bojišti, které rozpoznají pouze jednotky s nočním viděním.
Key.English: Some rifles have laser pointer attachments that are only visible using night vision equipment. They can be used to aim and to point out things on the battlefield to forces equipped with night vision equipment.
Key.Japanese: Some rifles have laser pointer attachments that are only visible using night vision equipment. They can be used to aim and to point out things on the battlefield to forces equipped with night vision equipment.
