Key.Original: Flashlights mounted to rifles can obviously be used to navigate dark environments, but also to temporarily blind enemies.
Key.Chinese: Flashlights mounted to rifles can obviously be used to navigate dark environments, but also to temporarily blind enemies.
Key.French: Une lampe tactique montée sur un fusil peut évidemment être utilisée pour naviguer dans des environnements sombres, mais aussi pour aveugler temporairement un ennemi.
Key.Spanish: Las linternas montadas en los rifles pueden obviamente ser usadas para ver en entornos oscuros, pero también para cegar temporalmente a los enemigos.
Key.Italian: Le torce elettriche montate sui fucili possono essere usate sia per muoversi in ambienti oscuri, sia per accecare temporaneamente il nemico.
Key.Hungarian: Flashlights mounted to rifles can obviously be used to navigate dark environments, but also to temporarily blind enemies.
Key.Polish: Latarki zamontowane na karabinach ułatwiają poruszanie się w ciemności, mogą też chwilowo oślepić przeciwnika.
Key.Russian: Прикрепленные на стрелковое оружие тактические фонари могут применяться для ориентировки в условиях темноты, а также для временного ослепления противника.
Key.German: Auf Gewehre montierte Taschenlampen sind geeignet, um sich in dunkler Umgebung zurechtzufinden, aber auch, um Feinde vorübergehend zu blenden.
Key.Czech: Baterka na hlavni pušky se samozřejmě používá jak pro orientaci, tak i pro krátkodobé oslepení nepřítele.
Key.English: Flashlights mounted to rifles can obviously be used to navigate dark environments, but also to temporarily blind enemies.
Key.Japanese: Flashlights mounted to rifles can obviously be used to navigate dark environments, but also to temporarily blind enemies.

Key.Polish: Twoja drużyna nie zdołała zdobyć wymaganej ilości punktów.
Key.Russian: Ваша команда не смогла достичь требуемого количества очков.
Key.German: Ihr Team hat die benötigte Punktezahl nicht erreicht.

Key.Original: The %1 contains many different areas. This challenge brings you all together at one of them. Exploring %1 together can be a lot of fun!
Key.Chinese: The %1 contains many different areas. This challenge brings you all together at one of them. Exploring %1 together can be a lot of fun!
Key.French: %1 contient plusieurs zones différentes. Ce défi vous amène tous à l'un d'eux. Faire l'exploration ensemble peut être amusant !
Key.Spanish: El %1 contiene muchas áreas diferentes. Este desafío os llevará a todos a una de ellas. ¡Explorar %1 juntos puede ser muy divertido!
Key.Italian: %1 : contiene diverse aree. Questa sfida vi porterà tutti in una di queste zone. Esplorare %1 insieme sarà molto divertente!
Key.Hungarian: The %1 contains many different areas. This challenge brings you all together at one of them. Exploring %1 together can be a lot of fun!
Key.Polish: %1 składa się z różnych obszarów. W tym wyzwaniu wszyscy znajdziecie się w jednym z nich. Wspólna eksploracja %1 może być świetną zabawą!
Key.Russian: %1 содержит множество различных зон. Это задание сводит вас всех вместе на одной из них. Совместное исследование %1 может быть очень занятным!
Key.German: %1 enthält viele verschiedene Gebiete. Diese Herausforderung bringt Sie alle zusammen zu einem dieser Gebiete. %1 gemeinsam zu erkunden, kann sehr viel Spaß machen!
Key.Czech: %1 obsahuje mnoho různých oblastí. Tato výzva vás svede všechny dohromady do jedné z nich. Společný průzkum %1 bude velká zábava!
Key.English: The %1 contains many different areas. This challenge brings you all together at one of them. Exploring %1 together can be a lot of fun!
Key.Japanese: The %1 contains many different areas. This challenge brings you all together at one of them. Exploring %1 together can be a lot of fun!

Key.Original: You've racked up sufficient airtime.
Key.Chinese: You've racked up sufficient airtime.
Key.French: Vous avez accumulé suffisamment de temps de vol.
Key.Spanish: Has acumulado suficiente tiempo en el aire.
Key.Italian: Hai accumulato un tempo in volo sufficiente.
Key.Hungarian: You've racked up sufficient airtime.
Key.German: Sie haben genug Zeit in der Luft verbracht.

Key.Original: There are many situations where you don't want to slow down your vehicle, such as while driving a convoy through an enemy area. A moving target is a harder target.
Key.Chinese: There are many situations where you don't want to slow down your vehicle, such as while driving a convoy through an enemy area. A moving target is a harder target.
Key.French: Il existe de nombreuses situations où vous ne voulez pas ralentir votre véhicule, comme au volant d'un convoi dans une zone ennemie. Une cible en mouvement est une cible plus difficile à toucher.
Key.Spanish: Habrá situaciones en las que no quieras frenar tu vehículo, como cuando conduces a través de un área enemiga. Un objetivo en movimiento es más difícil de alcanzar.
Key.Italian: Ti troverai in situazioni in cui non dovrai rallentare il tuo veicolo, per esempio mentre guidi un convoglio in territorio nemico. Un bersaglio mobile è più difficile da colpire.
Key.Hungarian: There are many situations where you don't want to slow down your vehicle, such as while driving a convoy through an enemy area. A moving target is a harder target.
Key.Polish: W wielu sytuacjach nie należy zmniejszać prędkości pojazdu, na przykład jadąc w konwoju przez teren wroga. Ruchomy cel jest trudniejszy do trafienia.
Key.Russian: Во многих ситуациях лучше не снижать скорость вашей единицы техники, например при проводке конвоя ч/з враждебную территорию. Движущуюся мишень сложнее поразить.
Key.German: In vielen Situationen wollen Sie das Tempo Ihres Fahrzeugs nichts drosseln, etwa wenn Sie mit einem Konvoi durch feindliches Gebiet fahren. Ein bewegliches Ziel ist schwerer zu treffen.
Key.Czech: V mnoha situacích je dobré nezpomalovat, a to zejména na území nepřítele. Pohyblivý cíl se hůře zaměřuje.
Key.English: There are many situations where you don't want to slow down your vehicle, such as while driving a convoy through an enemy area. A moving target is a harder target.
Key.Japanese: There are many situations where you don't want to slow down your vehicle, such as while driving a convoy through an enemy area. A moving target is a harder target.

Key.Original: There are plenty of jumps at ARMEX, such as ramps and mounts, which you can use to get your vehicle temporarily airborne.
Key.Chinese: There are plenty of jumps at ARMEX, such as ramps and mounts, which you can use to get your vehicle temporarily airborne.
Key.French: Il y a beaucoup de sauts possibles à ARMEX, tels que les rampes et les bosses. Vous pouvez les utiliser pour faire décoller temporairement votre véhicule dans les airs.
Key.Spanish: Hay un montón de lugares en ARMEX, como rampas y soportes, que puedes usar para poner temporalmente tu vehículo en el aire.
Key.Italian: Nell'ARMEX troverai diversi luoghi come rampe o piattaforme di lancio che potrai usare per far volare temporaneamente il tuo veicolo.
Key.Hungarian: There are plenty of jumps at ARMEX, such as ramps and mounts, which you can use to get your vehicle temporarily airborne.
Key.Polish: W ARMEX można wykonywać skoki z ramp lub wzniesień, dzięki czemu pojazd przez jakiś czas znajduje się w powietrzu.
Key.Russian: В ARMEX много трамплинов, таких как рампы и холмы, которые вы можете использовать для совершения прыжков на технике.
Key.German: Auf der ARMEX gibt es viele Sprünge über Rampen und Hügel, mit denen Sie Ihr Fahrzeug kurzzeitig in die Luft bringen können.
Key.Czech: V ARMEX je celá řada překážek: rampy, nájezdy a podobně, které vozidlo dostanou na chvíli do vzduchu.
Key.English: There are plenty of jumps at ARMEX, such as ramps and mounts, which you can use to get your vehicle temporarily airborne.
Key.Japanese: There are plenty of jumps at ARMEX, such as ramps and mounts, which you can use to get your vehicle temporarily airborne.

Key.Spanish: Mantener %1 kph.
Key.Italian: Mantieni %1 kilometri orari.
Key.Hungarian: Maintain %1 kmph.
Key.German: Halten Sie %1 km/h!
Key.English: Maintain %1 kmph.
Key.Japanese: Maintain %1 kmph.

Key.Original: Night
Key.Chinese: Night
Key.French: Nuit
Key.Spanish: Noche
Key.Italian: Notte
Key.Hungarian: Night
Key.German: Nacht
Key.English: Night
Key.Japanese: Night

Key.Original: Any task which may be assigned to you can become harder to complete at night. This is a bonus for completing a challenge in those limiting conditions.
Key.Chinese: Any task which may be assigned to you can become harder to complete at night. This is a bonus for completing a challenge in those limiting conditions.
Key.French: Toute tâche qui pourrait vous être confiée peut devenir plus difficile à accomplir la nuit. Il s'agit d'un bonus pour remplir un défi dans ces conditions plus difficiles.
Key.Spanish: Cualquier tarea que se te asigne puede ser más difícil de completar de noche. Esto es un bono por completar un desafío en esas limitantes condiciones.
Key.Italian: Qualsiasi missione che ti può essere assegnata può diventare più difficile da portare a termine durante la notte. Ti verrà dato un bonus per completare una sfida in questa condizione di svantaggio.
Key.Hungarian: Any task which may be assigned to you can become harder to complete at night. This is a bonus for completing a challenge in those limiting conditions.
Key.Polish: Każde zlecone zadanie może być trudniejsze do wykonania nocą. Za realizację zadania w nocy otrzymasz premię.
Key.Russian: Любая поставленная вам задача может стать сложнее в ночных условиях. Выполнение задания в такой обстановке поощряется дополнительно.
Key.German: Jede Aufgabe, die Ihnen zugewiesen wird, kann bei Nacht um einiges schwieriger zu erledigen sein. Diesen Bonus erhalten Sie, wenn Sie eine Herausforderung unter diesen erschwerten Bedingungen abschließen.
Key.Czech: Jakýkoli přidělený úkol může být v noci daleko obtížnější. Toto je bonus za splnění výzvy v takto limitovaných podmínkách.
Key.English: Any task which may be assigned to you can become harder to complete at night. This is a bonus for completing a challenge in those limiting conditions.
Key.Japanese: Any task which may be assigned to you can become harder to complete at night. This is a bonus for completing a challenge in those limiting conditions.

Key.Original: Complete your current challenge at night.
Key.Chinese: Complete your current challenge at night.
Key.French: Réussissez ce défi durant la nuit.
Key.Spanish: Completa tu actual desafío de noche.
Key.Italian: Completa la sfida attuale durante la notte.
Key.Hungarian: Complete your current challenge at night.
Key.Russian: Выполните ваше текущее задание в ночное время.
Key.German: Schließen Sie Ihre aktuelle Herausforderung bei Nacht ab.
Key.English: Complete your current challenge at night.
Key.Japanese: Complete your current challenge at night.

Key.Original: You've met up with the others on time.
Key.Chinese: You've met up with the others on time.
Key.French: Vous avez rencontré les autres à temps.
Key.Spanish: Te has reunido a tiempo con los demás.
Key.Italian: Ti sei incontrato con gli altri in tempo.
Key.Hungarian: You've met up with the others on time.
Key.German: Sie haben sich rechtzeitig mit den anderen getroffen.
Key.Czech: S ostatními si se setkal včas.
Key.English: You've met up with the others on time.
Key.Japanese: You've met up with the others on time.

Key.Chinese: Get at least %1 seconds of airtime.
Key.French: Obtenir au moins %1 secondes de temps de vol.

Key.Italian: Guadagna almeno %1 secondi di tempo in volo.
Key.Hungarian: Get at least %1 seconds of airtime.

Key.Russian: Наберите как минимум %1 секунд полетного времени.
Key.German: Verbringen Sie mindestens %1 Sekunden in der Luft.
Key.English: Get at least %1 seconds of airtime.
Key.Japanese: Get at least %1 seconds of airtime.

Key.Original: Sometimes it is beneficial to complete a challenge quickly and this is a bonus for doing so.
Key.Chinese: Sometimes it is beneficial to complete a challenge quickly and this is a bonus for doing so.
Key.French: Parfois, il est avantageux de réussir un défi rapidement et il y a des bonus en conséquence.
Key.Spanish: A veces es mejor completar un desafío rápidamente y esto es un bono por hacerlo.
Key.Italian: A volte è vantaggioso completare una sfida velocemente e questo è il relativo bonus.
Key.Hungarian: Sometimes it is beneficial to complete a challenge quickly and this is a bonus for doing so.
Key.Polish: Czasami warto szybko ukończyć wyzwanie. Jeśli to zrobisz, otrzymasz premię.
Key.Russian: Иногда бывает полезно завершить задание быстро, т.к. за это полагается поощрение.
Key.German: Manchmal ist es von Vorteil, eine Herausforderung rasch abzuschließen, und dafür erhalten Sie diesen Bonus.
Key.Czech: Někdy je dobré výzvu splnit co nejrychleji. Toto je bonus ze rychlost.
Key.English: Sometimes it is beneficial to complete a challenge quickly and this is a bonus for doing so.
Key.Japanese: Sometimes it is beneficial to complete a challenge quickly and this is a bonus for doing so.

Key.Original: Complete your current challenge quickly.
Key.Chinese: Complete your current challenge quickly.
Key.French: Réussissez le défi actuel rapidement
Key.Spanish: Completa tu actual desafío rápidamente.
Key.Italian: Completa velocemente la sfida attuale.
Key.Hungarian: Complete your current challenge quickly.
Key.German: Schließen Sie Ihre aktuelle Herausforderung rasch ab.
Key.English: Complete your current challenge quickly.
Key.Japanese: Complete your current challenge quickly.

Key.Original: You've completed the challenge at night.
Key.Chinese: You've completed the challenge at night.
