Key.English: You did not complete the challenge.
Key.Japanese: You did not complete the challenge.

Key.Original: Your completion time for the challenge was not fast enough.
Key.Chinese: Your completion time for the challenge was not fast enough.
Key.French: Votre temps pour réussir le défi n'était pas assez rapide.
Key.Spanish: Tu tiempo de finalización del desafío no fue lo suficiente rápido.
Key.Italian: Il tempo complessivo impiegato per la sfida è stato troppo.
Key.Hungarian: Your completion time for the challenge was not fast enough.
Key.Polish: Nie dość szybko przeszedłeś to wyzwanie.
Key.Russian: Вы затратили слишком много времени на выполнение задачи.
Key.German: Sie haben die Herausforderung nicht rasch genug abgeschlossen.
Key.Czech: Konečný čas splnění výzvy nebyl dostatečně malý.
Key.English: Your completion time for the challenge was not fast enough.
Key.Japanese: Your completion time for the challenge was not fast enough.

Key.Original: You've completed the challenge quickly.
Key.Chinese: You've completed the challenge quickly.
Key.French: Vous avez réussi le défi rapidement
Key.Spanish: Has completado el desafío rápidamente.
Key.Italian: Hai completato la sfida velocemente.
Key.Hungarian: You've completed the challenge quickly.
Key.Polish: Udało ci się szybko przejść to wyzwanie.
Key.German: Sie haben die Herausforderung rasch abgeschlossen.
Key.English: You've completed the challenge quickly.
Key.Japanese: You've completed the challenge quickly.

Key.Original: You managed to maintain the speed.
Key.Chinese: You managed to maintain the speed.
Key.French: Vous avez réussi à maintenir la vitesse.
Key.Spanish: Has conseguido mantener la velocidad.
Key.Italian: Sei riuscito a mantenere la velocità.
Key.Hungarian: You managed to maintain the speed.
Key.German: Sie haben die Geschwindigkeit gehalten.
Key.English: You managed to maintain the speed.
Key.Japanese: You managed to maintain the speed.

Key.Original: All Aboard
Key.Chinese: All Aboard
Key.French: Tous à bord
Key.Spanish: Todos a bordo
Key.Italian: Tutti a bordo
Key.Hungarian: All Aboard
Key.German: Alle Mann an Bord
Key.English: All Aboard
Key.Japanese: All Aboard

Key.Original: You've boarded the vehicle.
Key.Chinese: You've boarded the vehicle.
Key.French: Vous êtes monté à bord du véhicule.
Key.Spanish: Habeís entrado al vehículo.
Key.Italian: Siete entrati nel veicolo.
Key.Hungarian: You've boarded the vehicle.
Key.German: Sie sind in das Fahrzeug eingestiegen.
Key.English: You've boarded the vehicle.
Key.Japanese: You've boarded the vehicle.

Key.Original: Protect Player
Key.Chinese: Protect Player
Key.French: Protégez le joueur
Key.Spanish: Proteger Jugador
Key.Italian: Proteggi giocatore
Key.Hungarian: Protect Player
Key.German: Spieler beschützen
Key.English: Protect Player
Key.Japanese: Protect Player

Key.Original: Teamwork is very important and rewarding. When you stay with team members you can protect them from dangers they may have missed.
Key.Chinese: Teamwork is very important and rewarding. When you stay with team members you can protect them from dangers they may have missed.
Key.French: Le travail d'équipe est très important et enrichissant. Lorsque vous restez avec les membres de l'équipe, vous pouvez les protéger contre les dangers qu'ils auraient manqués.
Key.Spanish: El trabajo en equipo es gratificante y muy importante. Cuando te quedas con los miembros de tu equipo, puedes protegerlos de los peligros que puedan haber pasado por alto.
Key.Italian: Il lavoro di squadra è importante e vantaggioso. Quando sei con la tua squadra, li puoi proteggere da quei pericoli che a loro possono essere sfuggiti.
Key.Hungarian: Teamwork is very important and rewarding. When you stay with team members you can protect them from dangers they may have missed.
Key.Polish: Praca zespołowa jest bardzo ważna i korzystna. Trzymając się z drużyną, możesz chronić jej członków przed niebezpieczeństwami, których być może nie zauważyli.
Key.Russian: Работа в команде крайне важна и выгодна. Когда вы придерживаетесь остальных членов отряда, вы можете защитить их от не замеченных ими угроз.
Key.German: Zusammenarbeit ist überaus wichtig und lohnend. Wenn Sie bei Ihren Teammitgliedern bleiben, können Sie sie vor Gefahren schützen, die sie vielleicht übersehen haben.
Key.Czech: Týmová práce je nesmírně důležitá a prospěšná. Pokud postupujete s týmem, můžete své přátele varovat před hrozbami, které by v menším počtu mohli přehlédnout.
Key.English: Teamwork is very important and rewarding. When you stay with team members you can protect them from dangers they may have missed.
Key.Japanese: Teamwork is very important and rewarding. When you stay with team members you can protect them from dangers they may have missed.

Key.Original: Protect your assigned player (%1).
Key.Chinese: Protect your assigned player (%1).
Key.French: Protégez votre joueur assigné (%1).
Key.Spanish: Proteger a tu jugador asignado (%1).
Key.Italian: Proteggi il giocatore assegnato (%1).
Key.Hungarian: Protect your assigned player (%1).
Key.German: Beschützen Sie den Ihnen zugewiesenen Spieler (%1).
Key.English: Protect your assigned player (%1).
Key.Japanese: Protect your assigned player (%1).

Key.Original: The vehicle was disabled.
Key.Chinese: The vehicle was disabled.
Key.French: Le véhicule a été désactivé.
Key.Spanish: El vehículo ha sido inutilizado.
Key.Italian: Il veicolo è stato disabilitato.
Key.Hungarian: The vehicle was disabled.
Key.Russian: Единица техники была выведена из строя.
Key.German: Das Fahrzeug wurde außer Gefecht gesetzt.
Key.English: The vehicle was disabled.
Key.Japanese: The vehicle was disabled.

Key.Original: Using the same vehicle together can be very beneficial for your team. You can man all important crew positions and transport others.
Key.Chinese: Using the same vehicle together can be very beneficial for your team. You can man all important crew positions and transport others.
Key.French: Votre équipe peut grandement bénéficier d'utiliser le même véhicule. Vous pouvez poster des hommes à tous les postes d'équipage importants et transporter les autres.
Key.Spanish: Usar juntos el mismo vehículo puede ser muy beneficioso para tu equipo. Podeís cubrir todos los puestos importantes y transportar a otros.
Key.Italian: Utilizzare lo stesso veicolo assieme è vantaggioso per la tua squadra. Puoi far prendere posto a tutti i membri dell'equipaggio e trasportarne altri.
Key.Hungarian: Using the same vehicle together can be very beneficial for your team. You can man all important crew positions and transport others.
Key.Polish: Wspólne używanie pojazdu może być bardzo korzystne dla twojej drużyny. Możecie obsadzić wszystkie ważne stanowiska załogi i przewozić innych graczy.
Key.Russian: Совместное использование одной единицы техники может быть выгодным для вашей команды. Так вы можете сформировать полноценный экипаж и перевозить остальных.
Key.German: Dasselbe Fahrzeug zu benutzen, kann für Ihr Team von großem Vorteil sein. Sie können alle wichtigen Besatzungspositionen bemannen und andere transportieren.
Key.Czech: Společné ovládání vozidla může být velice výhodné, protože obsadíte všechny důležité pozice v něm. Navíc můžete přepravovat zbylé členy týmu.
Key.English: Using the same vehicle together can be very beneficial for your team. You can man all important crew positions and transport others.
Key.Japanese: Using the same vehicle together can be very beneficial for your team. You can man all important crew positions and transport others.

Key.Original: You managed to successfully protect your assigned player.
Key.Chinese: You managed to successfully protect your assigned player.
Key.French: Vous avez réussi à protéger votre joueur assigné.
Key.Spanish: Has conseguido proteger al jugador asignado.
Key.Italian: Sei riuscito a proteggere il giocatore assegnatomi.
Key.Hungarian: You managed to successfully protect your assigned player.
Key.Polish: Udało ci się ochronić wyznaczonego gracza.
Key.Russian: Вам удалось успешно защитить закрепленного за вами игрока.
Key.German: Sie haben den Ihnen zugewiesenen Spieler erfolgreich beschützt.
Key.English: You managed to successfully protect your assigned player.
Key.Japanese: You managed to successfully protect your assigned player.

Key.Original: The player assigned to you was injured and / or killed too often.
Key.Chinese: The player assigned to you was injured and / or killed too often.
Key.French: Le joueur assigné a été blessé et / ou tué trop souvent.
Key.Spanish: El jugador que te fue asignado ha sido herido y / o ha muerto demasiado a menudo.
Key.Italian: Il giocatore assegnatomi è stato ferito e / o ucciso troppe volte.
Key.Hungarian: The player assigned to you was injured and / or killed too often.
Key.Polish: Gracz, którego miałeś chronić, był za często raniony i/lub zabity.
Key.Russian: Закрепленный за вами игрок слишком часто был ранен и/или убит.
Key.German: Der Ihnen zugewiesene Spieler wurde zu oft verwundet und/oder getötet.
Key.Czech: Přidělený hráč byl příliš mnohokrát zraněn/zabit.
Key.English: The player assigned to you was injured and / or killed too often.
Key.Japanese: The player assigned to you was injured and / or killed too often.

Key.Original: Get into the %1.
Key.Chinese: Get into the %1.
Key.French: Entrez dans le %1.
Key.Spanish: Entra en: %1.
Key.Italian: Entra in: %1.
Key.Hungarian: Get into the %1.
Key.German: Steigen Sie in den %1.
Key.English: Get into the %1.
Key.Japanese: Get into the %1.

Key.Original: Wait for the others to board the vehicle.
Key.Chinese: Wait for the others to board the vehicle.
Key.French: Attendez que les autres soient à bord du véhicule.
Key.Spanish: Espera a que los demás suban al vehículo.
Key.Italian: Attendi che gli altri salgano sul veicolo.
Key.Hungarian: Wait for the others to board the vehicle.
Key.Polish: Zaczekaj, aż inni wsiądą do pojazdu.
Key.German: Warten Sie, bis die anderen an Bord des Fahrzeugs sind.
Key.Czech: Počkejte, než do vozidla nastoupí ostatní.
Key.English: Wait for the others to board the vehicle.
Key.Japanese: Wait for the others to board the vehicle.

Key.Original: You managed to stay below the set ceiling.
Key.Chinese: You managed to stay below the set ceiling.
Key.French: Vous avez réussi à rester en deçà du plafond fixé.
Key.Spanish: Has conseguido permanecer bajo el límite fijado.
Key.Italian: Sei riuscito a rimanere sotto il tetto massimo.
Key.Hungarian: You managed to stay below the set ceiling.
Key.Polish: Udało ci się utrzymać poniżej wyznaczonego pułapu.
Key.Russian: Вам удалось держаться ниже установленной высоты.
Key.German: Sie sind unter der vorgegebenen Maximalhöhe geblieben.
Key.Czech: Podařilo se vám udržet se pod nastavenou hladinou.
Key.English: You managed to stay below the set ceiling.
Key.Japanese: You managed to stay below the set ceiling.

Key.Original: Flying low and fast tests your agility, but radars and anti-aircraft weapons will have more difficulty tracking you.
Key.Chinese: Flying low and fast tests your agility, but radars and anti-aircraft weapons will have more difficulty tracking you.
Key.French: Voler à basse altitude et rapidement teste votre agilité, mais les radars et les armes anti-aériennes auront plus de difficulté à vous repérer.
Key.Spanish: Volar bajo y rápido es un desafío para tu agilidad, pero los radares y las armas antiaéreas tendrán más difícil el rastrearte.
Key.Italian: Volare a bassa quota e ad alta velocità mette alla prova la tua agilità, ma i radar e le armi antiaeree avranno più difficoltà a tracciarti.
Key.Hungarian: Flying low and fast tests your agility, but radars and anti-aircraft weapons will have more difficulty tracking you.
Key.Polish: Szybkie i niskie latanie to sprawdzian twojej zręczności. Zyskasz też to, że będziesz trudniejszy do namierzenia przez radary i broń przeciwlotniczą.
Key.Russian: Скоростной полет на малой высоте - серьезное испытание вашей ловкости, но так вы будете лучше защищены от вражеской ПВО.
Key.German: Niedrig und schnell zu fliegen, ist sehr anspruchsvoll, aber Radar und Flugabwehrwaffen können Sie dann schwerer erfassen.
Key.Czech: Nízký, rychlý let je sice zkouškou nervů, ale za to výrazně snižuje pravděpodobnost toho, že vás zachytí radary a protiletecké zbraně.
Key.English: Flying low and fast tests your agility, but radars and anti-aircraft weapons will have more difficulty tracking you.
Key.Japanese: Flying low and fast tests your agility, but radars and anti-aircraft weapons will have more difficulty tracking you.

Key.Original: Race to Position
Key.Chinese: Race to Position
Key.French: Courez à la position
Key.Spanish: Correr a la Posición
Key.Italian: Corri verso la posizione
Key.Hungarian: Race to Position
Key.German: Wettrennen zur Position
Key.English: Race to Position
Key.Japanese: Race to Position

Key.Original: Getting to a position as quickly as possible can be important in many situations, such as when having to extract injured personnel or defend a friendly position.
Key.Chinese: Getting to a position as quickly as possible can be important in many situations, such as when having to extract injured personnel or defend a friendly position.
Key.French: Se rendre à un poste aussi rapidement que possible peut être important dans de nombreuses situations, comme lorsque vous devez extraire des blessés ou défendre une position alliée.
Key.Spanish: Es importante, en muchas situaciones, alcanzar una posición tan rápido como sea posible, como cuando tienes que retirar algún herido o defender una posición.
Key.Italian: Raggiungere una posizione più velocemente possibile può essere utile in molte situazioni, come ad esempio quando devi estrarre i feriti o difendere una postazione alleata.
Key.Hungarian: Getting to a position as quickly as possible can be important in many situations, such as when having to extract injured personnel or defend a friendly position.
Key.Polish: Szybkie dotarcie na pozycję może być istotne w wielu sytuacjach, na przykład podczas ewakuacji rannych lub obrony sojuszniczych pozycji.
Key.Russian: Во многих ситуациях важно прибыть на позицию так быстро, насколько это возможно, например при эвакуации раненых или обороне дружественной позиции.
Key.German: So schnell wie möglich zu einer bestimmten Position zu kommen, ist in vielen Situationen sehr wichtig, zum Beispiel, wenn Verwundete evakuiert oder verbündete Stellungen verteidigt werden müssen.
Key.Czech: Dostat se na míst co nejrychleji je naprosto zásadní v situacích, jako je záchrana raněných nebo pomoc při obraně aktuálně dobývané pozice.
Key.English: Getting to a position as quickly as possible can be important in many situations, such as when having to extract injured personnel or defend a friendly position.
Key.Japanese: Getting to a position as quickly as possible can be important in many situations, such as when having to extract injured personnel or defend a friendly position.

Key.Original: Race the other players to the marked position.
Key.Chinese: Race the other players to the marked position.
Key.French: Faites la course aux autres joueurs vers la position marquée.
Key.Spanish: Corre contra los otros jugadores para alcanzar la posición designada.
Key.Italian: Sfida gli altri giocatori a raggiungere la posizione designata.
Key.Hungarian: Race the other players to the marked position.
Key.Polish: Ścigaj się z innymi graczami do wyznaczonej pozycji.
Key.Russian: Обгоните других игроков на пути к отмеченной позиции.
Key.German: Liefern Sie sich mit den anderen Spielern ein Rennen zu der markierten Position.
Key.Czech: Dostaňte se na označenou pozici rychleji, než ostatní.
Key.English: Race the other players to the marked position.
Key.Japanese: Race the other players to the marked position.

Key.Original: Sometimes you need to suddenly halt your vehicle's movement. Finding ways to do so quickly may save your life.
Key.Chinese: Sometimes you need to suddenly halt your vehicle's movement. Finding ways to do so quickly may save your life.
Key.French: Parfois, vous devez stopper d'un coup votre véhicule. Trouver des façons de le faire rapidement peut vous sauver la vie.
Key.Spanish: A veces necesitas detener el movimiento de tu vehículo de repente. Encontrar formas de hacerlo rápido puede salvar tu vida.
Key.Italian: Potrebbe capitare di dover fermare improvvisamente il veicolo. Trovare metodi efficaci per farlo ti potrebbe salvare la vita.
Key.Hungarian: Sometimes you need to suddenly halt your vehicle's movement. Finding ways to do so quickly may save your life.
Key.Polish: Czasami trzeba szybko zatrzymać pojazd. Możesz ocalić swoje życie, jeśli znajdziesz sposób, by to zrobić.
Key.Russian: Иногда может понадобиться внезапно остановить вашу единицу техники. Знание того, как сделать это быстро, может спасти вам жизнь.
Key.German: Manchmal müssen Sie Ihr Fahrzeug plötzlich zum Stehen bringen. Zu wissen, welche Möglichkeiten es dafür gibt, kann Ihnen das Leben retten.
Key.Czech: Někdy je třeba náhle zastavit vozidlo. Snažte se nalézt co nejvíce způsobů, jak to udělat, protože vám to může zachránit život.
Key.English: Sometimes you need to suddenly halt your vehicle's movement. Finding ways to do so quickly may save your life.
Key.Japanese: Sometimes you need to suddenly halt your vehicle's movement. Finding ways to do so quickly may save your life.

Key.Original: Stop your vehicle completely.
Key.Chinese: Stop your vehicle completely.
Key.French: Arrêtez complètement votre véhicule.
Key.Spanish: Detén tu vehículo completamente.
Key.Italian: Ferma completamente il veicolo.
Key.Hungarian: Stop your vehicle completely.
Key.German: Bringen Sie Ihr Fahrzeug zum Stehen.
Key.English: Stop your vehicle completely.
Key.Japanese: Stop your vehicle completely.

Key.Original: Start flying below %1 meters.
Key.Chinese: Start flying below %1 meters.
Key.French: Commencez à voler à une altitude inférieure à %1 mètres.
Key.Spanish: Comienza a volar por debajo de %1 metros.
Key.Italian: Comincia a volare al di sotto di %1 metri.
Key.Hungarian: Start flying below %1 meters.
Key.German: Beginnen Sie damit, unter %1 Meter zu fliegen.
Key.English: Start flying below %1 meters.
Key.Japanese: Start flying below %1 meters.

Key.Original: Keep flying below %1 meters.
Key.Chinese: Keep flying below %1 meters.
Key.French: Gardez une altitude inférieure à %1 mètres.
Key.Spanish: Mantente volando por debajo de los %1 metros.
Key.Italian: Continua a volare al di sotto di %1 metri.
Key.Hungarian: Keep flying below %1 meters.
Key.Russian: Продолжайте полет на высоте менее %1 метров.
Key.German: Fliegen Sie weiterhin unter %1 Meter fliegen.
Key.English: Keep flying below %1 meters.
Key.Japanese: Keep flying below %1 meters.

Key.Original: You've fully stopped your vehicle.
Key.Chinese: You've fully stopped your vehicle.
Key.French: Vous avez complètement arrêté votre véhicule.
Key.Spanish: Has detenido tu vehículo completamente.
Key.Italian: Hai fermato completamente il tuo veicolo.
Key.Hungarian: You've fully stopped your vehicle.
Key.Russian: Вы полностью остановили вашу единицу техники.
Key.German: Sie haben Ihr Fahrzeug zum Stehen gebracht.
Key.English: You've fully stopped your vehicle.
Key.Japanese: You've fully stopped your vehicle.

Key.Original: You finished first.
Key.Chinese: You finished first.
Key.French: Vous avez terminé premier.
Key.Spanish: Acabaste primero.
Key.Italian: Sei arrivato primo.
Key.Hungarian: You finished first.
Key.German: Sie sind Erster.
Key.English: You finished first.
Key.Japanese: You finished first.

Key.Original: You've lost the race.
Key.Chinese: You've lost the race.
Key.French: Vous avez perdu la course.
Key.Spanish: Has perdido la carrera.
Key.Italian: Hai perso la corsa.
Key.Hungarian: You've lost the race.
Key.German: Sie haben das Rennen verloren
Key.English: You've lost the race.
Key.Japanese: You've lost the race.

Key.Original: Meta-Challenge completed.
Key.Chinese: Meta-Challenge completed.
Key.French: Méta-défi réussi.
Key.Spanish: Meta-Desafío completado.
Key.Italian: Meta-Sfida completata.
Key.Hungarian: Meta-Challenge completed.
Key.German: Meta-Herausforderung abgeschlossen
Key.English: Meta-Challenge completed.
Key.Japanese: Meta-Challenge completed.

Key.Original: Meta-Challenge failed.
Key.Chinese: Meta-Challenge failed.
Key.French: Méta-défi échoué.
Key.Spanish: Meta-Desafío fallido.
Key.Italian: Meta-Sfida fallita.
Key.Hungarian: Meta-Challenge failed.
Key.German: Meta-Herausforderung gescheitert
Key.English: Meta-Challenge failed.
Key.Japanese: Meta-Challenge failed.

Key.Original: You got away in time.
Key.Chinese: You got away in time.
Key.French: Vous vous êtes échappé à temps.
Key.Spanish: Escapaste a tiempo.
Key.Italian: Sei andato via in tempo.
Key.Hungarian: You got away in time.
Key.German: Sie sind rechtzeitig weggekommen.
Key.English: You got away in time.
Key.Japanese: You got away in time.

Key.Original: Being able to retreat from a position quickly and efficiently is a vital combat skill. Always scan your surroundings for escape routes, bearing in mind terrain, obstacles and enemies.
Key.Chinese: Being able to retreat from a position quickly and efficiently is a vital combat skill. Always scan your surroundings for escape routes, bearing in mind terrain, obstacles and enemies.
Key.French: Être capable de battre en retraite rapidement et efficacement est une compétence vitale de combat. Il faut toujours analyser votre environnement pour identifier les voies d'évacuation, en tenant compte du terrain, des obstacles et des ennemis.
Key.Spanish: Ser capaz de retirarse de una posición rápida y eficazmente es una habilidad de combate vital. Explora siempre tus alrededores en busca de rutas de escape, teniendo en cuenta el terreno, los obstáculos y los enemigos.
Key.Italian: È di vitale importanza sapersi ritirare da una postazione in modo efficiente e rapido. Controlla sempre i dintorni per prepararti una via di fuga, tenendo in considerazione il tipo di terreno, gli ostacoli ed i nemici.
Key.Hungarian: Being able to retreat from a position quickly and efficiently is a vital combat skill. Always scan your surroundings for escape routes, bearing in mind terrain, obstacles and enemies.
Key.Polish: Szybkie i skuteczne opuszczanie pozycji to ważna umiejętność bojowa. Zawsze wypatruj dróg ucieczki, biorąc pod uwagę ukształtowanie terenu, przeszkody i przeciwników.
Key.Russian: Способность быстро и эффективно отступить с позиции - это важный тактический навык. Всегда проверяйте окружающую местность на предмет путей отхода, учитывая рельеф, преграды и силы противника.
Key.German: Sich schnell und effektiv von einer Position zurückzuziehen, ist lebenswichtig und muss beherrscht werden. Achten Sie ständig auf mögliche Fluchtwege, und berücksichtigen Sie dabei Gelände, Hindernisse und Feindaufkommen.
Key.Czech: Rychle uniknout z aktuální pozice je v boji nedocenitelné. Vždy sledujte okolí a vytipovávejte si případné únikové cesty s ohledem na terén, překážky a typ nepřátel.
Key.English: Being able to retreat from a position quickly and efficiently is a vital combat skill. Always scan your surroundings for escape routes, bearing in mind terrain, obstacles and enemies.
Key.Japanese: Being able to retreat from a position quickly and efficiently is a vital combat skill. Always scan your surroundings for escape routes, bearing in mind terrain, obstacles and enemies.

Key.Original: Get %1 meters away from your position.
Key.Chinese: Get %1 meters away from your position.
Key.French: Déplacez-vous de %1 mètres à partir de cette position
Key.Spanish: Aléjate %1 metros de tu posición.
Key.Italian: Allontanati %1 metri dalla tua posizione.
Key.Hungarian: Get %1 meters away from your position.
Key.Polish: Oddal się od swojej pozycji o %1 metrów.
Key.Russian: Удалитесь на %1 метров от вашей позиции.
Key.German: Entfernen Sie sich %1 Meter von Ihrer Position.
Key.Czech: Vzdalte se %1 metrů od aktuální pozice.
Key.English: Get %1 meters away from your position.
Key.Japanese: Get %1 meters away from your position.

Key.Original: You managed to reach the desired speed.
Key.Chinese: You managed to reach the desired speed.
Key.French: Vous avez réussi à atteindre la vitesse désirée.
Key.Spanish: Has conseguido alcanzar la velocidad deseada.
Key.Italian: Sei riuscito a raggiungere la velocità desiderata.
Key.Hungarian: You managed to reach the desired speed.
Key.Polish: Udało ci się osiągnąć wymaganą prędkość.
Key.German: Sie haben die vorgegebene Geschwindigkeit erreicht.
Key.Czech: Podařilo se vám dosáhnout požadované rychlosti.
Key.English: You managed to reach the desired speed.
Key.Japanese: You managed to reach the desired speed.

Key.Original: It's a good idea to know how fast your vehicle can get you out of a dangerous situation.
Key.Chinese: It's a good idea to know how fast your vehicle can get you out of a dangerous situation.
Key.French: C'est une bonne idée de savoir à quelle vitesse votre véhicule peut vous sortir d'une situation dangereuse.
Key.Spanish: Es buena idea conocer como de rápido tu vehículo puede sacarte de situaciones peligrosas.
Key.Italian: È sempre meglio sapere quanto rapidamente il tuo veicolo ti può tirare fuori da una situazione pericolosa.
Key.Hungarian: It's a good idea to know how fast your vehicle can get you out of a dangerous situation.
Key.Polish: Dobrze wiedzieć, jak szybko pojazd może pomóc ci wydostać się z niebezpiecznej sytuacji.
Key.Russian: Очень полезно знать, насколько быстро ваша единица техники может вытащить вас из опасной ситуации.
Key.German: Es ist gut zu wissen, wie schnell Sie Ihr Fahrzeug aus einer gefährlichen Situation herausbringen kann.
Key.Czech: Je dobré vědět, jak rychle je schopno se vaše vozidlo dostat z nebezpečné situace.
Key.English: It's a good idea to know how fast your vehicle can get you out of a dangerous situation.
Key.Japanese: It's a good idea to know how fast your vehicle can get you out of a dangerous situation.

Key.Original: Reach %1 kmph.
Key.Chinese: Reach %1 kmph.
Key.French: Atteignez %1 km/h.
Key.Spanish: Alcanza %1 kph.
Key.Italian: Raggiungi %1 kilometri all'ora.
Key.Hungarian: Reach %1 kmph.
Key.German: Erreichen Sie %1 km/h.
Key.English: Reach %1 kmph.
Key.Japanese: Reach %1 kmph.

Key.Original: You landed your aircraft.
Key.Chinese: You landed your aircraft.
Key.French: Vous avez atterri.
Key.Spanish: Aterrizaste tu aeronave.
Key.Italian: Hai fatto atterrare il tuo velivolo.
Key.Hungarian: You landed your aircraft.
Key.German: Sie haben Ihr Luftfahrzeug gelandet.
Key.English: You landed your aircraft.
Key.Japanese: You landed your aircraft.

Key.Original: The inevitable result of flying an aircraft is having to land it again at some point. Sometimes you'll have to land in an emergency or a combat zone, so it's wise to practise landing on many different types of location.
Key.Chinese: The inevitable result of flying an aircraft is having to land it again at some point. Sometimes you'll have to land in an emergency or a combat zone, so it's wise to practise landing on many different types of location.
Key.French: Le résultat inévitable de piloter un aéronef est d'avoir à le faire atterrir à nouveau. Parfois, vous aurez à le faire d'urgence ou dans une zone de combat. Il est donc sage de pratiquer l'atterrissage dans différents endroits.
Key.Spanish: El resultado de volar en aeronave es que en algún momento tendrás que aterrizar. A veces tendrás que hacerlo en zonas de combate o hacer un aterrizaje de emergencia, así que es mejor practicar el aterrizaje en diferentes tipos de localizaciones.
Key.Italian: Il risultato inevitabile di pilotare un aereo è quello di dover atterrare prima o poi. A volte dovrai effettuare atterraggi in zone pericolose o di combattimento, perciò è consigliabile fare un po' di pratica, provando ad atterrare in varie tipologie di zone.
Key.Hungarian: The inevitable result of flying an aircraft is having to land it again at some point. Sometimes you'll have to land in an emergency or a combat zone, so it's wise to practise landing on many different types of location.
Key.Polish: Podczas lotu pamiętaj, że kiedyś będziesz musiał wylądować. Czasami będzie to lądowanie awaryjne lub w strefie walki, więc warto poćwiczyć w różnych miejscach.
Key.Russian: Неизбежный результат полетов на летательном аппарате - это необходимость в итоге его приземлить. Иногда вам придется совершать экстренную посадку, или садиться в зоне боевых действий, поэтому разумно будет отработать посадку в различных условиях.
Key.German: Es ist beim Steuern eines Luftfahrzeugs unvermeidbar, damit irgendwann auch wieder zu landen. Manchmal muss das bei einem Notfall oder im Kampfgebiet erfolgen, daher ist es empfehlenswert, das Landen in unterschiedlichem Gelände zu üben.
Key.Czech: Pokud letíte v letadle, budete s ním muset nevyhnutelně někdy opět přistát. Někdy je třeba přistát nouzově nebo v nepřáteli ovládané oblasti. Je proto dobré naučit se přistávat na mnoha různých terénech.
Key.English: The inevitable result of flying an aircraft is having to land it again at some point. Sometimes you'll have to land in an emergency or a combat zone, so it's wise to practise landing on many different types of location.
Key.Japanese: The inevitable result of flying an aircraft is having to land it again at some point. Sometimes you'll have to land in an emergency or a combat zone, so it's wise to practise landing on many different types of location.

Key.Original: Land your aircraft and stop it completely.
Key.Chinese: Land your aircraft and stop it completely.
Key.French: Faites atterrir votre avion et arrêtez-le complètement
Key.Spanish: Aterriza con tu aeronave y detenla completamente.
Key.Italian: Fai atterrare il tuo velivolo e fermalo completamente.
Key.Hungarian: Land your aircraft and stop it completely.
Key.Russian: Посадите ваш летательный аппарат и полностью остановите его.
Key.German: Landen Sie Ihr Luftfahrzeug und bringen Sie es vollständig zum Stehen.
Key.Czech: Přistaňte s letadlem a zastavte je.
Key.English: Land your aircraft and stop it completely.
Key.Japanese: Land your aircraft and stop it completely.

Key.Original: You've performed a one-eighty.
Key.Chinese: You've performed a one-eighty.
Key.French: Vous avez effectué un 180.
Key.Spanish: Has hecho una maniobra de 180 grados.
Key.Italian: Hai compiuto una manovra di 180 gradi.
Key.Hungarian: You've performed a one-eighty.
Key.Polish: Wykonałeś obrót o sto osiemdziesiąt stopni.
Key.German: Sie haben eine Wende gemacht.
Key.English: You've performed a one-eighty.
Key.Japanese: You've performed a one-eighty.

Key.Original: Getting your aircraft to fly high is not as easy as it seems. You have to be wary of stalling.
Key.Chinese: Getting your aircraft to fly high is not as easy as it seems. You have to be wary of stalling.
Key.French: Faire voler votre avion très haut n'est pas aussi facile qu'il n'y paraît. Vous devez vous méfier du décrochage.
Key.Spanish: Hacer que tu aeronave vuele alto no es tan fácil como parece. Tienes que tener cuidado con entrar en barrena.
Key.Italian: Portare il tuo velivolo ad alta quota non è così facile come sembra. Stai attento a non andare in stallo.
Key.Hungarian: Getting your aircraft to fly high is not as easy as it seems. You have to be wary of stalling.
Key.Polish: Wzniesienie się na dużą wysokość nie jest tak łatwe, jak mogłoby się wydawać. Musisz uważać na przeciągnięcie.
Key.Russian: Набор большой высоты - непростая задача. Опасайтесь сваливания.
Key.German: Ihr Luftfahrzeug in große Höhen zu bringen, ist nicht so einfach, wie es scheint. Sie müssen aufpassen, dass die Maschine nicht überzieht.
Key.Czech: Vyletět s letounem do co největší výšky je těžší, než se zdá. Je třeba dávat pozor na ztrátu vztlaku.
Key.English: Getting your aircraft to fly high is not as easy as it seems. You have to be wary of stalling.
Key.Japanese: Getting your aircraft to fly high is not as easy as it seems. You have to be wary of stalling.

Key.Original: Ascend to %1 meters.
Key.Chinese: Ascend to %1 meters.
Key.French: Élevez vous à %1 mètres.
Key.Spanish: Sube a %1 metros.
Key.Italian: Sali a %1 metri.
Key.Hungarian: Ascend to %1 meters.
Key.German: Steigen Sie auf %1 Meter.
Key.English: Ascend to %1 meters.
Key.Japanese: Ascend to %1 meters.

Key.Original: Since most vehicles go faster moving forward, sometimes executing a 180 degree turn is a smart move.
Key.Chinese: Since most vehicles go faster moving forward, sometimes executing a 180 degree turn is a smart move.
Key.French: Comme la plupart des véhicules vont plus vite vers l'avant, il est parfois préférable d'exécuter un virage à 180 degrés.
Key.Spanish: Ya que la mayoría de los vehículos se mueven más rápido hacia delante, a veces es buena idea hacer un giro de 180 grados.
Key.Italian: Visto che la maggior parte dei veicoli sono più rapidi se si muovono in linea retta, a volte fare una sterzata di 180 gradi può essere una mossa inaspettata.
Key.Hungarian: Since most vehicles go faster moving forward, sometimes executing a 180 degree turn is a smart move.
Key.Polish: Większość pojazdów porusza się szybciej do przodu, więc czasami warto wykonać obrót o 180 stopni.
Key.Russian: Т.к. большинство видов наземной техники быстрее всего движется вперед, иногда бывает разумно выполнить разворот на 180 градусов.
Key.German: Da die meisten Fahrzeuge vorwärts schneller sind als rückwärts, kann es manchmal von Vorteil sein, eine Wende um 180 Grad zu machen.
Key.Czech: Vzhledem k tomu, že většina vozidel jede nejrychleji dopředu, je někdy dobré udělat obrat o 180°.
Key.English: Since most vehicles go faster moving forward, sometimes executing a 180 degree turn is a smart move.
Key.Japanese: Since most vehicles go faster moving forward, sometimes executing a 180 degree turn is a smart move.

Key.Original: Completely turn your vehicle around.
Key.Chinese: Completely turn your vehicle around.
Key.French: Faites complètement demi-tour.
Key.Spanish: Gira completamente tu vehículo.
Key.Italian: Gira completamente il tuo veicolo.
Key.Hungarian: Completely turn your vehicle around.
Key.German: Wenden Sie Ihr Fahrzeug komplett.
Key.English: Completely turn your vehicle around.
Key.Japanese: Completely turn your vehicle around.

Key.Original: Your Meta-Challenge(s):
Key.Chinese: Your Meta-Challenge(s):
Key.French: Votre(Vos) Méta-Défi(s) :
Key.Spanish: Tu(s) Meta-Desafío(s):
Key.Italian: Le tua(e) meta-sfida(e):
Key.Hungarian: Your Meta-Challenge(s):
Key.German: Ihre Meta-Herausforderung(en):
Key.English: Your Meta-Challenge(s):
Key.Japanese: Your Meta-Challenge(s):

Key.Original: You've reached the desired altitude.
Key.Chinese: You've reached the desired altitude.
Key.French: Vous avez atteint l'altitude désirée.
Key.Spanish: Alcanzaste la altitud deseada.
Key.Italian: Hai raggiunto l'altitudine desiderata.
Key.Hungarian: You've reached the desired altitude.
Key.German: Sie haben die vorgegebene Höhe erreicht.
Key.English: You've reached the desired altitude.
Key.Japanese: You've reached the desired altitude.

Key.Original: The challenge was aborted.
Key.Chinese: The challenge was aborted.
Key.French: Le défi a été abandonné.
Key.Spanish: El desafío fue cancelado.
Key.Italian: La sfida è stata annullata.
Key.Hungarian: The challenge was aborted.
Key.German: Die Herausforderung wurde abgebrochen.
Key.English: The challenge was aborted.
Key.Japanese: The challenge was aborted.

Key.Original: Too many players disconnected.
Key.Chinese: Too many players disconnected.
Key.French: Trop de joueurs se sont déconnectés.
Key.Spanish: Demasiados jugadores se han desconectado.
Key.Italian: Si sono disconnessi troppi giocatori.
Key.Hungarian: Too many players disconnected.
Key.German: Zu viele Spieler haben das Spiel verlassen.
Key.English: Too many players disconnected.
Key.Japanese: Too many players disconnected.

Key.Original: The enemy position is now under our control.
Key.Chinese: The enemy position is now under our control.
Key.French: La position ennemie est maintenant sous notre contrôle.
Key.Spanish: La posición enemiga esta ahora bajo nuestro control.
Key.Italian: La postazione nemica è ora sotto il nostro controllo.
Key.Hungarian: The enemy position is now under our control.
Key.German: Die feindliche Stellung ist jetzt unter Ihrer Kontrolle.
Key.English: The enemy position is now under our control.
Key.Japanese: The enemy position is now under our control.

Key.Original:
Enemy forces are holed up in a defended position. Your team is tasked with assaulting and securing the position.

You need to physically be at the target location, so just eliminating the defenders from afar is not enough. Once you've had control over the area for a little while, the challenge is deemed a success.

There may be several patrols between you and your target, so plan your assault well. Study the terrain and use its features to your advantage.
Key.Chinese:
Enemy forces are holed up in a defended position. Your team is tasked with assaulting and securing the position.

You need to physically be at the target location, so just eliminating the defenders from afar is not enough. Once you've had control over the area for a little while, the challenge is deemed a success.

There may be several patrols between you and your target, so plan your assault well. Study the terrain and use its features to your advantage.
Key.French:
Les forces ennemies sont retranchés dans une position fortifiée. Votre équipe est chargée de prendre cette position d'assaut et de la sécuriser.

Vous devez être physiquement à l'emplacement ciblé, l'élimination des forces ennemies de loin ne suffit pas. Une fois que vous avez le contrôle sur la zone pendant un certain temps, le défi est considéré comme un succès.

Il peut y avoir plusieurs patrouilles entre vous et votre cible, planifiez votre assaut intelligemment. Étudiez le terrain et utilisez ses caractéristiques à votre avantage.
Key.Spanish:
Las fuerzas enemigas resisten en una posición defensiva. Tu equipo tiene la tarea de atacar y asegurar la posición.

Necesitas estar físicamente en la localización seleccionada, así que solo eliminar a los defensores desde la distancia no será suficiente. Una vez hayas tenido el control del área por un tiempo, el desafío será considerado un éxito.

Puede haber varias patrullas entre tú y tu objetivo, así que planifica bien tu asalto. Estudia el terreno y usa sus características para tu ventaja.
Key.Italian:
Le forze nemiche sono rintanate in una postazione ben difesa. Alla tua squadra è stato assegnato il compito di assaltare e conquistare la postazione.

Dovrai essere fisicamente nella postazione quindi fare fuori i nemici da lontano non sarà sufficiente. Una volta che avrai preso il controllo dell’area per un po’, la sfida verrà considerata completata.
Potrebbero esserci diverse pattuglie fra te e il tuo obiettivo, quindi pianifica bene il tuo assalto. Studia il terreno ed utilizza le sue caratteristiche a tuo vantaggio.
Key.Hungarian:
Enemy forces are holed up in a defended position. Your team is tasked with assaulting and securing the position.

You need to physically be at the target location, so just eliminating the defenders from afar is not enough. Once you've had control over the area for a little while, the challenge is deemed a success.

There may be several patrols between you and your target, so plan your assault well. Study the terrain and use its features to your advantage.
Key.Polish:
Siły wroga znajdują się na bronionej pozycji. Twoja drużyna ma ją zaatakować i przejąć.

Musisz znaleźć się we wskazanym miejscu, zlikwidowanie obrońców z dystansu to za mało. Wyzwanie zakończy się sukcesem, jeśli będziesz przez jakiś czas kontrolować dane miejsce.

Między tobą a celem znajduje się wiele patroli, więc dobrze zaplanuj atak. Zapoznaj się z terenem i wykorzystaj jego ukształtowanie.
Key.Russian:
Вражеские силы окопались на обороняемой позиции. Вашей команде поставлена задача по штурмовому захвату данной позиции.

Вам надо находиться на требуемой точке, поэтому простое уничтожение противника с большой дистанции недостаточно. Как только вы займете позицию и удержите ее некоторое время, задание будет засчитано как выполненное.

Между вами и вашей целью может находиться несколько патрулей противника, поэтому хорошо спланируйте ваш штурм. Исследуйте местность и используйте ее особенности для получения преимущества.
Key.German:
Feindliche Streitkräfte haben sich in einer geschützten Stellung verschanzt. Ihr Team hat die Aufgabe, die Stellung anzugreifen und zu sichern.

Sie müssen selbst an der Zielposition sein, die Verteidiger aus der Ferne auszuschalten, reicht nicht aus. Sobald Sie das Gebiet eine bestimmte Zeit gehalten haben, wird die Herausforderung als Erfolg gewertet.

Zwischen Ihnen und dem Ziel können mehrere Patrouillen unterwegs sein, also planen Sie Ihren Angriff sorgfältig. Studieren Sie das Gelände und nutzen Sie es zu Ihrem Vorteil!
Key.Czech:
Nepřátelské jednotky se zakopaly v obranné pozici. Váš tým dostal za úkol pozici dobýt.

Musíte fyzicky dojít na dané místo, takže prostá likvidace obránců z dálky nestačí. Jakmile na chvíli ovládnete oblast, je výzva považována za splněnou.

Na cestě k cíli se mohou vyskytovat nepřátelské patroly, proto naplánujte svůj útok pečlivě.
Key.English:
Enemy forces are holed up in a defended position. Your team is tasked with assaulting and securing the position.

You need to physically be at the target location, so just eliminating the defenders from afar is not enough. Once you've had control over the area for a little while, the challenge is deemed a success.

There may be several patrols between you and your target, so plan your assault well. Study the terrain and use its features to your advantage.
Key.Japanese:
Enemy forces are holed up in a defended position. Your team is tasked with assaulting and securing the position.

You need to physically be at the target location, so just eliminating the defenders from afar is not enough. Once you've had control over the area for a little while, the challenge is deemed a success.

There may be several patrols between you and your target, so plan your assault well. Study the terrain and use its features to your advantage.

Key.Original: Move to the position and clear the enemy presence.
Key.Chinese: Move to the position and clear the enemy presence.
Key.French: Allez à la position et éliminez l'ennemi.
Key.Spanish: Muévete a la posición y limpia el área de presencia enemiga.
Key.Italian: Muoviti verso la postazione ed elimina i nemici.
Key.Hungarian: Move to the position and clear the enemy presence.
Key.Polish: Przejdź na pozycję i zlikwiduj przeciwników.
Key.Russian: Выдвиньтесь к позиции и очистите ее от вражеских сил.
Key.German: Rücken Sie zu der Stellung vor und schalten Sie die Feindpräsenz aus.
Key.Czech: Přesuňte se na pozici a eliminujte nepřátele.
Key.English: Move to the position and clear the enemy presence.
Key.Japanese: Move to the position and clear the enemy presence.

Key.Original: You're all in the same type of vehicle, so compete to see who has the best driving skills and can cross the finish line first. You are not allowed to skip any of the checkpoints, so study the route on the map well.
Key.Chinese: You're all in the same type of vehicle, so compete to see who has the best driving skills and can cross the finish line first. You are not allowed to skip any of the checkpoints, so study the route on the map well.
Key.French: Vous êtes tous dans le même type de véhicule, alors faites la course pour voir qui a les meilleures aptitudes à la conduite et franchit la ligne d'arrivée en premier. Vous n'êtes pas autorisé à ignorer l'un des points de contrôle. Il est judicieux d'étudier de l'itinéraire sur la carte.
Key.Spanish: Todos estáis en el mismo tipo de vehículo compitiendo por ver quién tiene las mejores habilidades de conducción y puede cruzar la línea de meta primero. No está permitido saltarse ningún punto de control, así que estudia bien la ruta en el mapa.
Key.Italian: Siete tutti a bordo dello stesso tipo di veicolo: fate una corsa per vedere chi è il migliore. Chi taglierà il traguardo per primo? Non potrai saltare nessuno dei punti di controllo, quindi studia attentamente il percorso sulla mappa.
Key.Hungarian: You're all in the same type of vehicle, so compete to see who has the best driving skills and can cross the finish line first. You are not allowed to skip any of the checkpoints, so study the route on the map well.
Key.Polish: Wszyscy jesteście w takich samych pojazdach, więc przekonajcie się, kto jest najlepszym kierowcą i jako pierwszy dotrze na metę. Nie możesz ominąć żadnego punktu kontrolnego, więc zapoznaj się z mapą.
Key.Russian: Вы все находитесь в одном типе техники, поэтому соревнуйтесь, чтобы узнать кто обладает лучшими водительскими навыками и первым пересечет финишную черту. Вы не можете пропускать контрольные точки, поэтому хорошо изучите маршрут на карте.
Key.German: Sie befinden sich alle im selben Fahrzeugtyp, also messen Sie Ihre Fahrkünste bei einem Rennen bis zur Ziellinie. Sie dürfen keinen der Kontrollpunkte auslassen, also studieren Sie vorher auf der Karte gründlich die Route.
Key.Czech: Všichni jste ve stejném typu vozidla, takže se ukáže, kdo má lepší řidičské schopnosti a dostane se do cíle první. Nesmíte minout ani jeden kontrolní bod, takže si raději dobře prohlédněte mapu.
Key.English: You're all in the same type of vehicle, so compete to see who has the best driving skills and can cross the finish line first. You are not allowed to skip any of the checkpoints, so study the route on the map well.
Key.Japanese: You're all in the same type of vehicle, so compete to see who has the best driving skills and can cross the finish line first. You are not allowed to skip any of the checkpoints, so study the route on the map well.

Key.Original:
Several enemy units are advancing on a friendly position. Your team is to make sure the position does not get overrun.

Either take out all enemy forces or send them into retreat. Should the enemy take control of the position, quickly take it back.
Key.Chinese:
Several enemy units are advancing on a friendly position. Your team is to make sure the position does not get overrun.

Either take out all enemy forces or send them into retreat. Should the enemy take control of the position, quickly take it back.
Key.French:
Plusieurs unités ennemies avancent sur une position alliée. Votre équipe doit s'assurer de garder la position.

Soit en éliminant toutes les forces ennemies ou en les faisant battre en retraite. Si l'ennemi prend le contrôle de la position, il faut rapidement la reprendre.
Key.Spanish:
Varias unidades enemigas están avanzando hacia una posición aliada. Tu equipo debe defender la posición.

Puedes eliminar a todos los enemigos u obligarlos a retirarse. En caso de que el enemigo tome el control de la posición, recupéralo rápidamente.
Key.Italian:
Molte unità nemiche stanno avanzando verso una postazione alleata. Alla tua squadra è stato assegnato il compito di difenderla.

Puoi far fuori tutti gli avversari o puoi farli battere in ritirata. Se il nemico prende il controllo della postazione, riconquistala rapidamente.
Key.Hungarian:
Several enemy units are advancing on a friendly position. Your team is to make sure the position does not get overrun.

Either take out all enemy forces or send them into retreat. Should the enemy take control of the position, quickly take it back.
Key.Polish:
Na sojuszniczą pozycję naciera wiele jednostek wroga. Twoja drużyna musi dopilnować, by przeciwnik jej nie zdobył.

Zlikwiduj wszystkich nieprzyjaciół albo zmuś ich do odwrotu. Jeśli wróg zajmie pozycję, szybko ją odzyskaj.
Key.Russian:
Несколько вражеских подразделений наступают на позицию дружественных сил. Вашей команде поставлена задача отразить нападение.

Либо уничтожьте всех атакующих, либо принудите их к отступлению. Если враг захватит позицию, быстро отбейте ее.
Key.German:
Mehrere feindliche Einheiten rücken auf eine verbündete Stellung vor. Ihr Team muss dafür sorgen, dass die Stellung nicht überrannt wird.

Schalten Sie entweder alle feindlichen Streitkräfte aus, oder zwingen Sie sie zum Rückzug! Sollte der Feind die Stellung einnehmen, erobern Sie sie sofort zurück.
Key.Czech:
Několik nepřátelských jednotek postupuje na naše pozice. Váš tým musí zajistit obranu této pozice.

buď všechny nepřátele zlikvidujte nebo je přinuťte k ústupu. Pokud by nepřítel naši pozici dobyl, co nejrychleji ji dobijte zpět.
Key.English:
Several enemy units are advancing on a friendly position. Your team is to make sure the position does not get overrun.

Either take out all enemy forces or send them into retreat. Should the enemy take control of the position, quickly take it back.
Key.Japanese:
Several enemy units are advancing on a friendly position. Your team is to make sure the position does not get overrun.

Either take out all enemy forces or send them into retreat. Should the enemy take control of the position, quickly take it back.

Key.Original: Beat the other players to the finish line.
Key.Chinese: Beat the other players to the finish line.
Key.French: Arrivez avant les autres à la ligne d'arrivée.
Key.Spanish: Bate a los otros jugadores a la línea de meta.
Key.Italian: Batti gli altri giocatori e arriva al traguardo.
Key.Hungarian: Beat the other players to the finish line.
Key.Polish: Dotrzyj na metę przed innymi graczami.
Key.Russian: Обгоните остальных игроков до финишной черты.
Key.German: Erreichen Sie vor den anderen Spielern die Ziellinie.
Key.Czech: Buďte v cíli rychleji, než ostatní.
Key.English: Beat the other players to the finish line.
Key.Japanese: Beat the other players to the finish line.

Key.Original: You've fended off a formidable force.
Key.Chinese: You've fended off a formidable force.
Key.French: Vous avez repoussé une force redoutable.
Key.Spanish: Has rechazado a una fuerza formidable.
Key.Italian: Hai respinto una forza armata formidabile.
Key.Hungarian: You've fended off a formidable force.
Key.Polish: Udało ci się odeprzeć duże siły.
Key.German: Sie haben eine beachtliche Streitmacht zurückgeschlagen.
Key.English: You've fended off a formidable force.
Key.Japanese: You've fended off a formidable force.

Key.Original: Defend the position against enemy attack.
Key.Chinese: Defend the position against enemy attack.
Key.French: Défendre la position contre une attaque ennemie.
Key.Spanish: Defiende la posición ante el ataque enemigo.
Key.Italian: Difendi la postazione dall'attacco nemico.
Key.Hungarian: Defend the position against enemy attack.
Key.German: Verteidigen Sie die Stellung gegen feindliche Angriffe.
Key.English: Defend the position against enemy attack.
Key.Japanese: Defend the position against enemy attack.

Key.Original: You've allowed your enemy to take control of the area and you were unable to quickly reclaim it.
Key.Chinese: You've allowed your enemy to take control of the area and you were unable to quickly reclaim it.
Key.French: Vous avez permis à l'ennemi de prendre le contrôle de la zone et vous n'avez pas réussi à le récupérer assez rapidement.
Key.Spanish: Has permitido al enemigo tomar el control del área y has sido incapaz de reclamarla rápidamente.
Key.Italian: Hai permesso al nemico di prendere il controllo dell'area e non sei stato in grado di recuperarla velocemente.
Key.Hungarian: You've allowed your enemy to take control of the area and you were unable to quickly reclaim it.
Key.Polish: Pozwoliłeś przeciwnikowi zająć ten teren i nie udało ci się go szybko odzyskać.
Key.Russian: Вы позволили противнику захватить зону и не смогли быстро отбить ее.
Key.German: Sie haben zugelassen, dass der Feind das Gebiet einnimmt, und konnten es nicht rasch zurückerobern.
Key.Czech: Dovolili jste, aby nepřítel ovládl pozici a nedokázali jste ji ani rychle dobýt zpět.
Key.English: You've allowed your enemy to take control of the area and you were unable to quickly reclaim it.
Key.Japanese: You've allowed your enemy to take control of the area and you were unable to quickly reclaim it.

Key.Original: Completion:
Key.Chinese: Completion:
Key.French: Succès :
Key.Spanish: Finalización:
Key.Italian: Completamento:
Key.Hungarian: Completion:
Key.German: Abschluss:
Key.English: Completion:
Key.Japanese: Completion:

Key.Original: Convoy Ambush
Key.Chinese: Convoy Ambush
Key.French: Embuscade de convoi
Key.Spanish: Emboscada al Convoy
Key.Italian: Imboscata al convoglio
Key.Hungarian: Convoy Ambush
Key.German: Konvoi-Überfall
Key.English: Convoy Ambush
Key.Japanese: Convoy Ambush

Key.Original: Your team was able to take out all vehicles in the convoy.
Key.Chinese: Your team was able to take out all vehicles in the convoy.
Key.French: Votre équipe a été capable d'éliminer tous les véhicules du convoi.
Key.Spanish: Tu equipo fue capaz de eliminar todos los vehículos del convoy.
Key.Italian: La tua squadra è riuscita a distruggere tutti i veicoli del convoglio.
Key.Hungarian: Your team was able to take out all vehicles in the convoy.
Key.Polish: Twoja drużyna zniszczyła wszystkie pojazdy konwoju.
Key.Russian: Ваша команда смогла уничтожить всю технику в конвое.
Key.German: Ihr Team hat sämtliche Fahrzeuge des Konvois ausgeschaltet.
Key.Czech: Váš tým dokázal vyřadit všechna vozidla v konvoji.
Key.English: Your team was able to take out all vehicles in the convoy.
Key.Japanese: Your team was able to take out all vehicles in the convoy.

Key.Original: Unfortunately, you've let some vehicles get through.
Key.Chinese: Unfortunately, you've let some vehicles get through.
Key.French: Malheureusement, vous avez laissé passer certains véhicules.
Key.Spanish: Desafortunadamente, dejaste pasar algunos vehículos.
Key.Italian: Purtroppo alcuni veicoli sono riusciti a passare.
Key.Hungarian: Unfortunately, you've let some vehicles get through.
Key.Russian: К сожалению, вы упустили часть техники.
Key.German: Leider konnten einige Fahrzeuge entkommen.
Key.English: Unfortunately, you've let some vehicles get through.
Key.Japanese: Unfortunately, you've let some vehicles get through.

Key.Original:
An enemy ground convoy has been seen moving near our lines. Your team will be sent in to halt it. Take out the vehicle crews or disable the vehicles themselves.

You can also take an offensive stance and intercept the enemy elsewhere along the route. Be aware of enemy security vehicles and personnel traveling along with the convoy.
Key.Chinese:
An enemy ground convoy has been seen moving near our lines. Your team will be sent in to halt it. Take out the vehicle crews or disable the vehicles themselves.

You can also take an offensive stance and intercept the enemy elsewhere along the route. Be aware of enemy security vehicles and personnel traveling along with the convoy.
Key.French:
Un convoi ennemi au sol a été vu se déplaçant près de nos lignes. Votre équipe sera envoyée pour l'arrêter. Éliminez les équipages de véhicules ou mettez hors service les véhicules eux-mêmes.

Vous pouvez également prendre une attitude offensive et intercepter l'ennemi ailleurs le long de la route. Soyez conscient de véhicules de sécurité ennemis et des troupes se déplaçant avec le convoi.
Key.Spanish:
Un convoy de tierra enemigo ha sido visto moviéndose cerca de nuestras líneas. Tu equipo tendrá que detenerlo. Elimina la tripulación o inutiliza los propios vehículos.

También puedes tomar una postura ofensiva e interceptar al enemigo en otro lugar de la ruta. Ten en cuenta el personal y los vehículos de seguridad enemigos que viajan con el convoy.
Key.Italian:
Un convoglio nemico è stato visto vicino alle nostre linee. La tua squadra sarà inviata lì per fermarlo. Elimina gli equipaggi dei veicoli o metti fuori uso i veicoli stessi.

Puoi anche lanciare un’offensiva e intercettare il nemico durante il percorso. Fai attenzione ai veicoli e al personale di scorta che viaggia con il convoglio.
Key.Hungarian:
An enemy ground convoy has been seen moving near our lines. Your team will be sent in to halt it. Take out the vehicle crews or disable the vehicles themselves.

You can also take an offensive stance and intercept the enemy elsewhere along the route. Be aware of enemy security vehicles and personnel traveling along with the convoy.
Key.Polish:
W pobliżu naszych pozycji wykryto nieprzyjacielski konwój naziemny. Twoja drużyna ma go zatrzymać. Zlikwiduj załogi pojazdów lub unieszkodliw je.

Możesz też działać ofensywnie i przechwycić wroga w innym miejscu. Uważaj na pojazdy nieprzyjacielskiej ochrony i personel podróżujący w konwoju.
Key.Russian:
Вражеский наземный конвой был замечен на марше недалеко от наших позиций. Вашей команде поставлена задача остановить его. Уничтожайте экипажи, или выводите из строя саму технику.

Вы также можете перейти в наступление, и перехватить противника на любой другой точке маршрута. Помните о наличии боевого охранения у конвоя.
Key.German:
Ein feindlicher Konvoi wurde in der Nähe unserer Linien gesichtet. Ihr Team soll ihn aufhalten. Schalten Sie die Besatzung der Fahrzeuge aus oder machen Sie die Fahrzeuge selbst gefechtsuntüchtig.

Sie können auch offensiv vorgehen und den Feind an einer anderen Stelle entlang der Route abfangen. Achten Sie auf feindliche Sicherheitsfahrzeuge und Truppen, die den Konvoi begleiten.
Key.Czech:
Poblíž našich linií byl spatřen nepřátelský konvoj. Váš tým byl vyslán ho zastavit. Zlikvidujte posádky nebo vozidla samotná.

Můžete také zaujmout útočné pozice a zaútočit někde podél trasy. Dejte však pozor na nepřátele bránící konvoj.
Key.English:
An enemy ground convoy has been seen moving near our lines. Your team will be sent in to halt it. Take out the vehicle crews or disable the vehicles themselves.

You can also take an offensive stance and intercept the enemy elsewhere along the route. Be aware of enemy security vehicles and personnel traveling along with the convoy.
Key.Japanese:
An enemy ground convoy has been seen moving near our lines. Your team will be sent in to halt it. Take out the vehicle crews or disable the vehicles themselves.

You can also take an offensive stance and intercept the enemy elsewhere along the route. Be aware of enemy security vehicles and personnel traveling along with the convoy.

Key.Original: All vehicles reached their intended destination.
Key.Chinese: All vehicles reached their intended destination.
Key.French: Tous les véhicules ont atteint leur destination prévue.
Key.Spanish: Todos los vehículos alcanzaron su destino propuesto.
Key.Italian: Tutti i veicoli hanno raggiunto la destinazione designata.
Key.Hungarian: All vehicles reached their intended destination.
Key.German: Alle Fahrzeuge haben ihr Ziel erreicht.
Key.English: All vehicles reached their intended destination.
Key.Japanese: All vehicles reached their intended destination.

Key.Original: Ambush the vehicle convoy.
Key.Chinese: Ambush the vehicle convoy.
Key.French: Prenez en embuscade le convoi de véhicule.
Key.Spanish: Embosca al convoy de vehículos.
Key.Italian: Tendi un'imboscata al convoglio.
Key.Hungarian: Ambush the vehicle convoy.
Key.German: Überfallen Sie den Fahrzeugkonvoi.
Key.English: Ambush the vehicle convoy.
Key.Japanese: Ambush the vehicle convoy.

Key.Original: You're the winner!
Key.Chinese: You're the winner!
Key.French: Vous êtes le gagnant !
Key.Spanish: ¡Eres el ganador!
Key.Italian: Hai vinto!
Key.Hungarian: You're the winner!
Key.German: Sie haben gewonnen!
Key.English: You're the winner!
Key.Japanese: You're the winner!

Key.Original: You've lost!
Key.Chinese: You've lost!
Key.French: Vous avez perdu !
Key.Spanish: ¡Has perdido!
Key.Italian: Hai perso!
Key.Hungarian: You've lost!
Key.German: Sie haben verloren!
Key.English: You've lost!
Key.Japanese: You've lost!

Key.Original:
Fight for your life and rack up as many points as you can by killing the other players. If you're using vehicles, you'll be the only crew member - so you need to man all stations by yourself.

Only the player with the most points wins, so there's no point in hiding or leaving the area.
Key.Chinese:
Fight for your life and rack up as many points as you can by killing the other players. If you're using vehicles, you'll be the only crew member - so you need to man all stations by yourself.

Only the player with the most points wins, so there's no point in hiding or leaving the area.
Key.French:
Sauvez votre peau et accumulez autant de points que vous pouvez en tuant les autres joueurs. Si vous utilisez des véhicules, vous serez le seul membre d'équipage. Vous devez donc manipuler tous les postes par vous-même

Seul le joueur avec le plus de points gagne, il n'y a donc aucune raison de se cacher ou de quitter la zone.
Key.Spanish:
Lucha por tu vida y acumula tantos puntos como puedas matando otros jugadores. Si estás usando vehículos, serás el único tripulante -así que tendrás que manejar todos los puestos tu solo.

Solo el jugador con más puntos gana, así que no hay motivo para ocultarte o salir del área.
Key.Italian:
Lotta per sopravvivere e raccogli quanti più punti possible uccidendo gli altri giocatori. Se stai usando dei veicoli, sarai l’unico membro dell’equipaggio – perciò dovrai occuparti di tutte le postazioni da solo.

Vincerà il giocatore con il maggior numero di punti, quindi non ha senso nascondersi o abbandonare l’area.
Key.Hungarian:
Fight for your life and rack up as many points as you can by killing the other players. If you're using vehicles, you'll be the only crew member - so you need to man all stations by yourself.

Only the player with the most points wins, so there's no point in hiding or leaving the area.
Key.Polish:
Walcz o życie i zdobądź jak najwięcej punktów, zabijając innych graczy. Jeśli używasz pojazdów, będziesz jedynym członkiem załogi - więc sam musisz obsadzać wszystkie stanowiska.

Wygrywa osoba mająca najwięcej punktów, więc nie warto się ukrywać ani opuszczać tego terenu.
Key.Russian:
Сражайтесь за свою жизнь и наберите как можно больше очков, убивая других игроков. Если вы используете технику, вы будете единственным членом экипажа, и вам придется выполнять всю боевую работу самостоятельно.

Побеждает игрок с наибольшим количеством очков, поэтому прятаться или покидать зону бессмысленно.
Key.German:
Kämpfen Sie um Ihr Leben und machen Sie so viele Punkte wie möglich, indem Sie die anderen Spieler ausschalten. Wenn Sie Fahrzeuge benutzen, sind Sie das einzige Besatzungsmitglied – Sie müssen also sämtliche Positionen selbst besetzen.

Nur der Spieler mit den meisten Punkten gewinnt, es bringt also nichts, sich zu verstecken oder das Gebiet zu verlassen.
Key.Czech:
Bojuj o život! Získej co nejvíce bodů tím, že budeš zabíjet ostatní hráče. Pokud jste ve vozidle, budete je muset ovládat celé sami.

Vyhraje hráč s nejvíce body, takže nemá smysl se skrývat nebo zmizet z oblasti.
Key.English:
Fight for your life and rack up as many points as you can by killing the other players. If you're using vehicles, you'll be the only crew member - so you need to man all stations by yourself.

Only the player with the most points wins, so there's no point in hiding or leaving the area.
Key.Japanese:
Fight for your life and rack up as many points as you can by killing the other players. If you're using vehicles, you'll be the only crew member - so you need to man all stations by yourself.

Only the player with the most points wins, so there's no point in hiding or leaving the area.

Key.Original: Triathlon
Key.Chinese: Triathlon
Key.French: Triathlon
Key.Spanish: Triatlón
Key.Italian: Triathlon
Key.Hungarian: Triathlon
Key.German: Triathlon
Key.English: Triathlon
Key.Japanese: Triathlon

Key.Original: During this race you will be using three different vehicles. Swap to a new vehicle at each checkpoint, where the vehicles are parked. You're not allowed to skip any of the checkpoints, so study the route on the map well.
Key.Chinese: During this race you will be using three different vehicles. Swap to a new vehicle at each checkpoint, where the vehicles are parked. You're not allowed to skip any of the checkpoints, so study the route on the map well.
Key.French: Au cours de cette course, vous allez utiliser trois véhicules différents. Changez pour un véhicule neuf à chaque point de contrôle, là où les véhicules sont stationnés. Vous n'êtes pas autorisé à sauter l'un des points de contrôle, alors étudiez l'itinéraire sur la carte.
Key.Spanish: En esta carrera, usarás tres vehículos diferentes. Cambia a un nuevo vehículo en cada punto de control, donde los vehículos están aparcados. No está permitido saltarse los puntos de control, así que estudia bien la ruta en el mapa.
Key.Italian: Durante questa corsa, userai tre tipi di veicoli. Cambia veicolo ad ogni punto di controllo, dove sono parcheggiati i mezzi. Non potrai saltare nessuno dei punti di controllo, quindi studia attentamente il percorso sulla mappa.
Key.Hungarian: During this race you will be using three different vehicles. Swap to a new vehicle at each checkpoint, where the vehicles are parked. You're not allowed to skip any of the checkpoints, so study the route on the map well.
Key.Polish: W trakcie tego wyścigu będziesz korzystał z trzech różnych pojazdów. Zmień maszynę w każdym punkcie kontrolnym, w którym zaparkowano pojazdy. Nie możesz ominąć żadnego punktu, więc dobrze zapoznaj się z mapą.
Key.Russian: Во время этой гонки, вы будете использовать три различных единицы техники. Меняйте их у каждой контрольной точки, где они припаркованы. Вы не можете пропускать контрольные точки, поэтому хорошо изучите маршрут на карте.
Key.German: Bei diesem Rennen benutzen Sie drei verschiedene Fahrzeuge. Wechseln Sie an jedem Kontrollpunkt in ein neues Fahrzeug, das dort geparkt ist. Sie dürfen keinen der Kontrollpunkte auslassen, also studieren Sie vorher auf der Karte gründlich die Route.
Key.Czech: Během tohoto závodu použijete tři různá vozidla. Na kontrolním bodu, kde je vozidlo zaparkováno, si do něj přesedněte. Musíte projít všechny kontrolní body, takže si raději pořádně prostudujte mapu.
Key.English: During this race you will be using three different vehicles. Swap to a new vehicle at each checkpoint, where the vehicles are parked. You're not allowed to skip any of the checkpoints, so study the route on the map well.
Key.Japanese: During this race you will be using three different vehicles. Swap to a new vehicle at each checkpoint, where the vehicles are parked. You're not allowed to skip any of the checkpoints, so study the route on the map well.

Key.Original: Kill the other players 10 times before time runs out.
Key.Chinese: Kill the other players 10 times before time runs out.
Key.French: Tuez les autres joueurs 10 fois avant que le temps ne s'épuise.
Key.Spanish: Acaba con los otros jugadores 10 veces antes de que el tiempo se agote.
Key.Italian: Uccidi gli altri giocatori 10 volte prima che scada il tempo.
Key.Hungarian: Kill the other players 10 times before time runs out.
Key.Polish: Zabij innych graczy 10 razy, zanim skończy się czas.
Key.Russian: Убейте остальных игроков 10 раз до истечения времени.
Key.German: Schalten Sie die anderen Spieler 10 Mal aus, bevor die Zeit abläuft.
Key.Czech: Zabijte ostatní hráče 10krát před uplynutím časového limitu.
Key.English: Kill the other players 10 times before time runs out.
Key.Japanese: Kill the other players 10 times before time runs out.

Key.Original: Kill the other players %1 times before time runs out.
Key.Chinese: Kill the other players %1 times before time runs out.
Key.French: Tuez les autres joueurs %1 fois avant que le temps ne s'épuise.
Key.Spanish: Acaba con los otros jugadores %1 veces antes de que el tiempo se agote.
Key.Italian: Uccidi gli altri giocatori %1 volte prima che scada il tempo.
Key.Hungarian: Kill the other players %1 times before time runs out.
Key.Polish: Zabij innych graczy %1 razy, zanim skończy się czas.
Key.Russian: Убейте остальных игроков %1 раз(а) до истечения времени.
Key.German: Schalten Sie die anderen Spieler %1 Mal aus, bevor die Zeit abläuft.
Key.Czech: Zabijte ostatní hráče %1krát před uplynutím časového limitu.
Key.English: Kill the other players %1 times before time runs out.
Key.Japanese: Kill the other players %1 times before time runs out.

Key.Original: Your team is continuously assaulted by waves of enemies. Survive as long as you can. Remember that you're not forced to stay in one location, so either move around or find a good defensive position.
Key.Chinese: Your team is continuously assaulted by waves of enemies. Survive as long as you can. Remember that you're not forced to stay in one location, so either move around or find a good defensive position.
Key.French: Votre équipe est continuellement assaillie par des vagues d'ennemis. Survivez aussi longtemps que vous le pouvez. Rappelez-vous que vous n'êtes pas obligés de rester au même endroit, donc déplacez vous ou trouvez une bonne position défensive.
Key.Spanish: Tu equipo recibirá constantemente ataques de oleadas de enemigos. Sobrevive tanto como puedas. Recuerda que no estás obligado a permanecer en una localización, así que puedes moverte por los alrededores o buscar una buena posición defensiva.
Key.Italian: La tua squadra sta subendo continui assalti di ondate nemiche. Sopravvivi il più a lungo possibile. Ricorda che non sei obbligato a rimanere nella stessa posizione, perciò spostati o trova una buona postazione difensiva.
Key.Hungarian: Your team is continuously assaulted by waves of enemies. Survive as long as you can. Remember that you're not forced to stay in one location, so either move around or find a good defensive position.
Key.Polish: Twoja drużyna jest nieustannie atakowana przez fale nieprzyjaciół. Przetrwaj jak najdłużej. Pamiętaj, że nie musisz pozostawać w jednym miejscu. Przemieszczaj się lub znajdź dobrą pozycję obronną.
Key.Russian: Ваша команда постоянно атакуется волнами врагов. Выживите так долго, как сможете. Помните, что вам не требуется оставаться на одной точке, поэтому либо перемещайтесь, либо найдите хорошую оборонительную позицию.
Key.German: Ihr Team wird unaufhörlich von Wellen des Feindes angegriffen. Überleben Sie so lange wie möglich. Bedenken Sie, dass Sie nicht an einer Stelle verharren müssen, also bleiben Sie in Bewegung oder suchen Sie sich eine gute Verteidigungsposition.
Key.Czech: Váš tým bude čelit neustávajícím vlnám nepřátel- Přežijte co nejdéle. Pamatujte, že nemusíte zůstávat na jednom místě, takže se buď pohybujte nebo si najděte dobrou obrannou pozici.
Key.English: Your team is continuously assaulted by waves of enemies. Survive as long as you can. Remember that you're not forced to stay in one location, so either move around or find a good defensive position.
Key.Japanese: Your team is continuously assaulted by waves of enemies. Survive as long as you can. Remember that you're not forced to stay in one location, so either move around or find a good defensive position.

Key.Original: Survive the enemy attacks.
Key.Chinese: Survive the enemy attacks.
Key.French: Survivez aux attaques ennemies.
Key.Spanish: Sobrevive al ataque de los enemigos.
Key.Italian: Sopravvivi agli assalti nemici.
Key.Hungarian: Survive the enemy attacks.
Key.German: Überleben Sie die feindlichen Angriffe.
Key.English: Survive the enemy attacks.
Key.Japanese: Survive the enemy attacks.

Key.Original: You've used Fast-Travel.
Key.Chinese: You've used Fast-Travel.
Key.French: Vous avez utilisé le Voyage Rapide.
Key.Spanish: Has usado Fast-Travel.
Key.Italian: Hai usato il Fast-Travel.
Key.Hungarian: You've used Fast-Travel.
Key.German: Sie haben den schnellen Transport benutzt.
Key.English: You've used Fast-Travel.
Key.Japanese: You've used Fast-Travel.

Key.Original: Item(s) used:
Key.Chinese: Item(s) used:
Key.French: Item(s) utilisé(s) :
Key.Spanish: Objeto(s) usado(s):
Key.Italian: Oggetto/i usato/i:
Key.Hungarian: Item(s) used:
Key.German: Benutzte Gegenstände:
Key.English: Item(s) used:
Key.Japanese: Item(s) used:

Key.Original: You've survived the onslaught.
Key.Chinese: You've survived the onslaught.
Key.French: Vous avez survécu à l'assaut.
Key.Spanish: Has sobrevivido al violento ataque.
Key.Italian: Sei sopravvissuto al violento attacco.
Key.Hungarian: You've survived the onslaught.
Key.German: Sie haben den Angriff überlebt.
Key.English: You've survived the onslaught.
Key.Japanese: You've survived the onslaught.

Key.Original: You did not survive.
Key.Chinese: You did not survive.
Key.French: Vous n'avez pas survécu.
Key.Spanish: No sobreviviste.
Key.Italian: Non sei sopravvissuto.
Key.Hungarian: You did not survive.
Key.German: Sie haben nicht überlebt.
Key.English: You did not survive.
Key.Japanese: You did not survive.

Key.Original: Last Man Standing
Key.Chinese: Last Man Standing
Key.French: Dernier Homme Debout
Key.Spanish: Único Superviviente
Key.Italian: Unico sopravvissuto
Key.Hungarian: Last Man Standing
Key.German: Last Man Standing
Key.English: Last Man Standing
Key.Japanese: Last Man Standing

Key.Original: Be the last one to survive a battle to the death. If you're using vehicles, you'll be the only crew member, so you'll need to man all stations by yourself.
Key.Chinese: Be the last one to survive a battle to the death. If you're using vehicles, you'll be the only crew member, so you'll need to man all stations by yourself.
Key.French: Soyez le dernier à survivre à une bataille à mort. Si vous utilisez des véhicules, vous serez le seul membre d'équipage. Vous devez donc manipuler tous les postes par vous-même.
Key.Spanish: Sobrevive a una batalla mortal. Si estás usando vehículos, serás el único tripulante, así que tendrás que manejar todos los puestos tu solo.
Key.Italian: Sopravvivi a questa battaglia mortale. Se stai usando dei veicoli, sarai l’unico membro dell’equipaggio, perciò dovrai occuparti di tutte le postazioni da solo.
Key.Hungarian: Be the last one to survive a battle to the death. If you're using vehicles, you'll be the only crew member, so you'll need to man all stations by yourself.
Key.Polish: Pozostań ostatni na morderczym polu bitwy. Jeśli korzystasz z pojazdów, jesteś jedynym członkiem załogi i samodzielnie obsadzać wszystkie stanowiska.
Key.Russian: Станьте последним выжившим в битве на смерть. Если вы используете технику, вы будете единственным членом экипажа, и вам придется выполнять всю боевую работу самостоятельно.
Key.German: Überleben Sie als Einziger einen Kampf bis zum Tod. Wenn Sie Fahrzeuge benutzen, sind Sie das einzige Besatzungsmitglied – Sie müssen also sämtliche Positionen selbst besetzen.
Key.Czech: Buďte posledním, kdo přežije boj na život a na smrt. Pokud používáte vozidla, budete jediným členem posádky, takže je budete muset celé ovládat sami.
Key.English: Be the last one to survive a battle to the death. If you're using vehicles, you'll be the only crew member, so you'll need to man all stations by yourself.
Key.Japanese: Be the last one to survive a battle to the death. If you're using vehicles, you'll be the only crew member, so you'll need to man all stations by yourself.

Key.Original: Kill the other players before time runs out.
Key.Chinese: Kill the other players before time runs out.
Key.French: Tuez les autres joueurs avant que le temps ne s'épuise.
Key.Spanish: Acaba con el resto de jugadores antes de que el tiempo se agote.
Key.Italian: Uccidi gli altri giocatori prima che scada il tempo.
Key.Hungarian: Kill the other players before time runs out.
Key.Polish: Zabij innych graczy, zanim skończy się czas.
Key.Russian: Убейте остальных игроков до истечения времени.
Key.German: Schalten Sie die anderen Spieler aus, bevor die Zeit abläuft.
Key.Czech: Zabijte ostatní hráče, než uběhne časový limit.
Key.English: Kill the other players before time runs out.
Key.Japanese: Kill the other players before time runs out.

Key.Original: Too many players used Fast-Travel.
Key.Chinese: Too many players used Fast-Travel.
Key.French: Trop de joueurs ont utilisé le Voyage Rapide.
Key.Spanish: Demasiados jugadores usaron Fast-Travel.
Key.Italian: Troppi giocatori hanno usato il Fast-Travel.
Key.Hungarian: Too many players used Fast-Travel.
Key.Polish: Za dużo graczy skorzystało z szybkiej podróży.
Key.Russian: Слишком много игроков использовали скоростное перемещение.
Key.German: Zu viele Spieler haben den schnellen Transport benutzt.
Key.Czech: Příliš mnoho hráčů použilo Rychlý přesun.
Key.English: Too many players used Fast-Travel.
Key.Japanese: Too many players used Fast-Travel.
