Key.Original:
Welcome to ARMEX!

Since you are quite new to ARMEX, you can become familiar with it by following a short series of tasks (available in your diary).
Key.Chinese:
Welcome to ARMEX!

Since you are quite new to ARMEX, you can become familiar with it by following a short series of tasks (available in your diary).
Key.French:
Bienvenue à ARMEX!

Puisque vous êtes nouveau à ARMEX, vous pouvez vous y familiariser en exécutant une courte série de tâches (disponibles dans votre agenda).
Key.Spanish:
¡Bienvenido a ARMEX!

Ya que eres bastante nuevo, puedes familiarizarte con ARMEX siguiendo una serie de cortas tareas (disponibles en tu diario).
Key.Italian:
Benvenuto all’ ARMEX!

Visto che sei arrivato da poco all’ARMEX, puoi cominciare ad ambientarti eseguendo una breve serie di incarichi (disponibili nel tuo diario).
Key.Hungarian:
Welcome to ARMEX!

Since you are quite new to ARMEX, you can become familiar with it by following a short series of tasks (available in your diary).
Key.Polish:
Witaj w ARMEX!

ARMEX to dla ciebie nowość. Możesz się z nim zapoznać, wykonując krótkie zadania (dostępne w twoim pamiętniku).
Key.Russian:
Добро пожаловать в ARMEX!

Т.к. вы не обучены обращению с ARMEX, вы можете ознакомиться с ней, выполнив небольшую последовательность заданий (доступны в вашем дневнике).
Key.German:
Willkommen auf der ARMEX!

Da Sie auf der ARMEX neu sind, können Sie sich durch eine Reihe kurzer Aufgaben (die in Ihrem Notizbuch verfügbar sind) mit der Messe vertraut machen.
Key.Czech:
Welcome to ARMEX!

Protože jste na ARMEXu noví, můžete se s ním seznámit prostřednictvím drobných sérií úkolů (k dispozici prostřednictvím diáře).
Key.English:
Welcome to ARMEX!

Since you are quite new to ARMEX, you can become familiar with it by following a short series of tasks (available in your diary).
Key.Japanese:
Welcome to ARMEX!

Since you are quite new to ARMEX, you can become familiar with it by following a short series of tasks (available in your diary).

Key.Original: Visit Information Kiosk
Key.Chinese: Visit Information Kiosk
Key.French: Visitez le kiosque d'information
Key.Spanish: Visitar el Quiosco de Información
Key.Italian: Visita il chiosco informativo
Key.Hungarian: Visit Information Kiosk
Key.German: Informationsstand besuchen
Key.English: Visit Information Kiosk
Key.Japanese: Visit Information Kiosk

Key.Original:
Now start using this item or any other and do with it what you like.

You have familiarized yourself with the basics of the Multiplayer Armory. Have fun exploring ARMEX and going on Operation!
Key.Chinese:
Now start using this item or any other and do with it what you like.

You have familiarized yourself with the basics of the Multiplayer Armory. Have fun exploring ARMEX and going on Operation!
Key.French:
align='left'> Maintenant commencez à utiliser cet article, ou tout autre, et faites-en ce que bon vous semble.

Vous vous êtes familiarisé avec les bases de l'Armurerie multijoueur. Amusez-vous à explorer ARMEX et allez à l'Opération !
Key.Spanish:
Ahora empieza a usar este objeto o cualquier otro y haz lo que quieras con ello.

Te has familiarizado con lo esencial de la Multiplayer Armory. ¡Diviértete en explorar ARMEX y luego sigue con la Operación!
Key.Italian:
Adesso comincia ad utilizzare questo o un altro oggetto qualsiasi per farci ciò che vuoi.

Ora che stai familiarizzando con le basi della Multiplayer Armory, divertiti ad esplorare l’ARMEX e poi passa alla Operazione!
Key.Hungarian:
Now start using this item or any other and do with it what you like.

You have familiarized yourself with the basics of the Multiplayer Armory. Have fun exploring ARMEX and going on Operation!
Key.Polish:
A teraz zacznij używać tego lub innego przedmiotu i zrób z nim, co zechcesz.

Znasz już podstawy Zbrojowni Gry Wieloosobowej. Baw się dobrze podczas eksploracji ARMEX!
Key.Russian:
Теперь начните использовать этот предмет или любой другой, делая с ним все, что угодно.

Вы ознакомились с основами применения многопользовательского арсенала. Приятного вам исследования ARMEX и выполнения операций!
Key.German:
Benutzen Sie jetzt diesen oder einen beliebigen anderen Gegenstand und machen Sie damit, was Sie wollen.

Sie haben sich mit den Grundlagen der Multiplayer-Waffenkammer vertraut gemacht. Viel Spaß auf der ARMEX und bei den Einsätzen!
Key.Czech:
Začněte zkoušet tuto položku - dělejte si s ní co libo.

Seznámili jste se se základy Multiplayer Armory. Užijte si ARMEX a co nejdřív vyrazte na Operaci!
Key.English:
Now start using this item or any other and do with it what you like.

You have familiarized yourself with the basics of the Multiplayer Armory. Have fun exploring ARMEX and going on Operation!
Key.Japanese:
Now start using this item or any other and do with it what you like.

You have familiarized yourself with the basics of the Multiplayer Armory. Have fun exploring ARMEX and going on Operation!

Key.Original: View Item
Key.Chinese: View Item
Key.French: Voir l'item
Key.Spanish: Ver Objeto
Key.Italian: Visualizza oggetto
Key.Hungarian: View Item
Key.German: Gegenstand ansehen
Key.English: View Item
Key.Japanese: View Item

Key.Original: Visit any information kiosk and view the info brochure. Take as much time as you need to read through the available information.
Key.Chinese: Visit any information kiosk and view the info brochure. Take as much time as you need to read through the available information.
Key.French: Visitez n'importe quel kiosque d'information et consultez la brochure d'information. Prenez tout le temps dont vous avez besoin pour lire les informations disponibles.
Key.Spanish: Visita cualquier quiosco de información y echa un vistazo al folleto informativo. Tomate todo el tiempo que necesites para leer la información disponible.
Key.Italian: Visita qualsiasi chiosco informativo e guarda la brochure esplicativa. Prenditi tutto il tempo che vuoi per leggere le infomazioni disponibili.
Key.Hungarian: Visit any information kiosk and view the info brochure. Take as much time as you need to read through the available information.
Key.Polish: Odwiedź dowolną budkę informacyjną i zapoznaj się z broszurą. Możesz dowolnie długo czytać dostępne informacje.
Key.Russian: Посетите любой информационный киоск и просмотрите информационную брошюру. Время для просмотра информации не ограничено.
Key.German: Besuchen Sie irgendeinen Informationsstand und lesen Sie die Informationstafel. Nehmen Sie sich so viel Zeit wie nötig, um die verfügbaren Informationen durchzuarbeiten.
Key.Czech: Navštivte informační stánky a prohlédněte si brožurku. Na prostudování informací máte tolik času, kolik jen potřebujete.
Key.English: Visit any information kiosk and view the info brochure. Take as much time as you need to read through the available information.
Key.Japanese: Visit any information kiosk and view the info brochure. Take as much time as you need to read through the available information.

Key.Original: Select Item
Key.Chinese: Select Item
Key.French: Sélectionnez un item
Key.Spanish: Seleccionar Objeto
Key.Italian: Seleziona oggetto
Key.Hungarian: Select Item
Key.German: Gegenstand wählen
Key.English: Select Item
Key.Japanese: Select Item

Key.Original: Go to the marked item and look at its information sign. If you like, you can use the vehicles parked near the entrance to get there.
Key.Chinese: Go to the marked item and look at its information sign. If you like, you can use the vehicles parked near the entrance to get there.
Key.French: Allez à l'item marqué et regardez sa fiche descriptive. Si vous le souhaitez, vous pouvez utiliser les véhicules garés près de l'entrée pour y arriver.
Key.Spanish: Ve al objeto indicado y echa un vistazo a su símbolo de información. Si quieres, puedes llegar allí usando uno de los vehículos aparcados cerca de la entrada.
Key.Italian: Vai all'oggetto indicato e dai un'occhiata al suo punto d'informazione. Se vuoi, puoi arrivare lì usando uno dei veicoli parcheggiati vicino l'entrata.
Key.Hungarian: Go to the marked item and look at its information sign. If you like, you can use the vehicles parked near the entrance to get there.
Key.Polish: Podejdź do zaznaczonego przedmiotu i spójrz na tablicę informacyjną. Jeśli chcesz, możesz tam dotrzeć, korzystając z pojazdów zaparkowanych w pobliżu wejścia.
Key.Russian: Пройдите к отмеченному предмету и посмотрите на его информационный щит. Если хотите, вы можете использовать технику, стоящую у входа для того, чтобы попасть туда.
Key.German: Gehen Sie zu dem markierten Gegenstand und sehen Sie sich sein Informationsschild an. Wenn Sie möchten, können Sie die am Eingang geparkten Fahrzeuge benutzen, um dorthin zu kommen.
Key.Czech: Jděte k označené položce a prohlédněte si její informační tabulku. Můžete se k nim dostat s pomocí vozidel, zaparkovaných u vchodu.
Key.English: Go to the marked item and look at its information sign. If you like, you can use the vehicles parked near the entrance to get there.
Key.Japanese: Go to the marked item and look at its information sign. If you like, you can use the vehicles parked near the entrance to get there.

Key.Original: Use the Action Menu to select the item in front of you. In the Operation phase, this item will be used whenever possible.
Key.Chinese: Use the Action Menu to select the item in front of you. In the Operation phase, this item will be used whenever possible.
Key.French: Utilisez le menu Action pour sélectionner l'item en face de vous. Dans l'Opération, cet item sera utilisé chaque fois que possible.
Key.Spanish: Usa el Menú de Acción para seleccionar el objeto que tienes delante. En la fase Operación, el objeto será utilizado cuando sea posible.
Key.Italian: Usa il Menu Azione per selezionare l'oggetto davanti a te. Nella fase Operazione, questo oggetto verrà utilizzato quando sarà possibile.
Key.Hungarian: Use the Action Menu to select the item in front of you. In the Operation phase, this item will be used whenever possible.
Key.Polish: Użyj Menu akcji, by wybrać znajdujący się przed tobą przedmiot. W fazie operacji będzie on używany zawsze, gdy będzie to możliwe.
Key.Russian: Используйте меню действий для выбора предмета, находящегося перед вами. На этапе операции, этот предмет будет использоваться всегда, когда это возможно.
Key.German: Benutzen Sie das Aktionsmenü, um den Gegenstand vor Ihnen auszuwählen! In der Einsatzphase wird dieser Gegenstand eingesetzt, wann immer es möglich ist.
Key.Czech: S pomocí Menu akcí můžete vybrat položku přímo před vámi. Během operace bude tato položka použita kdykoli to bude třeba.
Key.English: Use the Action Menu to select the item in front of you. In the Operation phase, this item will be used whenever possible.
Key.Japanese: Use the Action Menu to select the item in front of you. In the Operation phase, this item will be used whenever possible.

Key.Original: You did not achieve the highest amount of points this time.
Key.Chinese: You did not achieve the highest amount of points this time.
Key.French: Vous n'avez pas réalisé le plus grand nombre de points cette fois.
Key.Spanish: No has conseguido el mayor número de puntos esta vez.
Key.Italian: Non hai raggiunto il maggior numero di punti questa volta.
Key.Hungarian: You did not achieve the highest amount of points this time.
Key.Polish: Tym razem nie zdobyłeś największej liczby punktów.
Key.Russian: В этот раз вы не достигли наивысшего количества очков.
Key.German: Sie haben diesmal nicht die höchste Punktzahl erreicht.
Key.Czech: Tentokrát jste nedosáhli nejvyššího počtu bodů.
Key.English: You did not achieve the highest amount of points this time.
Key.Japanese: You did not achieve the highest amount of points this time.

Key.Original: You achieved the highest amount of points.
Key.Chinese: You achieved the highest amount of points.
Key.French: Vous avez réalisé le plus grand nombre de points.
Key.Spanish: Has conseguido el mayor número de puntos.
Key.Italian: Hai raggiunto il maggior numero di punti.
Key.Hungarian: You achieved the highest amount of points.
Key.Polish: Udało ci się zdobyć najwięcej punktów.
Key.German: Sie haben die höchste Punktzahl erreicht.
Key.English: You achieved the highest amount of points.
Key.Japanese: You achieved the highest amount of points.

Key.Original: Operation will commence shortly. We are waiting for meta-challenges to finish.
Key.Chinese: Operation will commence shortly. We are waiting for meta-challenges to finish.
Key.French: Opération débutera sous peu. Nous attendons la fin des méta-défis.
Key.Spanish: La Operación va a empezar en breve. Estamos esperando que terminen los meta-desafíos.
Key.Italian: L'Operazione inizierà a breve. Stiamo aspettando la conclusione delle meta-sfide.
Key.Hungarian: Operation will commence shortly. We are waiting for meta-challenges to finish.
Key.Polish: Wkrótce rozpocznie się operacja. Czekamy na zakończenie metawyzwań.
Key.Russian: Операция скоро начнется. Мы ждем завершения мета-заданий.
Key.German: Ein Einsatz beginnt in Kürze. Wir warten auf den Abschluss von Meta-Herausforderungen.
Key.Czech: Operace začne za okamžik. Čekáme na dokončení meta-výzev.
Key.English: Operation will commence shortly. We are waiting for meta-challenges to finish.
Key.Japanese: Operation will commence shortly. We are waiting for meta-challenges to finish.

Key.Original: We are now starting Operation.
Key.Chinese: We are now starting Operation.
Key.French: Nous commençons maintenant l'Opération.
Key.Spanish: Estamos a punto de empezar la Operación.
Key.Italian: Stiamo per iniziare l'Operazione.
Key.Hungarian: We are now starting Operation.
Key.German: Wir beginnen jetzt mit dem Einsatz.
Key.English: We are now starting Operation.
Key.Japanese: We are now starting Operation.

Key.Original: To ensure the safety of all our visitors, ARMEX is off-limits during Operation. Please leave immediately!
Key.Chinese: To ensure the safety of all our visitors, ARMEX is off-limits during Operation. Please leave immediately!
Key.French: Pour assurer la sécurité de tous nos visiteurs, ARMEX est interdit d'accès pendant l'Opération. Veuillez quitter la zone tout de suite !
Key.Spanish: Para garantizar la seguridad de nuestros visitantes, ARMEX estará prohibida durante la Operación. Por favor, abandona el área cuanto antes!
Key.Italian: Per garantire la sicurezza di tutti i nostri visitatori, l'accesso all'ARMEX è proibito durante l'Operazione. Abbandona l'area al più presto!
Key.Hungarian: To ensure the safety of all our visitors, ARMEX is off-limits during Operation. Please leave immediately!
Key.Polish: Aby zapewnić gościom bezpieczeństwo, ARMEX zostało zamknięte na czas operacji. Natychmiast odejdź!
Key.Russian: Для обеспечения безопасности всех посетителей, ARMEX закрыта на время операции. Пожалуйста, немедленно уходите!
Key.German: Um die Sicherheit aller Besucher zu gewährleisten, ist der Zutritt zur ARMEX während des Einsatzes untersagt. Verlassen Sie bitte umgehend das Gelände!
Key.Czech: Kvůli zajištění bezpečí hostů bude ARMEX po dobu konání operace uzavřen.
Key.English: To ensure the safety of all our visitors, ARMEX is off-limits during Operation. Please leave immediately!
Key.Japanese: To ensure the safety of all our visitors, ARMEX is off-limits during Operation. Please leave immediately!

Key.Original: has selected item

Key.Original: Operation
Key.Chinese: Operation
Key.French: Opération
Key.Spanish: Operación
Key.Italian: Operazione
Key.Hungarian: Operation
Key.German: Einsätze
Key.English: Operation
Key.Japanese: Operation

Key.Original:
You can vote on a number of things, such as going on Operation, returning to ARMEX, or starting a specific challenge. Once a majority vote is reached, the corresponding action is performed.

Voting is accessed through the Quick Menu, which, in turn, is opened in the Action Menu (or Communications Menu from inside vehicles).
Key.Chinese:
You can vote on a number of things, such as going on Operation, returning to ARMEX, or starting a specific challenge. Once a majority vote is reached, the corresponding action is performed.

Voting is accessed through the Quick Menu, which, in turn, is opened in the Action Menu (or Communications Menu from inside vehicles).
Key.French:
Vous pouvez voter pour un certain nombre de choses, comme aller à l'Opération, retourner à ARMEX ou démarrer un défi spécifique. Une fois que la majorité est atteinte, l'action correspondante est effectuée.

Le vote est accessible via le Menu Rapide, qui, à son tour, est ouvert dans le Menu Action (ou Menu Communication depuis l'intérieur d'un véhicule).
Key.Spanish:
Puedes votar muchísimas cosas, como participar en una Operación, volver a ARMEX, o empezar un desafío especifico. Una vez que ha sido alcanzada la mayoría de votos, la acción correspondiente se pondrá en marcha.

Puedes votar a través del Menú Rápido, que está dentro del Menú de Acción (o a través del Menú Comunicaciones, dentro de los vehículos).
Key.Italian:
Puoi votare diverse cose, come per esempio la partecipazione ad una Operazione, tornare all’ARMEX, o iniziare una sfida specifica. Una volta raggiunta la maggioranza di voti, verrà eseguita l’azione corrispondente

Puoi votare accedendo al Menu Veloce dal Menu Azione o dal Menu Comunicazioni, che si trova dentro i veicoli.
Key.Hungarian:
You can vote on a number of things, such as going on Operation, returning to ARMEX, or starting a specific challenge. Once a majority vote is reached, the corresponding action is performed.

Voting is accessed through the Quick Menu, which, in turn, is opened in the Action Menu (or Communications Menu from inside vehicles).
Key.Polish:
Możesz głosować na wiele rzeczy, na przykład za rozpoczęciem operacji, powrotem do ARMEX lub podjęciem określonego wyzwania. Kiedy zostanie osiągnięta większość, będzie wykonana odpowiednia akcja.

Głosowanie uruchamia się w Szybkim menu, otwieranym za pomocą Menu akcji (lub Menu łączności w pojazdach).
Key.Russian:
Вы можете проголосовать за несколько вещей, в т.ч. за отправку на операцию, возвращение к ARMEX, или начало конкретного задания. При наборе большинства голосов, выполняется соответствующее действие.

Голосование доступно ч/з быстрое меню, которое, в свою очередь, открывается в меню действий (или в меню коммуникаций из техники).
Key.German:
Sie können über mehrere Dinge abstimmen, wie etwa den Beginn eines Einsatzes, die Rückkehr zur ARMEX oder den Start einer bestimmten Herausforderung. Sobald eine Mehrheit erreicht ist, wird die entsprechende Aktion durchgeführt.

Die Abstimmung erfolgt im Schnellmenü, das wiederum über das Aktionsmenü (oder in Fahrzeugen über das Kommunikationsmenü) geöffnet wird.
Key.Czech:
Můžete hlasovat o celé řadě věcí, například co se bude během Operace dít, o návratu na ARMEX nebo o začátku konkrétní výzvy. Jakmile dojde ke shodě většiny, provede se požadovaná akce.

Hlasování se provádí pomocí Rychlého menu, které je přístupné z menu akcí (případně z Komunikačního menu ve vozidlech).
Key.English:
You can vote on a number of things, such as going on Operation, returning to ARMEX, or starting a specific challenge. Once a majority vote is reached, the corresponding action is performed.

Voting is accessed through the Quick Menu, which, in turn, is opened in the Action Menu (or Communications Menu from inside vehicles).
Key.Japanese:
You can vote on a number of things, such as going on Operation, returning to ARMEX, or starting a specific challenge. Once a majority vote is reached, the corresponding action is performed.

Voting is accessed through the Quick Menu, which, in turn, is opened in the Action Menu (or Communications Menu from inside vehicles).

Key.Original: This diary section will list descriptions of all challenges as they become activated.
Key.Chinese: This diary section will list descriptions of all challenges as they become activated.
Key.French: Cette section du journal liste la description de tous les défis à mesure qu'ils sont activés.
Key.Spanish: Esta sección del diario te da una lista de las descripciones de todos los desafíos una vez que estén activos.
Key.Italian: Nella sezione del diario, troverai una lista con tutte le sfide attive.
Key.Hungarian: This diary section will list descriptions of all challenges as they become activated.
Key.Polish: W tej części pamiętnika znajdują się opisy wszystkich aktywowanych wyzwań.
Key.Russian: Данный раздел дневника будет перечислять описания всех заданий по мере их активации.
Key.German: Dieser Abschnitt des Notizbuchs listet Beschreibungen aller Herausforderungen auf, sobald sie aktiviert wurden.
Key.Czech: Tato část diáře bude obsahovat popisy všech aktivních výzev.
Key.English: This diary section will list descriptions of all challenges as they become activated.
Key.Japanese: This diary section will list descriptions of all challenges as they become activated.

Key.Original:
Operation is a series of challenges outside of ARMEX. These challenges are generated dynamically, based upon the items selected by all players.

Challenges can be different each time and, depending on the type of challenge, not all items will be used. Sometimes a challenge will give everyone the same randomly selected item. To see which items are used by a challenge, check its task description.

In case you are unsure what you are expected to do, refer to your diary and look over your tasks and the special %1 section.
Key.Chinese:
Operation is a series of challenges outside of ARMEX. These challenges are generated dynamically, based upon the items selected by all players.

Challenges can be different each time and, depending on the type of challenge, not all items will be used. Sometimes a challenge will give everyone the same randomly selected item. To see which items are used by a challenge, check its task description.

In case you are unsure what you are expected to do, refer to your diary and look over your tasks and the special %1 section.
Key.French:
Opération est une série de défis en dehors d'ARMEX. Ces défis sont générés dynamiquement, selon les items sélectionnés par tous les joueurs.

Les défis peuvent être différents à chaque fois et, selon le type de défi, tous les items ne seront pas nécessairement utilisés. Parfois, un défi donnera à chacun le même item choisi au hasard. Pour voir les items qui sont utilisés par un défi, vérifier la description de la tâche.

Dans le cas où vous ne savez pas ce que vous êtes censé faire, reportez-vous à votre journal, regarder vos tâches et la section spéciale %1.
Key.Spanish:
La Operación es una serie de desafíos fuera de ARMEX. Estos desafíos están generados dinámicamente, según los objetos que han elegido todos los jugadores

Los desafíos pueden cambiar cada vez y, dependiendo del tipo de desafío, no todos los objetos podrán ser usados. A veces puede ocurrir que a todos los jugadores se les asignarán objetos seleccionados al azar. Para ver que objetos se están utilizando durante un desafío, controla su descripción.

Si no sabes que hacer, mira tu diario y la sección especial %1 para buscar tus tareas.
Key.Italian:
L’Operazione comprende una serie di sfide fuori dall’ARMEX. Queste sfide vengono generate dinamicamente, basandosi sugli oggetti selezionati dai giocatori.

Le sfide possono essere sempre diverse e, a seconda del tipo, non tutti gli oggetti potranno essere utilizzati. Per vedere quali oggetti saranno usati in una sfida, controllane la descrizione.

Se non sei sicuro di cosa devi fare, guarda il diario e la sezione speciale %1 per cercare i tuoi incarichi.
Key.Hungarian:
Operation is a series of challenges outside of ARMEX. These challenges are generated dynamically, based upon the items selected by all players.

Challenges can be different each time and, depending on the type of challenge, not all items will be used. Sometimes a challenge will give everyone the same randomly selected item. To see which items are used by a challenge, check its task description.

In case you are unsure what you are expected to do, refer to your diary and look over your tasks and the special %1 section.
Key.Polish:
Operacja to seria wyzwań poza ARMEX. Są one generowane dynamicznie, w zależności od przedmiotów wybranych przez wszystkich graczy.

Każde wyzwanie może wyglądać inaczej, a w zależności od jego rodzaju niektóre przedmioty mogą nie być używane. Czasami wyzwanie przydzieli wszystkim ten sam losowy przedmiot. Aby zobaczyć, jakie przedmioty są używane w wyzwaniu, zapoznaj się z opisem zadania.

Jeśli nie jesteś pewien, co masz zrobić, zajrzyj do pamiętnika i przejrzyj zadania oraz specjalną sekcję %1.
Key.Russian:
Операция - это серия заданий вне ARMEX. Эти задания создаются динамически, с учетом выбранных всеми игроками предметов.

Задания могут каждый раз отличаться, а также, в зависимости от типа задания, будут использовать не все предметы. Иногда задание выделит каждому один и тот же случайно выбранный предмет. Чтобы просмотреть какие предметы используются заданием, проверьте его описание.

Если вы не уверены в том, что вы должны сделать, обратитесь к вашему дневнику и просмотрите ваши задачи и специальную секцию %1.
Key.German:
Ein Einsatz ist eine Reihe von Herausforderungen außerhalb der ARMEX. Diese Herausforderungen werden dynamisch erstellt, abhängig von den Gegenständen, die sämtliche Spieler ausgewählt haben.

Die Herausforderungen können jedes Mal anders aussehen, und je nach Typ der Herausforderung werden möglicherweise nicht alle Gegenstände benutzt. Manchmal erhält bei einer Herausforderung jeder denselben, zufällig ausgewählten Gegenstand. Welche Gegenstände in einer Herausforderung zum Einsatz kommen, können Sie ihrer Aufgabenbeschreibung entnehmen.

Falls Sie unsicher sind, worin Ihre Aufgabe besteht, sehen Sie sich in Ihrem Notizbuch die Aufgaben und den speziellen Abschnitt %1 an.
Key.Czech:
Operace je sérií výzev mimo ARMEX. Výzvy se generují dynamicky, a to na základě položek, které si všichni hráči vyberou.

Výzvy mohou být pokaždé jiné a ne vždy v nich musí být použity všechny položky (to záleží na typu položky). Seznam dostupných položek najdete v popisu úkolu.

Nejste-li si jisti, co máte dělat, informace najdete buď v diáři, úkolu nebo v sekci %1.
Key.English:
Operation is a series of challenges outside of ARMEX. These challenges are generated dynamically, based upon the items selected by all players.

Challenges can be different each time and, depending on the type of challenge, not all items will be used. Sometimes a challenge will give everyone the same randomly selected item. To see which items are used by a challenge, check its task description.

In case you are unsure what you are expected to do, refer to your diary and look over your tasks and the special %1 section.
Key.Japanese:
Operation is a series of challenges outside of ARMEX. These challenges are generated dynamically, based upon the items selected by all players.

Challenges can be different each time and, depending on the type of challenge, not all items will be used. Sometimes a challenge will give everyone the same randomly selected item. To see which items are used by a challenge, check its task description.

In case you are unsure what you are expected to do, refer to your diary and look over your tasks and the special %1 section.

Key.Original: Introduction
Key.Chinese: Introduction
Key.French: Introduction
Key.Spanish: Introducción
Key.Italian: Introduzione
Key.Hungarian: Introduction
Key.German: Einleitung
Key.English: Introduction
Key.Japanese: Introduction

Key.Original:
Meta-challenges are simple, dynamic challenges which are adjusted to the item you are using. Completing them is optional, but it will earn you and / or the team points. Note, most meta-challenges will not allow the use of Fast-Travel.

Please refer to section %1 in your diary for more information on specific meta-challenges.
Key.Chinese:
Meta-challenges are simple, dynamic challenges which are adjusted to the item you are using. Completing them is optional, but it will earn you and / or the team points. Note, most meta-challenges will not allow the use of Fast-Travel.

Please refer to section %1 in your diary for more information on specific meta-challenges.
Key.French:
Les méta-défis sont de simples défis dynamiques qui sont adaptés pour l'item que vous utilisez. Les réussir est facultatif, mais ils feront gagner des points pour vous et / ou votre équipe. Notez que la plupart des méta-défis ne permettent pas l'utilisation du Voyage Rapide.

Veuillez vous référer à la section %1 dans votre journal pour plus d'informations sur les méta-défis.
Key.Spanish:
Los meta-desafíos son desafíos sencillos y dinámicos que se adaptan al objeto que estas usando. Sus completamiento es opcional, pero permitirían a ti y / o a tu equipo ganar puntos. Nota: la mayoría de los meta-desafíos no te permitirán usar el Fast-Travel.

Consulta la sección %1 de tu diario para más información sobre meta-desafíos específicos.
Key.Italian:
Le meta-sfide sono semplici prove dinamiche che vengono adattate all’oggetto in uso. Completarle non è obbligatorio, ma faranno guadagnare a te e / o ai tuoi compagni di squadra dei punti. Attenzione: nella maggior parte delle meta-sfide non è possibile usare il Fast-Travel.

Fai riferimento alla sezione %1 del tuo diario per ulteriori informazioni riguardo a specifiche meta-sfide.
Key.Hungarian:
Meta-challenges are simple, dynamic challenges which are adjusted to the item you are using. Completing them is optional, but it will earn you and / or the team points. Note, most meta-challenges will not allow the use of Fast-Travel.

Please refer to section %1 in your diary for more information on specific meta-challenges.
Key.Polish:
Metawyzwania to proste, dynamiczne wyzwania, dostosowane do używanego przedmiotu. Ich przechodzenie jest opcjonalne, ale dzięki nim drużyna i/lub ty możecie zdobywać punkty. Pamiętaj, że w metawyzwaniach nie można korzystać z szybkiej podróży.

Zajrzyj do sekcji %1 w pamiętniku, gdzie znajdziesz więcej informacji o określonych metawyzwaniach.
Key.Russian:
Мета-задания - это простые, динамичные задания, которые адаптируются под используемый вами предмет. Их выполнение необязательно, но оно принесет вам и/или команде очки. Учтите, что при выполнении мета-заданий нельзя использовать скоростное перемещение.

Обратитесь к разделу %1 в вашем дневнике для более подробной сводки по конкретным мета-заданиям.
Key.German:
Meta-Herausforderungen sind simple, dynamische Herausforderungen, die an die momentan verwendete Waffe oder das verwendete Fahrzeug angepasst werden. Ihre Erfüllung ist freiwillig, aber Sie und/oder das Team erhalten dafür Bonuspunkte. Beachten Sie, dass bei den meisten Meta-Herausforderungen kein schneller Transport möglich ist.

Im Abschnitt %1 Ihres Notitzbuchs finden Sie weitere Informationen über die die verschiedenen Meta-Herausforderungen.
Key.Czech:
Meta-výzvy jsou jednoduché, dynamické výzvy, které se uzpůsobují podle položky, kterou používáte. Jejich dokončení je volitelné, ale zajistí vám a vašem týmu body. Během většiny meta-výzev není dovoleno používat Rychlý přesun.

Více informací o meta-výzvách naleznete v části %1 svého diáře.
Key.English:
Meta-challenges are simple, dynamic challenges which are adjusted to the item you are using. Completing them is optional, but it will earn you and / or the team points. Note, most meta-challenges will not allow the use of Fast-Travel.

Please refer to section %1 in your diary for more information on specific meta-challenges.
Key.Japanese:
Meta-challenges are simple, dynamic challenges which are adjusted to the item you are using. Completing them is optional, but it will earn you and / or the team points. Note, most meta-challenges will not allow the use of Fast-Travel.

Please refer to section %1 in your diary for more information on specific meta-challenges.

Key.Original:
ARMEX (ARMory EXhibition) is a military tradeshow showcasing all types of in-game items. Each time you visit ARMEX, you may find different items.

At ARMEX, you are free to do what you like. Each item has an information sign next to it, which displays a text description and statistics of that item. You are also free to try out any item and complete meta-challenges with it.
Key.Chinese:
ARMEX (ARMory EXhibition) is a military tradeshow showcasing all types of in-game items. Each time you visit ARMEX, you may find different items.

At ARMEX, you are free to do what you like. Each item has an information sign next to it, which displays a text description and statistics of that item. You are also free to try out any item and complete meta-challenges with it.
Key.French:
ARMEX (ARMurerie EXposition) est un salon militaire présentant toute sorte d'items utilisés en cours de jeu. Chaque fois que vous visitez ARMEX, vous pouvez trouver différents items.

À ARMEX, vous êtes libre de faire ce que bon vous semble. Chaque item a un panneau d'information à côté de lui qui affiche un texte descriptif et les statistiques de cet item. Vous êtes également libre d'essayer n'importe quel item et de réussir les méta-défis avec lui.
Key.Spanish:
ARMEX (ARMory EXhibition) es una feria militar que exhibe todos los tipos de objetos presentes en el juego. Cada vez que la visitas, encontrarás objetos diferentes.

En ARMEX, eres libre de hacer lo que quieras. Cada objeto tiene cerca un símbolo de información, que te muestra su descripción y sus estadísticas. Además, eres libre de probar cada objeto y completar meta-desafíos con él.
Key.Italian:
L’ARMEX (ARMory EXhibition) è una fiera militare, che mette in vetrina tutti i tipi di oggetti presenti nel gioco. Ogni volta che andrai all’ARMEX troverai oggetti diversi .

All’ARMEX sarai libero di fare ciò che vuoi; ogni oggetto è provvisto di un punto di informazione vicino, che ne mostrerà la relativa descrizione e statistiche. Inoltre, sarai libero di provare qualsiasi oggetto e completare con esso delle meta-sfide.
Key.Hungarian:
ARMEX (ARMory EXhibition) is a military tradeshow showcasing all types of in-game items. Each time you visit ARMEX, you may find different items.

At ARMEX, you are free to do what you like. Each item has an information sign next to it, which displays a text description and statistics of that item. You are also free to try out any item and complete meta-challenges with it.
Key.Polish:
ARMEX (ARMory EXhibition - wystawa wojskowa) to wojskowe targi, na których prezentuje się wiele przedmiotów z gry. Podczas każdej wizyty znajdziesz tam co innego.

W ARMEX możesz robić, co zechcesz. Obok każdego przedmiotu znajduje się tablica informacyjna. Możesz też wypróbować przedmiot i przejść związane z nim metawyzwania.
Key.Russian:
ARMEX (оружейная выставка) - это военная выставка, демонстрирующая все типы игровых предметов. Каждый раз, когда вы посещаете ARMEX, вы можете обнаружить различные предметы.

В ARMEX вы можете делать все, что пожелаете. У каждого предмета есть информационный щит, который демонстрирует текстовое описание и статистику данного предмета. Вы также можете опробовать предмет и выполнять мета-задания, применяя его.
Key.German:
ARMEX (ARMory EXhibition – Waffenkammerausstellung) ist eine Militärmesse, bei der alle Waffen und Fahrzeuge des Spiels gezeigt werden. Bei jedem Besuch der ARMEX warten andere Gegenstände auf Sie.

Auf der ARMEX können Sie tun, was Ihnen beliebt. Neben jedem Gegenstand befindet sich ein Informationsschild mit seiner Beschreibung und den relevanten Eigenschaften. Sie können jeden Gegenstand ausprobieren und Meta-Herausforderungen damit angehen.
Key.Czech:
ARMEX (ARMory EXhibition) je vojenským veletrhem, na němž jsou k vidění různé položky ze hry. Při každé nové návštěvě ARMEXu zde najdete jiné položky.

Na ARMEXu si můžete děla co jen chcete. Každá položka má vedle sebe informační ceduli s textem, který ji popisuje. Položku si také můžete vyzkoušet a plnit s ní meta-výzvy.
Key.English:
ARMEX (ARMory EXhibition) is a military tradeshow showcasing all types of in-game items. Each time you visit ARMEX, you may find different items.

At ARMEX, you are free to do what you like. Each item has an information sign next to it, which displays a text description and statistics of that item. You are also free to try out any item and complete meta-challenges with it.
Key.Japanese:
ARMEX (ARMory EXhibition) is a military tradeshow showcasing all types of in-game items. Each time you visit ARMEX, you may find different items.

At ARMEX, you are free to do what you like. Each item has an information sign next to it, which displays a text description and statistics of that item. You are also free to try out any item and complete meta-challenges with it.

Key.Original: Meta-Challenges
Key.Chinese: Meta-Challenges
Key.French: Méta-défis
Key.Spanish: Meta-Desafíos
Key.Italian: Meta-Sfide
Key.Hungarian: Meta-Challenges
Key.German: Meta-Herausforderungen
Key.English: Meta-Challenges
Key.Japanese: Meta-Challenges

Key.Original:
Welcome to the Multiplayer Armory and ARMEX!

This dynamic and interactive game mode offers you the chance to explore all of the game's content together. You can simply play around with anything you find at ARMEX or go complete dynamic challenges with or against other players.

Have fun!
Key.Chinese:
Welcome to the Multiplayer Armory and ARMEX!

This dynamic and interactive game mode offers you the chance to explore all of the game's content together. You can simply play around with anything you find at ARMEX or go complete dynamic challenges with or against other players.

Have fun!
Key.French:
Bienvenue à l'Armurerie Multijoueur et ARMEX !

Ce mode de jeu dynamique et interactif vous offre la chance d'explorer l'ensemble du contenu du jeu seul ou à plusieurs. Vous pouvez tout simplement jouer avec tout ce que vous trouverez à ARMEX ou aller réussir des défis dynamique avec ou contre d'autres joueurs.

Amusez-vous!
Key.Spanish:
Hola y bienvenido a la Multiplayer Armory y a ARMEX! !

Este modo de juego dinámico e interactivo te ofrece la posibilidad de explorar el entero contenido del juego a la vez. Puedes simplemente curiosear entre todo lo que está disponible en ARMEX o intentar completar unos desafíos dinámicos junto o contras otros jugadores.

¡Pásatelo bien!
Key.Italian:
Benvenuto alla Multiplayer Armory e all’ARMEX!

Questa modalità dinamica ed interattiva ti offre la possibilità di dare un’occhiata complessiva a tutto il contenuto del gioco. Puoi semplicemente curiosare tra tutto ciò che è disponibile all’ARMEX o provare a completare delle sfide dinamiche insieme o contro altri giocatori.

Buon divertimento!
Key.Hungarian:
Welcome to the Multiplayer Armory and ARMEX!

This dynamic and interactive game mode offers you the chance to explore all of the game's content together. You can simply play around with anything you find at ARMEX or go complete dynamic challenges with or against other players.

Have fun!
Key.Polish:
Witaj w Zbrojowni Gry Wieloosobowej i ARMEX!

Ten dynamiczny i interaktywny tryb daje ci możliwość zapoznania się z całą zawartością gry. Możesz bawić się wszystkim, co znajdziesz w ARMEX, albo przechodzić wyzwania dynamiczne z innymi graczami lub przeciwko nim.

Miłej zabawy!
Key.Russian:
Добро пожаловать в многопользовательский арсенал и ARMEX!

Этот динамичный и интерактивный игровой режим предлагает вам шанс совместно исследовать все наполнение игры. Вы можете просто играть с тем, что вы найдете в ARMEX, или выполнять динамичные задания с другими игроками или против них.

Развлекайтесь!
Key.German:
Willkommen in der Multiplayer-Waffenkammer und auf der ARMEX!

Dieser dynamische und interaktive Spielmodus bietet Ihnen die Gelegenheit, alle Waffen und Fahrzeuge des Spiels gemeinsam zu auszuprobieren. Sie können entweder mit allem herumspielen, was Sie auf der ARMEX finden, oder mit oder gegen andere Spieler dynamische Herausforderungen annehmen.

Viel Spaß!
Key.Czech:
Vítejte v Multiplayer Armory a na ARMEXu!

Tento dynamický a interaktivní herní režim vám nabízí možnost prozkoumávat obsah hry spolu s přáteli. Můžete si prostě a jednoduše hrát se vším, co se tu nachází nebo plnit meta-výzvy s ostatními hráči nebo proti nim.

Bavte se!
Key.English:
Welcome to the Multiplayer Armory and ARMEX!

This dynamic and interactive game mode offers you the chance to explore all of the game's content together. You can simply play around with anything you find at ARMEX or go complete dynamic challenges with or against other players.

Have fun!
Key.Japanese:
Welcome to the Multiplayer Armory and ARMEX!

This dynamic and interactive game mode offers you the chance to explore all of the game's content together. You can simply play around with anything you find at ARMEX or go complete dynamic challenges with or against other players.

Have fun!
